original: iṣṭa-devatā'nusmaraṇa-pūrvakaṃ maṅgalam āśīr-vyājena kṛtaṃ śiṣya-śikṣārtham ādau

original: tathā ca gopī-janasyaivāvijñāta-vinaya-prakarasyāpi vallabhaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sādhakasyāśeṣa-pūjā-vidhāna-kovidasyeti bhāvaḥ /

original: yad vā gopī prakṛtir jano mahad-ādir anayor vallabhaḥ preraka ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā gopī prakṛtiḥ janaḥ mahat ādiḥ anayoḥ vallabhaḥ prerakaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kīdṛśaḥ kalāyāṃ jñāna-svarūpe svasmin āttāyāḥ prāptāyā adhyastāyā māyāyā lavakena leśena vikṣepātma-svabhāvena āttā prāptā mūrtir yena sa tathoktaḥ
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ kalāyām jñāna svarūpe svasmin āttāyāḥ prāptāyāḥ adhyastāyāḥ māyāyāḥ lavakena leśena vikṣepa ātma svabhāvena āttā prāptā mūrtiḥ yena sa tathā uktaḥ

original: etena tasya śarīra-sambandhe 'pi na svarūpānusandhāna-pracyutir āvaraṇa-śakter aprāmāṇyād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: etena tasya śarīra sambandhe pi na sva rūpa anusandhāna pracyutiḥ āvaraṇa śakteḥ aprāmāṇyāt iti bhāvaḥ
atha vā kalā bandhane

original: athavā, saṃmohana-mantra-rūpakaṃ kāma-bījaṃ sakala-gopāla-mantrāṇāṃ bījam udāharati kaleti /

analyzed: sa pavitra iti pavitra sahitaḥ mudrā yukta hastaḥ su pavitra iti pāṭhe ati śobhana pavitreṇa mudritaḥ mudrā sambaddhaḥ tilakena ujjvalaḥ

original: atra prāg-vadanasya kaṇṭhoktatvāt prāg-vadanaṃ mukhyaṃ tad-asambhave tūdaṅmukhatvaṃ rātrau tu sarva-pūjāsvedodaṅmukhatvaṃ purāṇe ca tathaivābhidhānāt

original: anantaraṃ sudṛḍhaṃ yathā syāt tathā padmāsanaṃ svastikaṃ vā kṛtvā /

analyzed: tatas tad anantaram bhūta ātmakam pṛthivī ādi pañca mahābhūta mayam etat aṅgam śarīram śuddha matiḥ viśada matiḥ viśodhayet devatā ātmakam kuryāt

original: kiṃ kṛtvā ? astra-mantreṇaiva astrāya phaḍ ity anena tan-mantrāṅgāstra-mantreṇaiva vā,
analyzed: kim kṛtvā astramantreṇa eva astrāya phaṭ iti anena tad mantra aṅga astramantreṇa eva vā

original: atra sampradāyaḥ hṛt-padma-karṇikā-sthaṃ dīpa-śikhā-nibhaṃ jīvātmānaṃ haṃsa iti mantreṇa

original: pañca-bhūta-maya-deha-śoṣakaṃ tathā ca vāma-nāsā-puṭena vāyum ākarṣan ṣoḍaś-vāraṃ vāyu-bījaṃ japed iti bhāvaḥ /
anantaraṃ sakalaṃ sarvaṃ svakīyaṃ śarīraṃ tena bīja-mayena vāyunā pratata-vapuṣā
analyzed: anantaram sakalam sarvam svakīyam śarīram tena bīja mayena vāyunā pratata vapuṣā

original: vistīrṇa-śarīreṇāpūrya pūrayitvā deha-stha-vāyor bāhyenaikyaṃ vicintya viśoṣaṃ nītvā
analyzed: vistīrṇa śarīreṇa āpūrya pūrayitvā deha stha vāyoḥ bāhyena aikyam vicintya viśoṣam nītvā

original: catuḥ-ṣaṣṭhi-vāraṃ vāyu-bījaṃ kumbhakena japtvā khamaṇeḥ sūryasya mārgeṇa piṅgalayā
analyzed: catuḥṣaṣṭhi vāram vāyubījam kumbhakena japtvā khamaṇeḥ sūryasya mārgeṇa piṅgalayā

original: dakṣiṇa-nāsā-puṭena recanenaiva vāyu-bījaṃ dvātriṃśad-vāraṃ japan vāyuṃ vyāmuñcet
analyzed: dakṣiṇa nāsā puṭena recanena eva vāyubījam dvātriṃśat vāram japan vāyum vyāmuñcet
tyajet iti arthaḥ
tena eva mārgeṇa vilīna mārutam
bījam vicintya aruṇam āśuśukṣaṇe
āpūrya deham paridahya

original: muñcet samīraṃ saha bhasmanā bahiḥ // Krd_1.9 //
analyzed: muñcet samīram saha bhasmanā bahis

original: tenaiva kha-maṇeḥ sūryasya mārgeṇa dakṣiṇa-nāsā-puṭena vilīnaḥ sambaddho māruto vāyur
analyzed: tena eva khamaṇeḥ sūryasya mārgeṇa dakṣiṇa nāsā puṭena vilīnaḥ sambaddhaḥ mārutaḥ vāyuḥ

original: yatra tad āśuśukṣaṇer vahner bījaṃ ram iti aruṇam aruṇa-varṇaṃ vicintya vāyunāpūrya
analyzed: yatra tat āśuśukṣaṇeḥ vahneḥ bījam raṃ iti aruṇam aruṇa varṇam vicintya vāyunā āpūrya

original: tad-bījasya ṣoḍaśa-vāra-japena pūrakaṃ kṛtvānantaraṃ kumbhakena caturguṇaṃ raṃ-bījaṃ
analyzed: tad bījasya ṣoḍaśa vāra japena pūrakam kṛtvā anantaram kumbhakena caturguṇam raṃ bījam

original: japan dehaṃ paridahya tad-ūrdhvaṃ ram iti dvātriṃśad-vāraṃ japan vāmata iḍā-mārgeṇa
analyzed: japan deham paridahya tad ūrdhvam raṃ iti dvātriṃśat vāram japan vāmatas iḍāmārgeṇa

original: vāma-nāsā-puṭena bhasmanā saha bahiḥ samīraṃ vāyuṃ muñced ity arthaḥ // KrdC_1.9 //
analyzed: vāma nāsā puṭena bhasmanā saha bahis samīram vāyum muñcet iti arthaḥ
utpattim darśayati
ṭa param atīva śuddham amṛta aṃśu pathena vidhum
nayatu lalāṭa candram amutas sakala arṇa mayīm

original: la-para-japān nipātya racayec ca tayā sakalaṃ
analyzed: lapara japān nipātya racayet ca tayā sakalam

original: vapur amṛtaugha-vṛṣṭim atha vaktra-karāṅgam idam // Krd_1.10 //
analyzed: vapuḥ amṛta ogha vṛṣṭim atha vaktra kara aṅgam idam

original: ṭasya paraṣ ṭa-paraḥ ṭha-kāras tam atīva śuddhaṃ śvetaṃ vidhuṃ candra-bīja-rūpam
analyzed: ṭasya paraḥ ṭa paraḥ ṭhakāraḥ tam atīva śuddham śvetam vidhum candra bīja rūpam

original: amṛtāṃśu-pathena vāma-nāsā-puṭena ṣoḍaśa-vāra-japena lalāṭa-candraṃ brahma-randhra-stha-candraṃ nayatu prāpayatu /
analyzed: amṛtāṃśu pathena vāma nāsā puṭena ṣoḍaśa vāra japena lalāṭa candram brahmarandhra stha candram nayatu prāpayatu

original: nanu, sarva-śarīrasya dagdhatvāt katham amṛtāṃśu-pathena candra-bīja-nayanam iti cen, na /
analyzed: nanu sarva śarīrasya dagdha tvāt katham amṛta aṃśu pathena candra bīja nayanam iti ced na
pūrva uktasya bhāvanā ātmaka tvāt

original: athānantaram amutaḥ amṛtāṃśor lalāṭa-candrād brahma-randhra-stha-śaśaṅkāt sakalārṇa-mayīm
analyzed: atha anantaram amutas amṛtāṃśoḥ lalāṭa candrāt brahmarandhra stha śaśaṅkāt sakala arṇa mayīm

original: mātṛkā-mayīm amṛta-samūha-vṛṣṭiṃ la-paro va-kāraḥ varuṇa-bījam iti yāvat taj-japena
analyzed: mātṛkā mayīm amṛta samūha vṛṣṭim laparaḥ vakāraḥ varuṇa bījam iti yāvat tad japena

original: kumbhakena catuḥ-ṣaṣṭhi-vāra-japena nipātya utpādya tathā mātṛkā-mayyā vṛṣṭyā idaṃ
analyzed: kumbhakena catuḥṣaṣṭhi vāra japena nipātya utpādya tathā mātṛkā mayyā vṛṣṭyā idam
sakalam śarīram racayet āracayet

original: kīdṛśam ? vapur vaktra-karāṅgaṃ vaktraṃ ca karaś ca aṅgam avayava-rūpaṃ
analyzed: kīdṛśam vapuḥ vaktra kara aṅgam vaktram ca karaḥ ca aṅgam avayava rūpam

original: yatra tat tathā vaktra-karāḍhyam iti pāṭhe vaktrāḍhyaṃ karāḍhyaṃ cety arthaḥ /
analyzed: yatra tat tathā vaktra kara āḍhyam iti pāṭhe vaktra āḍhyam kara āḍhyam ca iti arthaḥ

original: anantaraṃ dakṣiṇa-nāsā-puṭena vāyuṃ recayet lam iti pṛthvī-bījaṃ pīta-varṇaṃ dvātriṃśad-vāraṃ japan tat śarīraṃ sudṛṣṭaṃ cintayet /
analyzed: anantaram dakṣiṇa nāsā puṭena vāyum recayet laṃ iti pṛthvī bījam pīta varṇam dvātriṃśat vāram japan tat śarīram su dṛṣṭam cintayet

original: tad-anu so 'ham ity ātma-mantreṇa brahma-randhrāj jīvaṃ hṛdayāmbhojam ānayed iti sampradāyaḥ // KrdC_1.10 //
analyzed: tadanu saḥ ham iti ātma mantreṇa brahmarandhrāt jīvam hṛdaya ambhojam ānayet iti sampradāyaḥ
adhunā mātṛkā nyāsam darśayati
śiraḥ vadana vṛtta dṛś śravaṇa ghoṇa gaṇḍa uṣṭhaka

original: dvayeṣu sa-śiromukheṣu ca iti kramād vinyaset /
analyzed: dvayeṣu sa śiraḥ mukheṣu ca iti kramāt vinyaset
ha laḥ ca kara pāda sandhiṣu tad agrakeṣu ādarāt
sa pārśva yuga pṛṣṭha nābhi udarakeṣu
hṛdaya kakṣaka kutkara mūla dos
pada yuga udara vaktra āgatān budhaḥ
hṛdaya pūrvam anena pathā anvaham
nyasatu śuddha kalevara siddhaye

original: atra śiraḥ-śabdo lalāṭasyopalakṣakaḥ lalāṭa-mukham āvṛteti śāradādarśanāt ekatrākṣara-dvayasyāpi nyāsāpātāc ca /
analyzed: atra śiraḥ śabdaḥ lalāṭasya upalakṣakaḥ lalāṭa mukham āvṛtā iti śāradā darśanāt ekatra akṣara dvayasya api nyāsa āpātāt ca

original: vadana-vṛttaṃ mukha-maṇḍalaṃ dṛk-śravaṇa-ghoṇa-gaṇḍoṣṭha-dantānāṃ dvayam iti samāsaḥ /
analyzed: vadana vṛttam mukha maṇḍalam dṛś śravaṇa ghoṇa gaṇḍa uṣṭha dantānām dvayam iti samāsaḥ

original: dvayam iti dṛg-ādāv api sarvatra sambadhyate /
analyzed: dvayam iti dṛś ādau api sarvatra sambadhyate
ghoṇā nāsikā

original: dad-dvaye danta-paṅkti-dvaye ity ukteṣu sthāneṣu acaḥ ṣoḍaśa-svarān krameṇaikākṣara-krameṇa
analyzed: dat dvaye danta paṅkti dvaye iti ukteṣu sthāneṣu a caḥ ṣoḍaśa svarān krameṇa eka akṣara krameṇa

original: vinyaset tathā halaś ca kādīni vyañjanāni ca tatra kādīni viṃśaty-akṣarāṇi ādarāt
analyzed: vinyaset tathā ha laḥ ca ka ādīni vyañjanāni ca tatra ka ādīni viṃśati akṣarāṇi ādarāt
ādara pūrvakam kara pāda sandhiṣu tad agrakeṣu ca vinyaset

original: anantaraṃ ya-kārādīni pañcākṣarāṇi sa-pārśva-yuga-pṛṣṭha-nābhy-udarakeṣu pārśva-yugena saha vartate yat pṛṣṭha-nābhy-udaraṃ tatra vinyaset
analyzed: anantaram yakāra ādīni pañca akṣarāṇi sa pārśva yuga pṛṣṭha nābhi udarakeṣu pārśva yugena saha vartate yat pṛṣṭha nābhi udaram tatra vinyaset
tathā anantaram anena vakṣyamāṇa mārgeṇa yādyān

original: varṇān hṛdayādi-sthāna-gatān atrāpi kara-pad-yugayor udara-vaktrayoś ca hṛdaya-pūrvaṃ yathā syāt tathā anvahaṃ pratidinaṃ nyasatu /
analyzed: varṇān hṛdaya ādi sthāna gatān atra api kara pad yugayoḥ udara vaktrayoḥ ca hṛdaya pūrvam yathā syāt tathā anvaham pratidinam nyasatu

original: kara-pad-yugādīnāṃ pūrvaiḥ padaiḥ samastānām api hṛdaya-pūrvam iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇena saha sambandhaḥ sāpekṣatvād atrāsamāsa iti tu tulya-pradhāna-sāpekṣa-viṣayaṃ  #
analyzed: kara pad yuga ādīnām pūrvaiḥ padaiḥ samastānām api hṛdaya pūrvam iti kriyā viśeṣaṇena saha sambandhaḥ sāpekṣa tvāt atra asamāsaḥ iti tu tulya pradhāna sāpekṣa viṣayam
draṣṭavyam

original: kim-arthaṃ śuddha-kalevara-siddhaye śuddha-śarīra-sampādanārtham ity arthaḥ // KrdC_1.11-12 //
analyzed: kimartham śuddha kalevara siddhaye śuddha śarīra sampādana artham iti arthaḥ
iti āracayya vapuḥ arṇa śata ardhakena
sa ardha kṣapā īśa sa visarga ka sa ubhayaiḥ taiḥ
vinyasya keśava puraḥsara mūrta yuktaiḥ
kīrti ādi śakti sahitaiḥ nyasatu krameṇa
atha kathayāmi arṇānām mūrtīḥ
śaktīḥ samasta bhuvana mayīḥ
mādhavaḥ tathā tuṣṭiḥ

original: ity ukta-prakāreṇa vapuḥ śarīram arṇa-śatārdhena pañcāśad-varṇaiḥ āracayya racayitvā anantaraṃ tair eva pañcāśad-varṇaiḥ sārdha-kṣapeśa-sa-visargaka-sobhayaiḥ
analyzed: iti ukta prakāreṇa vapuḥ śarīram arṇa śatārdhena pañcāśat varṇaiḥ āracayya racayitvā anantaram taiḥ eva pañcāśat varṇaiḥ

original: ardha-kṣapeśena saha vartanta iti sārdha-kṣapeśāḥ ardha-candra-sahitāḥ taiḥ sānusvārair ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: ardha kṣapā īśena saha vartante iti sārdha kṣapā īśāḥ ardhacandra sahitāḥ taiḥ sa anusvāraiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sa-visargakaiḥ visarga-sahitaiḥ sobhayair anusvāra-visarga-sahitaiḥ vinyasya tathādau
analyzed: sa visargakaiḥ visarga sahitaiḥ sa ubhayaiḥ anusvāra visarga sahitaiḥ vinyasya tathā ādau

original: śarīra-sampādanārthaṃ śuddher mātṛkākṣarair vinyasya tad-anantaraṃ teṣv eva lalāṭādiṣu
analyzed: śarīra sampādana artham śuddheḥ mātṛkā akṣaraiḥ vinyasya tad anantaram teṣu eva lalāṭa ādiṣu

original: mātṛkā-sthāneṣu aṃ nama ity ādīn kṣaṃ nama ity antān,
analyzed: mātṛkā sthāneṣu aṃ namaḥ iti ādīn   namaḥ iti antān

original: tathā aḥ nama ity ādīn kṣaḥ nama ity antān varṇān vinyased ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā aḥ namaḥ iti ādīn kṣaḥ namaḥ iti antān varṇān vinyaset iti arthaḥ
evam caturvidhaḥ mātṛkā nyāsaḥ uktaḥ

original: nanu, katham arṇa-śatārdhakenety ukta-varṇānām eka-pañcāśattvād ity ucyate kṣa-kāreṇākṣara-dvayasyaikī-karaṇāt /
analyzed: nanu katham arṇa śata ardhakena iti ukta varṇānām ekapañcāśat tvāt iti ucyate kṣakāreṇa akṣara dvayasya ekīkaraṇāt
la tvena lakāra dvayasya ekīkaraṇāt vā
loka prasiddheḥ vā prakaraṇena ekapañcāśat saṅkhyāyāḥ tātparye dhigate pañcāśat varṇa
eva ka pañcāśat saṅkhyā paraḥ iti prapañcasāra vivaraṇe śrī premānanda bhaṭṭa ācārya śiromaṇayaḥ

original: vastutas tu arṇa-śatārdhaṃ ca ka cārṇa-śatārdhakaṃ tenākṣarāṇām eka-pañcāśattvm āyātam /
analyzed: vastutas tu arṇa śata ardham ca ka ca arṇa śata ardhakam tena akṣarāṇām ekapañcāśat tvam āyātam
a sama vibhāge vai ardha śabdaḥ
keśava nyāsam āha vinyasya keśava iti

original: keśavaḥ puraḥsaraḥ prathamo yāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ tāḥ tathā ca keśavādi-mūrti-sahitaiḥ kīrtyādi-śakti-yuktaiś
analyzed: keśavaḥ puraḥsaraḥ prathamaḥ yāsām mūrtīnām tāḥ tathā ca keśava ādi mūrti sahitaiḥ kīrti ādi śakti yuktaiḥ

original: ca mātṛkākṣarair lalāṭādiṣūkta-sthāneṣu yathā-kramaṃ nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ // KrdC_1.13-14 //
analyzed: ca mātṛkā akṣaraiḥ lalāṭa ādiṣu ukta sthāneṣu yathākramam nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ

original: govindaḥ puṣṭi-yuto viṣṇu-dhṛtī sūdanaś ca madhvādyaḥ /
analyzed: govindaḥ puṣṭi yutaḥ viṣṇu dhṛtī sūdanaḥ ca madhu ādyaḥ

original: śāntis trivikramaś ca kriyā-yuto vāmano dayā-yuktaḥ // Krd_1.15 //
analyzed: śāntiḥ trivikramaḥ ca kriyā yutaḥ vāmanaḥ dayā yuktaḥ

original: sūdanaś ca madhvādyaḥ madhusūdanaḥ ity arthaḥ // Krd_1.15 //
analyzed: sūdanaḥ ca madhu ādyaḥ madhusūdanaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: śrīdhara-yutā ca medhā hṛṣīka-nāthaś ca harṣayā yuktaṃ /
analyzed: śrīdhara yutā ca medhā hṛṣīka nāthaḥ ca harṣayā yuktam
ambuja nābha śraddhe dāmodara saṃyutā tathā lajjā
hṛṣīkanāthaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ iti arthaḥ
ambuja nābhaḥ padma nābhaḥ

original: prādyo dyumnaḥ prīti-sameto 'niruddhako ratir imāḥ svaropetāḥ // Krd_1.17 //
analyzed: prādyaḥ dyumnaḥ prīti sametaḥ niruddhakaḥ ratiḥ imāḥ svara upetāḥ
prādyaḥ dyumnaḥ pradyumnaḥ

original: cakrijaye gadidurge śārṅgī prabhayānvitas tathā khaḍgī /
analyzed: cakri jaye gadi durge śārṅgī prabhayā anvitaḥ tathā khaḍgī
satyā śaṅkhī caṇḍā hali vāṇyau

original: śūlī vijyā pāśī virajā viśānvito 'mbuśīr bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: śūlī vijyā pāśī virajāḥ viśa anvitaḥ bhūyas

original: vimadā muknda-yuktā nandaja-sunandaje smṛtiś ca nandi-yutā // Krd_1.19 //
analyzed: vimadā muknda yuktā nanda ja sunanda je smṛtiḥ ca nandi yutā

original: nara-ṛddhī naraka-jitāsamṛddhir atha śuddhi-yug ghariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: naraṛddhī narakajitā samṛddhiḥ atha śuddhi yuj hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ

original: buddhi-yutaḥ satya-yuta-bhaktir mati-yuktaḥ syāt tataḥ śauriḥ // Krd_1.20 //
analyzed: buddhi yutaḥ satya yuta bhaktiḥ mati yuktaḥ syāt tatas śauriḥ

original: kṣamayā śūro ramayā janārdano meca-bhū-dharaḥ kledī /
analyzed: kṣamayā śūraḥ ramayā janārdanaḥ meca bhūdharaḥ kledī

original: viśvādya-mūrti-yuktā klinnā vaikuṇṭha-yuk tathā vasudā // Krd_1.21 //
analyzed: viśva ādya mūrti yuktā klinnā vaikuṇṭha yuj tathā vasudā
chandaḥ bhaṅga bhayāt tathā uktaḥ

original: viśvādi-mūrtir iti viśva-mūrtir ity arthaḥ // KrdC_1.18-21 //
analyzed: viśva ādi mūrtiḥ iti viśvamūrtiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: puruṣottamaś ca vasudhā balinā ca varā balānujopetā /
analyzed: puruṣottamaḥ ca vasudhā balinā ca varā bala anujā upetā

original: bhūyaḥ parāyaṇākhyā bālaḥ sūkṣmā vṛṣaghna-sandhye ca // Krd_1.22 //
analyzed: bhūyas parāyaṇa ākhyā bālaḥ sūkṣmā vṛṣaghna sandhye ca

original: savṛṣā prajñā prabhā varāho niśā ca vimalo 'moghā /
analyzed: savṛṣā prajñā prabhā varāhaḥ niśā ca vimalaḥ moghā

original: narasiṃha-vidyute ca praṇigaditā mūrtayo halāṃ śakti-yutāḥ // Krd_1.23 //
analyzed: narasiṃha vidyute ca praṇigaditāḥ mūrtayaḥ halām śakti yutāḥ
amoghā iti chedaḥ
pūrva ukta keśava ādi mūrti kīrti ādi śakti nyāsa prakāram darśayati
sa ardhacandrān purastān
mūrtīḥ śaktīḥ ṅe vasānāḥ natim ca
uktvā nyasyet ya ādibhiḥ sapta dhātūn

original: prāṇaṃ jīvaṃ krodham apy ātmane 'ntān // Krd_1.24 //
analyzed: prāṇam jīvam krodham api ātmane ntān

original: purastāt prathamaṃ varṇān a-kārādi-kṣakāraāntān uktvā kathambhūtān varṇān sārdha-candrān
analyzed: purastāt prathamam varṇān akāra ādi kṣakāra a antān uktvā kathambhūtān varṇān sa ardha candrān

original: sa-bindūn anantaraṃ mūrtīḥ keśavādyāḥ śaktīḥ kīrtyādyāḥ ṅe 'vasānāḥ ity ubhayena
analyzed: sa bindūn anantaram mūrtīḥ keśava ādyāḥ śaktīḥ kīrti ādyāḥ ṅe vasānāḥ iti ubhayena

original: sambadhyate tan na hṛdaya-grāhi prayāsatteḥ lāghavāc ca aṃ keśavāya kīrtyai nama
analyzed: sambadhyate tat na hṛdaya grāhi lāghavāt ca aṃ keśavāya kīrtyai nama

original: iti prayoge keśavāyety atra namaḥ-padasya yogābhāvāc caturthy-anupapattiḥ na hi viṣṇave
analyzed: iti prayoge keśavāya iti atra namaḥ padasya yoga abhāvāt caturthī anupapattiḥ na hi viṣṇave
sūryāya namaḥ iti bhavati

original: bhavati ca viṣṇave namaḥ sūryāya nama iti (tathā ca keśavāya namaḥ kīrtyai nama iti)
analyzed: bhavati ca viṣṇave namaḥ sūryāya namaḥ iti tathā ca keśavāya namaḥ kīrtyai namaḥ iti

original: prayogāpattiḥ ubhayatra vā ca-kāro deyaḥ samuccaya-khyāpanārthaḥ /
analyzed: prayoga āpattiḥ ubhayatra vā cakāraḥ deyaḥ samuccaya khyāpana arthaḥ

original: sa śriye cāmṛtāya cetivat tathā mātṛkākṣarāṇām api ubhaya-sambandhārthaṃ dviḥ-prayogāpattiḥ /
analyzed: sa śriye ca amṛtāya ca iti vat tathā mātṛkā akṣarāṇām api ubhaya sambandha artham dvis prayoga āpattiḥ

original: aṃ keśava-kīrtibhyāṃ nama iti prayoge tu naite doṣāḥ patanti tatra dvandva-samāsa-vaśāt
analyzed: aṃ keśava kīrtibhyām namaḥ iti prayoge tu na ete doṣāḥ patanti tatra dvandva samāsa vaśāt

original: sahitāvasthitayor evopasthitau caturthy-arthānvaya-sambhavāt varnānvaya-sambhavāc ca agnīṣomayor iva sahitāvasthitayor devatātvam /
analyzed: sahita avasthitayoḥ eva upasthitau caturthī artha anvaya sambhavāt varna anvaya sambhavāt ca agnīṣomayoḥ iva sahita avasthitayoḥ devatā tvam
katham tarhi ya ādiṣu tvac ādi prayogaḥ kāryam

original: ity ucyate yaṃ tvag-ātmane puruṣottama-vasudhābhyām namaḥ,
analyzed: iti ucyate yam tvac ātmane puruṣottama vasudhābhyām namaḥ

original: raṃ asṛg-ātmane bali-parābhyāṃ nama ity evaṃ rūpa iti /
analyzed: raṃ asṛj ātmane bali parābhyām namaḥ iti evam rūpe iti
mantram ukta āvali kāreṇa tathā eva abhidhānāt

original: ātmane ity asya sub-anta-pratirūpaka-nipātatvenādoṣād iti tu prapañca-sāra-vivaraṇe paramānanda-bhaṭṭācāryābhyāḥ /
analyzed: ātmane iti asya sup anta pratirūpaka nipāta tvena adoṣāt iti tu prapañcasāra vivaraṇe paramānanda bhaṭṭa ācāryābhyāḥ

original: tathā ca aṃ keśava-kīrtibhyāṃ nama iti prayogaḥ mantram uktāvalī-kāra-laghu-dīpikā-kāra-tripāṭhi-rudropādhyāya-vidyādharācārya-paramānanda-bhaṭṭācārya-saṃmataḥ
analyzed: tathā ca aṃ keśava kīrtibhyām namaḥ iti prayogaḥ mantram uktāvalīkāra laghudīpikākāra tripāṭhi rudra upādhyāya vidyādhara ācārya paramānanda bhaṭṭa ācārya saṃmataḥ

original: aṃ keśavāya kīrtyai nama iti prayogaḥ padmapādācārya-prabhṛtīnāṃ saṃmata iti /
analyzed: aṃ keśavāya kīrtyai namaḥ iti prayogaḥ padmapāda ācārya prabhṛtīnām saṃmataḥ iti
jñātvā yathā guru sampradāyam
vyavahartavyam iti

original: atraiva nyāsa-viśeṣam āha-yādibhir iti ya-kārādyair daśabhir akṣaraiḥ saha sapta
analyzed: atra eva nyāsa viśeṣam āha ya ādibhiḥ iti yakāra ādyaiḥ daśabhiḥ akṣaraiḥ saha sapta

original: dhātūn tvag-asṛṅ-māṃsa-medo 'sthi-majja-śukrākhyān ātmane 'ntān ātmane iti śabdaḥ
analyzed: dhātūn tvak asṛj māṃsa medaḥ sthi majja śukra ākhyān ātmane ntān ātmane iti śabdaḥ

original: ante yeṣāṃ te tathā prāṇaṃ jīvaṃ krodhaṃ ca ātmane 'ntaṃ hṛdayādiṣu yathā-sthāneṣu
analyzed: ante yeṣām te tathā prāṇam jīvam krodham ca ātmane ntam hṛdaya ādiṣu yathā sthāneṣu
vinyasyet iti arthaḥ

original: prāṇaṃ śaktim ity api pāṭhāntaram // KrdC_1.24 //
analyzed: prāṇam śaktim iti api pāṭha antaram

udyat pradyotana śata rucim tapta hema avadātam

nānā ratna ullasita vividha ākalpam āpīta vastram
viṣṇum vande dara kamala kaumodakī cakra pāṇim
aham viṣṇum vande

original: kīdṛśaṃ ? udyann udayaṃ gacchan pradyotanaḥ sūryas tasya yac-chataṃ tasyeva ruci-dīptir yasya taṃ punaḥ tapteti vahni-madhya-nikṣipta-kāñcanavad  #
analyzed: kīdṛśam udyan udayam gacchan pradyotanaḥ sūryaḥ tasya yat śatam tasya iva ruci dīptiḥ yasya tam punar tapta iti vahni madhya nikṣipta kāñcana vat
gauram

original: punaḥ kīdṛśaṃ pārśva-dvandve iti dakṣiṇa-vāma-pārśva-dvaye jaladhi-sutayā lakṣmyā tathā viśva-dhātryā pṛthivyā juṣṭaṃ sevitam /
analyzed: punar kīdṛśam pārśva dvandve iti dakṣiṇa vāma pārśva dvaye jaladhisutayā lakṣmyā tathā viśva dhātryā pṛthivyā juṣṭam sevitam
punar kimbhūtam

original: nānā-vidha-ratnena śobhito nānā bahu-prakāra ākalpo bhūṣaṇaṃ yasya /
analyzed: nānāvidha ratnena śobhitaḥ nānā bahu prakāraḥ ākalpaḥ bhūṣaṇam yasya

original: āpīteti āsamyak prakāreṇa pīte vastre yasya taṃ /
analyzed: āpīta iti ā samyak prakāreṇa pīte vastre yasya tam
punar kīdṛśam

original: daraḥ śaṅkhaḥ padmaṃ kamalaṃ kaumodakī gadā cakram etāni pāṇau yasya tam /
analyzed: daraḥ śaṅkhaḥ padmam kamalam kaumodakī gadā cakram etāni pāṇau yasya tam

original: atra ūrdhvādhaḥ krameṇa vāma-bhāge śaṅkha-padme dakṣiṇa-bhāge gadā-cakre iti bodhyam // KrdC_1.25 //
analyzed: atra ūrdhva adhas krameṇa vāma bhāge śaṅkha padme dakṣiṇa bhāge gadā cakre iti bodhyam

dhyātvā evam parama pumāṃsam akṣaraiḥ

original: saubhāgyaiś ciram upabṛṃhito bhavet saḥ // Krd_1.26 //
analyzed: saubhāgyaiḥ ciram upabṛṃhitaḥ bhavet saḥ

original: evam ukta-prakāraṃ parama-pumāṃsaṃ viṣṇuṃ dhyātvā yo 'nudinaṃ pratyahaṃ keśavādi-sahitair mātṛkākāair vinyasyet sa puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam ukta prakāram parama pumāṃsam viṣṇum dhyātvā yaḥ nu dinam pratyaham keśava ādi sahitaiḥ vinyasyet sa puruṣaḥ

original: medhādibhiś ciraṃ bahu-kālam upabṛṃhita upacito bhavati medhā dhāraṇāvatī buddhiḥ
analyzed: medhā ādibhiḥ ciram bahukālam upabṛṃhitaḥ upacitaḥ bhavati medhā dhāraṇāvatī buddhiḥ

original: āyur jīvanaṃ smṛtiḥ smaraṇaṃ dhṛtir dhairyaṃ kīrtir utkṛṣṭa-karma-kathā kāntiḥ saundaryaṃ
analyzed: āyuḥ jīvanam smṛtiḥ smaraṇam dhṛtiḥ dhairyam kīrtiḥ utkṛṣṭa karma kathā kāntiḥ saundaryam

original: punar ante haritāṃ vrajaty asau // Krd_1.27 //
analyzed: punar ante haritām vrajati asau

original: yaḥ paṇḍito manuṣyaḥ amum eva vidhiṃ keśavādi-nyāsa-prakāraṃ ramā-puraḥsaraṃ śrī-bījam
analyzed: yaḥ paṇḍitaḥ manuṣyaḥ amum eva vidhim keśava ādi nyāsa prakāram ramā puraḥsaram śrī bījam

original: ādau dattvā prabhajet karoti asau pumān iha loke prathīyasīṃ mahatīṃ ramāṃ lakṣmīṃ
analyzed: ādau dattvā prabhajet karoti asau pumān iha loke prathīyasīm mahatīm ramām lakṣmīm

analyzed: samupetya prāpya punar ante avasāne haritām viṣṇu tvam vrajati prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: prakāraṃ darśayati-maḥ pūrvo yasya sa ma-pūrvaḥ /

kaḥ paraḥ yasya sa ka paraḥ
nati upetam namaḥ śabda sahitam

original: tathā ca ma-kārādi-vyutkrameṇa ka-kāra-paryantam ekaikākṣaraṃ namaḥ-pada-sahitaṃ
analyzed: tathā ca makāra ādi vyutkrameṇa kakāra paryantam ekaika akṣaram namaḥ pada sahitam

original: kṛtvā bhūyo 'nantaraṃ parāyeti-padaṃ dattvā anantaraṃ tad-āhvayaṃ teṣāṃ tattvānām

analyzed: ā dvayam vakṣyamāṇam nāma dattvā anantaram ātmane iti padam dattvā anantaram nati antam

analyzed: sakala vapuṣi sarva aṅga vyāpake jīvam prāṇam ca mantre āyojya tena nyasyatu tathā

original: iti tattva-padaṃ dattvā maṃ namaḥ parāya jīva-tattvātmane namaḥ iti kecit tat-prayogān kurvanti tan na pramāṇābhāvāt mūrti-pañjara-nyāse 'pi  #
analyzed: iti tattva padam dattvā maṃ namaḥ parāya jīva tattva ātmane namaḥ iti kecid tad prayogān kurvanti tat na pramāṇa abhāvāt mūrtipañjaranyāse pi
mūrti pada prayoga āpatteḥ
atra makara ādīnām bindu sāhityam sampradāya avagatam boddhavyam

analyzed: madhye hṛdaye matim ahaṅkāram manaḥ ca mantre āyojya tena mantrī nyasyatu tathā baṃ

atho nantaram ka mukha hṛdaya guhya aṅghriṣu pañcasu

original: sthāneṣu śabda-pūrvaṃ guṇa-samudāyaṃ śabda-sparśa-rūpa-rasa-gandhātmakaṃ mantre āyojya tena nyasyatu tathā ca naṃ namaḥ parāya rūpātmane namaḥ  #
analyzed: sthāneṣu śabda pūrvam guṇa samudāyam śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha ātmakam mantre āyojya tena nyasyatu tathā ca naṃ namaḥ parāya rūpa ātmane namaḥ  /
iti hṛdaye

original: thaṃ namaḥ parāya rasātmane namaḥ iti guhye,
analyzed: thaṃ namaḥ parāya rasa ātmane namaḥ iti guhye

original: taṃ namaḥ parāya gandhātmane namaḥ pādayor vinyasyed ity arthaḥ /

atha anantaram śrotra tvac dṛś jihvā ghrāṇa ātmakam karṇa ādi sthitam karṇa tvac dṛś jihvā ghrāṇeṣu

original: sthitaṃ yathā syāt tathā nyasyatu tathā ca ṇaṃ namaḥ parāya śrotrātmane namaḥ iti
analyzed: sthitam yathā syāt tathā nyasyatu tathā ca ṇaṃ namaḥ parāya śrotra ātmane namaḥ iti

original: śrotrayoḥ ḍhaṃ namaḥ parāya tvag-ātmane namaḥ iti tvaci,

original: ṭhaṃ namaḥ parāya jihvātmane namaḥ iti jihvāyāṃ /

analyzed: ṭaṃ namaḥ parāya ghrāṇa ātmane namaḥ iti ghrāṇayoḥ iti vinyasyet
vāc ādi iti
vāc ādi indriya vargam ātma nilayeṣu ākāśa pūrvam gaṇam

original: mūrdhyāsye hṛdaye śire caraṇayor hṛt-puṇḍarīkaṃ hṛdi /
analyzed: mūrdhya āsye hṛdaye śire caraṇayoḥ hṛd puṇḍarīkam hṛdi
bimbāni dvi ṣaṣ aṣṭa yuj daśa kalā vyāptāni sūrya uḍurāj

original: vahnīnāṃ ca yatas tu bhūta-vasum uṣyanty ākṣarair mantravit // Krd_1.30 //
analyzed: vahnīnām ca yatas tu bhūtavasum uṣyanti ākṣaraiḥ mantra vid

original: vāg-ādīndriya-vargaṃ vāk-pāṇi-pāda-pāyūpasthātmakaṃ karmendriya-pañcakaṃ mantre āyojya ātma-nilayeṣu mukha-pāṇi-pāda-pāyūpastheṣu nyasyatu
analyzed: vāc ādi indriya vargam vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upastha ātmakam karmendriya pañcakam mantre āyojya ātma nilayeṣu mukha pāṇi pāda pāyu upastheṣu nyasyatu

original: tathā ca aṃ namaḥ parāya vāg-ātmane namaḥ iti mukhe /
analyzed: tathā ca aṃ namaḥ parāya vāc ātmane namaḥ iti mukhe

original: jhaṃ namaḥ parāya pāṇy-ātmane namaḥ iti pāṇyoḥ /
analyzed: jhaṃ namaḥ parāya pāṇi ātmane namaḥ iti pāṇyoḥ

original: jaṃ namaḥ parāya pādātmane namaḥ iti pādayoḥ /
analyzed: jaṃ namaḥ parāya pāda ātmane namaḥ iti pādayoḥ

original: chaṃ namaḥ parāya pāyv-ātmane namaḥ iti pāyau /
analyzed: chaṃ namaḥ parāya pāyu ātmane namaḥ iti pāyau

original: caṃ namaḥ parāya upasthātmane namaḥ ity upasthe vinyasyed ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: caṃ namaḥ parāya upastha ātmane namaḥ iti upasthe vinyasyet iti arthaḥ

original: ākāśa-pūrvaṃ gaṇam ākāśa-vāyv-agni-jala-pṛthivy-ātmakaṃ mantre āyojya mūrdhany āsye hṛdaye śive liṅge caraṇayor nyasyatu /
analyzed: ākāśa pūrvam gaṇam ākāśa vāyu agni jala pṛthivī ātmakam mantre āyojya mūrdhani āsye hṛdaye śive liṅge caraṇayoḥ nyasyatu

original: tathā ca ṅaṃ namaḥ parāya ākāśātmane namaḥ iti śirasi /
analyzed: tathā ca ṅaṃ namaḥ parāya ākāśa ātmane namaḥ iti śirasi

original: dhaṃ namaḥ parāya vāyv-ātmane namaḥ iti mukhe /
analyzed: dhaṃ namaḥ parāya vāyu ātmane namaḥ iti mukhe

original: gaṃ namaḥ parāyāgny-ātmane namaḥ iti hṛdaye
analyzed: gaṃ namaḥ parāya agni ātmane namaḥ iti hṛdaye

original: / khaṃ namaḥ parāya jalātmane namaḥ iti liṅge /
analyzed: khaṃ namaḥ parāya jala ātmane namaḥ iti liṅge

original: kaṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ iti pādayor nyasyed ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kam namaḥ parāya pṛthivī ātmane namaḥ iti pādayoḥ nyasyet iti arthaḥ
hṛd puṇḍarīkam iti ādeḥ ayam arthaḥ

original: hṛt-puṇḍarīkaṃ tathā sūryoḍḍarād-vahnīnāṃ bimbāni sūrya-candrāgnīnāṃ maṇḍalāni trīṇi
analyzed: hṛd puṇḍarīkam tathā sūrya uḍḍarāt vahnīnām bimbāni sūrya candra agnīnām maṇḍalāni trīṇi
dvi ṣaṣ aṣṭa yuj daśa kalā vyāptāni dvādaśa ṣoḍaśa daśa kalā yuktāni yatas tu bhūta vasu muni akṣi akṣaraiḥ

original: yato ya-kārād yo bhūta-varṇaḥ pañcama-varṇaḥ śa-kāraḥ vasu-varṇo 'ṣtamārṇo ha-kāraḥ
analyzed: yatas yakārāt yaḥ bhūta varṇaḥ pañcama varṇaḥ śakāraḥ vasu varṇaḥ ṣtama arṇaḥ hakāraḥ

original: muni-varṇaḥ saptamaḥ sa-kāraḥ akṣi-varṇo dvitya-varṇo rephaḥ /
analyzed: muni varṇaḥ saptamaḥ sakāraḥ akṣi varṇaḥ dvitya varṇaḥ rephaḥ

original: etaiś ca sahitāni mantre āyojya hṛdi nyasyatu /
analyzed: etaiḥ ca sahitāni mantre āyojya hṛdi nyasyatu

original: tathā ca-śaṃ namaḥ parāya hṛt puṇḍarīkātmane namaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca śam namaḥ parāya hṛd puṇḍarīka ātmane namaḥ
haṃ namaḥ parāya dvādaśa kalā vyāpta sūrya maṇḍala ātmane namaḥ
sam namaḥ parāya ṣoḍaśa kalā vyāpta candra maṇḍala ātmane namaḥ

original: raṃ namaḥ parāya daśa-kalā-vyāpta-vahni-maṇḍalātmane namaḥ iti catuṣṭayaṃ hṛdaye nyasyatu // KrdC_1.30 //
analyzed: raṃ namaḥ parāya daśa kalā vyāpta vahni maṇḍala ātmane namaḥ iti catuṣṭayam hṛdaye nyasyatu
atha parameṣṭhi pumāṃsau viśva nivṛttī sarva hati upaniṣadam
nyaset sa lāvaḥ

original: athānantaraṃ parameṣṭhi-pumāṃsau viśva-nivṛttī sarva ity upaniṣado rahasyān ṣopara-balārṇair
analyzed: atha anantaram parameṣṭhi pumāṃsau viśva nivṛttī sarve iti upaniṣadaḥ rahasyān ṣopara bala arṇaiḥ

original: iti ṣa-kāraḥ rephasya upa samīpaṃ tena repha-samīpa-vartinau ya-kāra-la-kārau lakṣyete
analyzed: iti ṣakāraḥ rephasya upa samīpam tena repha samīpa vartinau yakāra lakārau lakṣyete

original: va-kāro la-kāraś ca etaiḥ salavakair bindu-sahitaiḥ sahitān ākāśādi-sthāne nyasyed
analyzed: vakāraḥ lakāraḥ ca etaiḥ sa lavakaiḥ bindu sahitaiḥ sahitān ākāśa ādi sthāne nyasyet

original: ākāśādi nyāsa-sthāneṣu mūrdhnyāsye hṛdaye liṅge caraṇayor nyasyet // KrdC_1.31 //
analyzed: ākāśa ādi nyāsa sthāneṣu mūrdhni āsye hṛdaye liṅge caraṇayoḥ nyasyet
atra eva viśeṣam āha vāsudevaḥ iti
vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnāḥ ca aniruddhakaḥ

original: nārāyaṇaś ca kramaśah parameṣṭhyādibhir yutaḥ // Krd_1.32 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ ca kramaśas parameṣṭhi ādibhiḥ yutaḥ

original: kramaśaḥ krameṇa parameṣṭy-ādibhiḥ sahitā vāsudevādayo nyasnīyā tathā ca ṣaṃ namaḥ parāya vāsudevāya parameṣṭhyātmane namaḥ iti śirasi /
analyzed: kramaśas krameṇa parameṣṭi ādibhiḥ sahitāḥ vāsudeva ādayaḥ tathā ca ṣaṃ namaḥ parāya vāsudevāya parameṣṭhi ātmane namaḥ iti śirasi

original: yaṃ namaḥ parāya saṅkarṣaṇāya puruṣātmane namaḥ iti mukhe,
analyzed: yam namaḥ parāya saṅkarṣaṇāya puruṣa ātmane namaḥ iti mukhe

original: laṃ namaḥ parāya pradyumnāya viśvātmane nama iti hṛdaye /
analyzed: laṃ namaḥ parāya pradyumnāya viśvātmane namaḥ iti hṛdaye

original: vaṃ namaḥ parāya aniruddhāya nivṛttyātmane nama iti liṅge,
analyzed: vaṃ namaḥ parāya aniruddhāya nivṛtti ātmane namaḥ iti liṅge
laṃ namaḥ iti hṛdaye

original: vaṃ namaḥ parāya aniruddhāya nivṛty-ātmane nama iti liṅge /
analyzed: vaṃ namaḥ parāya aniruddhāya nivṛti ātmane namaḥ iti liṅge

original: laṃ namaḥ parāya nārāyaṇāya sarvātmane nama iti caraṇayoḥ /
analyzed: laṃ namaḥ parāya nārāyaṇāya sarvātmane namaḥ iti caraṇayoḥ
vinyasyet iti arthaḥ

original: kecit tu parameṣṭhyāder anantaraṃ vāsudevādeḥ prayogaṃ kurvanti // KrdC_1.32 //
analyzed: kecid tu parameṣṭhi ādeḥ anantaram vāsudeva ādeḥ prayogam kurvanti
tatas kopa tattvam kṣarau vindu yuktam
nṛsiṃham nyaset sarva gātreṣu tad jñaḥ
krameṇa iti tattva ātmakaḥ nyāsaḥ uktaḥ
svāsāt nikṛt viśvamūrti ādiṣu syāt

original: tatas tad-anantaraṃ krameṇa gurūpadeśa-krameṇa taj-jñaḥ nṛsiṃha-bīja-jñaḥ kṣarau
analyzed: tatas tad anantaram krameṇa guru upadeśa krameṇa tad jñaḥ nṛsiṃha bīja jñaḥ kṣarau

original: kṣa-kāra-repha-au-kāra iti milita-svarūpaṃ bindu-yuktaṃ tathā kopa-tattvaṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ
analyzed: kṣakāra repha aukāraḥ iti milita svarūpam bindu yuktam tathā kopatattvam nṛsiṃham
ca mantre āyojya sarva gātreṣu nyasyet

original: tathā ca-kṣrauṃ namaḥ parāya nṛsiṃhāya kopātmane namaḥ iti sarva-gātreṣu nyasyed ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā cakṣrauṃ namaḥ parāya nṛsiṃhāya kopa ātmane namaḥ iti sarva gātreṣu nyasyet iti arthaḥ

original: tattva-nyāsam upasaṃharati ity ukta-prakāreṇa tattvātmako nyāsaḥ kathito bhavati /
analyzed: tattva nyāsam upasaṃharati iti ukta prakāreṇa tattva ātmakaḥ nyāsaḥ kathitaḥ bhavati

original: kīdṛśaḥ ? viśva-mūrty-ādiṣu sva-sānnidhya-kṛt kṛṣṇa-sānnidhya-kṛt bimbādiṣv iti kecid
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ viśvamūrti ādiṣu sva sānnidhya kṛt kṛṣṇa sānnidhya kṛt bimba ādiṣu iti kecid

original: bimbaṃ pratimā mūrtiḥ śarīram ādi-padena maṇi-mantrādi-sakalasya parigrahaḥ eteṣu
analyzed: bimbam pratimā mūrtiḥ śarīram ādi padena maṇi mantra ādi sakalasya parigrahaḥ eteṣu
hareḥ sānnidhyam karoti iti arthaḥ
kvacid martya ādiṣu iti pāṭhaḥ
etad nyāsa prayojanam āha eti kṛte iti
iti kṛtaḥ dhi kṛtaḥ bhavati dhruvam
sakala vaiṣṇava mantra japa ādiṣu
caret

original: tattvam iha japtum asau manucchati // Krd_1.34 //
analyzed: tattvam iha japtum asau manucchati

original: tattva-nyāse kṛte dhruvaṃ niścitam adhikṛto bhavati na kevalaṃ gopāla-viṣaya-mantra-kathanād atraiva api tu sakala-vaiṣṇava-mantra-japādiṣv  #
analyzed: tattva nyāse kṛte dhruvam niścitam adhikṛtaḥ bhavati na kevalam gopāla viṣaya mantra kathanāt atra eva api tu sakala vaiṣṇava mantra japa ādiṣu
api iti arthaḥ
adhunā prāṇāyāma prakāram āha pavana saṃyamanam iti

original: asau sādhakaḥ yaṃ manum iha vyavahāra-bhūmau japtum icchati amunā mantreṇa pavana-saṃyamanaṃ prāṇāyāmaṃ caratu kuryād ity arthaḥ // KrdC_1.34
analyzed: asau sādhakaḥ yam manum iha vyavahāra bhūmau japtum icchati amunā mantreṇa pavanasaṃyamanam prāṇāyāmam caratu kuryāt iti arthaḥ  /
atra eva prakāra antaram āha athavā iti
athavā akhileṣu
japa vidhiṣu mūlamantrataḥ
saṃyamanam amala dhīḥ marutaḥ
vidhinā abhyasan caratu tattva saṅkhyayā
mūlamantrataḥ mūlamantreṇa
vakṣyamāṇa daśa akṣareṇa iti kecid
vastutas tu sapta akṣara gopī jana vallabha mantreṇa tasya eva mūlamantra tvena abhidhānāt

iti kecid
puratas japasya paratas pi
vihitam atha tat trayam budhaiḥ
ṣoḍaśa yaḥ iha samācaret dineśaḥ

original: paripūyate sa khalu māsato 'ṃ haṃsaḥ // Krd_1.36 //
analyzed: paripūyate sa khalu haṃsaḥ

original: purato japādau paścāc ca tat-trayaṃ budhair vihitaṃ prāṇāyāma-trayaṃ,
analyzed: puratas japa ādau paścāt ca tat trayam budhaiḥ vihitam prāṇāyāma trayam
recaka ādi trayam iti kecid

original: etena japāṅgatvāc ca tatrādy-ante 'yaṃ darśitaḥ // KrdC_1.36 //
analyzed: etena japa aṅga tvāt ca tatra ādi ante yam darśitaḥ

original: sanātanaḥ: japasya purata ādau parataḥ ante ca iti prāṇāyāmeṣu kālaḥ /
analyzed: sanātanaḥ japasya purata ādau paratas ante ca iti prāṇāyāmeṣu kālaḥ
tat trayam prāṇāyāma trayam iti saṅkhyā

original: yo jano dinaśaḥ pratyahaṃ ṣoḍaśa-prāṇāyāmān ācaret,
analyzed: yaḥ janaḥ dinaśas pratyaham ṣoḍaśa prāṇāyāmān ācaret

original: sa māsataḥ māsenaikena aṃhasaḥ pāpāt paripūyate śuddho bhavatīti sāmānyataḥ phalam /
analyzed: sa māsataḥ māsena ekena aṃhasaḥ pāpāt paripūyate śuddhaḥ bhavati iti sāmānyatas phalam

original: paraṃ ca sarvaṃ purvaṃ likhitam eva //
analyzed: param ca sarvam purvam likhitam eva
atra eva prakāra antaram āha athavā iti
a yava aṅga janmam amunā anu su saṃyamam
sakaleṣu kṛṣṇa manu jāpa karmasu
abhyaset
tanuyāt samasta durita apahāriṇā

original: kṛtīti kṛti-cchandaso viṃśaty-akṣaratvāt sahitam ekaṃ yatra tādṛśa-sapta-kṛti-vāram /
analyzed: kṛti iti kṛti chandasaḥ viṃśati akṣara tvāt sahitam ekam yatra tādṛśa sapta kṛti vāram

original: athavā sahitāni militāni eka sapta-kṛtayaḥ ubhayatrāṣṭāviṃśati-vāram ity arthah /
analyzed: athavā sahitāni militāni eka sapta kṛtayaḥ ubhayatra aṣṭāviṃśati vāram iti

original: sarveṣu kṛṣṇa-manujāpakarmasu aṅga-janma-manunā kāma-bījena prāṇāyāmam abhyasaṃs tanuyāt /
analyzed: sarveṣu kṛṣṇa manu jāpa karmasu aṅga janma manunā kāmabījena prāṇāyāmam abhyasan tanuyāt

original: prathamam ekaṃ tataḥ sapta tato viṃśati tato 'bhyāsa-pāṭave 'ṣṭāviṃśati-vāram ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prathamam ekam tatas sapta tatas viṃśati tatas bhyāsa pāṭave ṣṭāviṃśati vāram iti arthaḥ

original: kaścit tu prathamaṃ sapta tato viṃśatis tata ekaṃ tato 'ṣṭāviṃśati-vāram abhyāsa-krameṇeti tātparyam āha tatra pramāṇaṃ sa eva praṣṭavyaḥ //
analyzed: kaścid tu prathamam sapta tatas viṃśatiḥ tatas ekam ṣṭāviṃśati vāram abhyāsa krameṇa iti tātparyam āha tatra pramāṇam saḥ eva praṣṭavyaḥ
mantra viśeṣa prāṇāyāma prakāram āha aṣṭāviṃśati iti
aṣṭāviṃśati saṅkhyam iṣṭa phala dam mantram daśa arṇam japan

original: nāyacchet pavanaṃ susaṃyata-matis tv aṣṭau daśārṇena cet /
analyzed: na āyacchet pavanam su saṃyata matiḥ tu aṣṭau daśa arṇena ced

original: abhyasyann avivāram anyam anubhir varṇānurūpaṃ japan
analyzed: abhyasyan a vivāram anyam anubhiḥ varṇa anurūpam japan

original: kuryād recaka-pūrvakam anipaṇaḥ prāṇa-prayogaṃ naraḥ // Krd_1.38 //
analyzed: kuryāt recaka pūrvakam a nipaṇaḥ prāṇa prayogam naraḥ

original: susaṃśita-matir vimala-buddhiḥ aṣṭāviṃśati-saṃkhyaṃ daśārṇaṃ daśākṣara-mantraṃ japan
analyzed: su saṃśita matiḥ vimala buddhiḥ aṣṭāviṃśati saṃkhyam daśa arṇam daśa akṣara mantram japan

original: prāyacchet prāṇāyāmaṃ kuryāt kīdṛśaṃ daśārṇam iṣṭa-phaladaṃ svābhimata-phaladaṃ tatra
analyzed: prāyacchet prāṇāyāmam kuryāt kīdṛśam daśa arṇam iṣṭa phala dam sva abhimata phala dam tatra
daśa akṣara mantrasya vāra catuṣṭayam japena recakam

original: aṣṭa-vāra-japena pūrakaṃ ṣoḍaśa-vāra-japena kumbhakaṃ kuryād iti guru-sampradāyaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭa vāra japena pūrakam ṣoḍaśa vāra japena kumbhakam kuryāt iti guru sampradāyaḥ

original: aṣṭādaśārṇe cet prāṇāyāmaḥ kriyata iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa arṇe ced prāṇāyāmaḥ kriyate iti śeṣaḥ

original: tadā ravivāraṃ dvādaśa-vāram abhyasyan prāṇāyāmaṃ kuryād iti guru-sampradāyaḥ /

analyzed: anya manubhiḥ anya mantraiḥ ced prāṇāyāmaḥ kriyate

original: tadā varṇānurūpaṃ mantra-varṇānāṃ tāratamyena japaṃ kurvan kuryāt /
analyzed: tadā varṇa anurūpam mantra varṇānām tāratamyena japam kurvan kuryāt

original: atra svalpākṣarair mantrair bahu-vāram analpākṣarair mantraiḥ svalpa-vāraṃ japed ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: atra su alpa akṣaraiḥ mantraiḥ bahu vāram analpa akṣaraiḥ mantraiḥ su alpa vāram japet iti arthaḥ
kīdṛśaḥ sādhakaḥ
recaka pūraka kumbhaka ākhya karma kuśalaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: recakasya tyāgasya pūrvakarmaṇī pūraka-kumbhake tatra nipuṇā iti rudradharaḥ /
analyzed: recakasya tyāgasya pūrva karmaṇī pūraka kumbhake tatra nipuṇāḥ iti rudradharaḥ

original: tac cintyam evam api recake naipuṇyālābhāt prapañca-sārānusāriṇo 'sya granthasya śāradā-granthānuyāyitvāc ca // KrdC_1.38 //
analyzed: tat cintyam evam api recake naipuṇya alābhāt prapañca sāra anusāriṇaḥ sya granthasya śāradā grantha anuyāyi tvāt ca
adhunā prāṇāyāma prakāram darśayati recayet mārutam iti
recayet mārutam dakṣayā dakṣiṇaḥ
pūrayet vāmayā madhyanāḍyā punar
kalā danta vidyā ākhya mātrā cyukam

original: dakṣiṇo vicakṣaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ dakṣayā dakṣiṇa-nāḍyā mārutaṃ vāyuṃ recayet tyajet tathā
analyzed: dakṣiṇaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ dakṣayā dakṣiṇa nāḍyā mārutam vāyum recayet tyajet tathā

original: vāmayā vāma-nāḍyā tyakta-vāyuṃ pūrayed madhyayā suṣumṇayā nāḍyā mārutaṃ vāyuṃ dhārayed
analyzed: vāmayā vāma nāḍyā tyakta vāyum pūrayet madhyayā suṣumṇayā nāḍyā mārutam vāyum dhārayet

original: ity ukta-prakāreṇa recakādi-trayaṃ recaka-pūraka-kumbhakākhya-tritayam īritaṃ kathitaṃ
analyzed: iti ukta prakāreṇa recaka ādi trayam recaka pūraka kumbhaka ākhya tritayam īritam kathitam
recaka ādiṣu avadhi kālam āha kalāt anta iti
kalāḥ ṣoḍaśa
dantāḥ dvātriṃśat
vidyāḥ catuḥṣaṣṭhi rūpāḥ etad saṅkhyāka mātra ātmakam iti arthaḥ
atra bhairava tripāṭhinaḥ yatra mantra gaṇanayā prāṇāyāmaḥ

original: tatra kumbhaka-kāla evoktaḥ śvāsābhyāsa-krameṇa prāṇāyāma-saṅkhyayā mantra-japaḥ kāryo nirgama-prāṇāyāme tu recakādi-gaṇanā kāryety āhuḥ /
analyzed: tatra kumbhaka kālaḥ eva uktaḥ śvāsa abhyāsa krameṇa prāṇāyāma saṅkhyayā mantra japaḥ kāryaḥ nirgama prāṇāyāme tu recaka ādi gaṇanā kāryā iti āhuḥ
mātra śabdena ca vāma aṅguṣṭhe kaniṣṭhā ādi aṅgulīnām pratyekam

original: parva-traya-sparśa-kālaḥ kathyate vāma-hastena vāma-jānu-maṇḍalasya prādakṣiṇyena sparśa-kālaś ca /
analyzed: parva traya sparśa kālaḥ kathyate vāma hastena vāma jānu maṇḍalasya prādakṣiṇyena sparśa kālaḥ ca

original: yad atra rudropādhyāyair uktaṃ yadyapy atra recakaṃ prathamam uktaṃ tad-anantaraṃ pūrakaṃ tathāpi prathamaṃ pūrakam anantaraṃ kumbhakaṃ jñeyaṃ  #
analyzed: yat atra rudra upādhyāyaiḥ uktam yadi api atra recakam prathamam uktam tad anantaram pūrakam tathā api prathamam pūrakam anantaram kumbhakam jñeyam
yatas gṛhīta ghṛtasya tyāgaḥ bhavati

original: yat punar vyatyāsena kathanaṃ tad-gopanāya evaṃ kalā-dantetyādy api vyatyāsena boddhavyam /
analyzed: yat punar vyatyāsena kathanam tad gopanāya evam kalā danta ityādi api vyatyāsena boddhavyam
iḍyā utkarṣayet vāyum iti ādi śāradā darśanāt

original: evaṃ ca gṛhīta-catur-guṇena dhāraṇaṃ tad-ardhena tyāga ity api darśitaṃ bhavatīti,
analyzed: evam ca gṛhīta caturguṇena dhāraṇam tad ardhena tyāgaḥ iti api darśitam bhavati iti

original: tan na prapañca-sārānusāriṇo granthasyāsya śāradānuyāyitvāt prapañca-sāre recakāditvasyaivoktatvāt pūrakāditvasyāṣṭāṅgayogāntarbhūta-prāṇāyāma-viṣayatvāt
analyzed: tat na prapañcasāra anusāriṇaḥ granthasya asya śārada anuyāyi tvāt prapañcasāre recaka ādi tvasya eva ukta tvāt pūraka ādi tvasya aṣṭāṅga yoga antarbhūta prāṇāyāma viṣaya tvāt

original: yad uktaṃ gṛhītasya tyāgo bhavati tatrocyate svābhāvika-vāyu-dhāraṇasyātrāpi
analyzed: yat uktam gṛhītasya tyāgaḥ bhavati tatra ucyate svābhāvika vāyu dhāraṇasya atra api
sattvāt anyathā śarīrapāta āpatteḥ

original: yad uktaṃ vyatyāsena gopanārthaṃ kathanam iti tad ayuktam /
analyzed: yat uktam vyatyāsena gopana artham kathanam iti tat ayuktam
mantra bhinnasya anuṣṭhāna bhāgasya ṛju mārgeṇa eva vaktum yukta tvāt

original: yad uktaṃ gṛhīta-caturguṇenaiva dhāraṇaṃ tad-ardhena tyāga iti tad apy ayuktaṃ pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: yat uktam gṛhīta caturguṇena eva dhāraṇam tad ardhena tyāgaḥ iti tat api ayuktam pramāṇa abhāvāt
dakṣiṇāmūrtisaṃhitāyām aṅgulī niyamaḥ pi prāṇāyāme kathitaḥ yathā
kaniṣṭhā anāmikā aṅguṣṭhaiḥ yat nāsā puṭa dhāraṇam

original: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyas tarjanī-madhyame vinā // iti // KrdC_1.39 //
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ tarjanī madhyame vinā iti

original: sanātanaḥ: tad eva krama-dīpikoktyā saṃvādayan tatraiva kiṃcid viśeṣaṃ ca darśayati-recayed iti /
analyzed: sanātanaḥ tat eva kramadīpikā uktyā saṃvādayan tatra eva kiṃcid viśeṣam ca darśayati recayet iti
dakṣayā dakṣiṇa nāḍyā
dakṣiṇaḥ vidvān janaḥ
madhya nāḍyā suṣumṇayā dhārayet
evam recaka pūraka kumbhaka ākhyam trayam syāt
recaka ādiṣu triṣu krameṇa avadhi kālam āha kalāḥ ṣoḍaśa
dantāḥ dvātriṃśat
vidyāḥ tad tad saṅkhyaka mātra ātmakam iti arthaḥ
mātrā ca vāma aṅguṣṭhena vāma kaniṣṭhā ādi aṅgulīnām pratyekam parva traya samparka kālaḥ
vāma hastena vāma jānu maṇḍalasya prādakṣiṇyena sparśa kālaḥ vā
tatra api aṅguli niyamaḥ pi uktaḥ
kaniṣṭhā anāmikā aṅguṣṭhaiḥ yat nāsā puṭa dhāraṇam

original: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyas tarjanī-madhyame vinā // iti /
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ tarjanī madhyame vinā iti

original: tatra teṣu prāṇāyāmeṣu purvaṃ recakādiṣu saṅkhyoktā /

analyzed: kāntiḥ dīptiḥ pratibhāsvara varṇa kāntiḥ iti eka padam tathā ca pratibhāsvara varṇa kāntiḥ

original: dedīpyamāna-varṇa-śobheti kaścit subhagatvaṃ samasta-lokādarakatvam eteṣāṃ kartāraṃ
analyzed: dedīpyamāna varṇa śobhā iti kaścid subhaga tvam samasta loka ādaraka tvam eteṣām kartāram
dātāram iti arthaḥ

original: punaḥ kṣubhitā samohitāṇḍa-koṭir brahmāṇḍa-koṭir yena tathā taṃ saṃsāra-mohakam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: punar kṣubhitā brahmāṇḍa koṭiḥ yena tathā tam saṃsāra mohakam iti arthaḥ
punar aṇima ādi guṇa aṣṭaka dam aṇima laghima garima mahima īśitva vaśitva prākāmya prāpti ākhya guṇa aṣṭaka pradam iti arthaḥ
punar kim bahunā

original: atra jagati akhiladaṃ samastābhīṣṭa-pradam ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.4 //
analyzed: atra jagati akhila dam samasta abhīṣṭa pradam iti arthaḥ
atha daśa akṣara mantrarājam uddharati śārṅgi iti ādinā
śārṅgī saḥ tura dantaḥ paraḥ rāma akṣi yuj dvitīya arṇam

original: śūlī saurir bālo balānuja-dvayam athākṣara-catuṣṭayam // Krd_2.5 //

analyzed: śūraturīyaḥ sa ānanaḥ āvṛttaḥ syāt su śobho ṣtamaḥ gni sakhaḥ

original: tad-dayitākṣara-yugmaṃ tad-uparigas tv evam uddharen mantram // Krd_2.6 //
analyzed: tad dayita akṣara yugmam tad upari gaḥ tu evam uddharet mantram

original: śārṅgī ga-kāraḥ kīdṛśo 'yaṃ sottaradanta uttara-danta-paṅktau nyasyamānaḥ uttara-danta o-kāras tena sahita etena prathamākṣaram uddhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: śārṅgī gakāraḥ kīdṛśaḥ yam sa uttara dantaḥ uttara danta paṅktau nyasyamānaḥ uttara dantaḥ okāraḥ tena sahitaḥ etena prathama akṣaram uddhṛtaḥ
śūraḥ pakāraḥ

original: kīdṛśo 'yaṃ vāmākṣi-yuk vāmākṣi caturtha-svaraḥ tena sahita etena dvitīyākṣaram uddhṛtam
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ yam vāma akṣi yuj vāma akṣi caturtha svaraḥ tena sahitaḥ etena dvitīya akṣaram uddhṛtam

original: akṣara-catuṣkaṃ krameṇa punaḥ kathyate śūlī ja-kāraḥ bālo ba-kāraḥ balānuja-dvayaṃ
analyzed: akṣara catuṣkam krameṇa punar kathyate śūlī jakāraḥ bālaḥ bakāraḥ balānuja dvayam

original: saṃyukta-la-kāra-dvayaṃ lla iti svarūpam ity akṣara-catuṣkam uddhṛtam śūra-turīyaḥ
analyzed: saṃyukta lakāra dvayam iti svarūpam iti akṣara catuṣkam uddhṛtam śūraturīyaḥ
śūrasya pakārasya caturthaḥ

original: kīdṛśo 'yaṃ sānana-vṛttaḥ ānana-vṛttenākāreṇa saha vartate iti sānana-vṛttaḥ ayaṃ ca saptamaḥ syād mantrasya saptamo bhavatīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ yam sa ānana vṛttaḥ ānana vṛttena ākāreṇa saha vartate iti sa ānana vṛttaḥ ayam ca saptamaḥ syāt mantrasya saptamaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
aṣṭamaḥ gni sakhaḥ vāyuḥ yakāraḥ iti yāvat

original: tathā ca mantrasyāṣṭamo varṇo ya iti boddhavyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca mantrasya aṣṭamaḥ varṇaḥ yaḥ iti boddhavyaḥ
tad uparigam

original: pūrvokta-varṇānantary-viśiṣṭaṃ tad-dayitākṣara-yugalaṃ svāheti svarūpam ity akṣara-dvayam uddhṛtam // KrdC_2.5-6 //
analyzed: pūrva ukta varṇa ānantarya viśiṣṭam tad dayita akṣara yugalam svāhā iti svarūpam iti akṣara dvayam uddhṛtam
prakāśitaḥ iti

original: prakāśito daśākṣaro manus tv ayaṃ madhu-dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: prakāśitaḥ daśa akṣaraḥ manuḥ tu ayam madhudviṣaḥ
viśeṣataḥ pada aravinda yugmam bhakti vardhanaḥ
madhudviṣaḥ śrī gopālakasya ayam daśa akṣaraḥ mantraḥ uddhṛtaḥ

original: kīdṛśo viśeṣato viśeṣeṇa padāravinda-yugma-bhakti-vardhanaḥ śrī-gopāla-kṛṣṇa-caraṇābja-yugale yā bhaktir ārādhyatvena jñānaṃ tat samṛddhikāraka  #
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ viśeṣataḥ viśeṣeṇa pada aravinda yugma bhakti vardhanaḥ śrī gopāla kṛṣṇa caraṇa abja yugale yā bhaktiḥ ārādhya tvena jñānam tat samṛddhi kāraka
iti arthaḥ
mantrasya ṛṣi ādikam darśayati nāradaḥ iti
nāradaḥ muniḥ amuṣya kīrtitaḥ
chandaḥ uktam ṛṣibhiḥ virāj iti
nanda gopa tanayaḥ samīritaḥ

original: amuṣya pūrvokta-mantrasya muniḥ ṛṣir nāradaḥ kīrtitaḥ kathitaḥ /
analyzed: amuṣya pūrva ukta mantrasya muniḥ ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ kīrtitaḥ kathitaḥ
ṛṣibhiḥ gautama ādibhiḥ virāj chandaḥ uktam
devatā nanagopa tanayaḥ śrī gopālakṛṣṇaḥ uktaḥ
kīdṛśaḥ sakala loka maṅgalaḥ sarva jana kalyāṇa hetuḥ

original: etena ṛṣy-ādīnāṃ śirasi rasanāyāṃ hṛdi krameṇa nyāsaḥ kārya iti sūcitaṃ prapañca-sāre /
analyzed: etena ṛṣi ādīnām śirasi rasanāyām hṛdi krameṇa nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ iti sūcitam prapañcasāre

original: tathā vidhānāt prayogaś ca daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrasya nārada-ṛsaye namaḥ śirasi /
analyzed: tathā vidhānāt prayogaḥ ca daśa akṣara gopāla mantrasya nārada ṛsaye namaḥ śirasi
virāj chandase namaḥ mukhe

original: śrī-gopāla-kṛṣṇāya devatāyai namaḥ hṛdi ity evambhūtaḥ /
analyzed: śrī gopālakṛṣṇāya devatāyai namaḥ hṛdi iti evambhūtaḥ
asya mantrasya nāradaḥ ṛṣiḥ

original: evaṃ chando-devatayor api yojyam iti kecit // KrdC_2.8 //
analyzed: evam chandaḥ devatayoḥ api yojyam iti kecid
adhunā asya mantrasya pañcāṅgāni darśayati aṅgāni iti ādinā
aṅgāni pañca hutabhuj dayitā sametaiḥ
cakraiḥ amuṣya mukha vṛtta viṣū upapannaiḥ
trailokya rakṣaṇa yujā api asura antaka ākhya
pūrveṇa ca iha kathitāni vibhakti yuktaiḥ
hṛdaye natiḥ śirasi pāvaka priyā
iti varmaṇi sthitam
sa phaṭ astram iti uditam aṅga pañcakam
sa caturthī vauṣaṭ uditam dṛśoḥ yadi

original: amuṣya iha śāstre aṅgāni pañca kathitāni /
analyzed: amuṣya iha śāstre aṅgāni pañca kathitāni

original: kāni tāni ? tatrāha hṛdaye natir iti /
analyzed: kāni tāni tatra āha hṛdaye natiḥ iti

original: hṛdaye natir namaḥ-padaṃ śirasi pāvaka-priyā svāheti sa-vaṣaṭ vaṣaṭ-pada-sahitā śikhety arthaḥ /
analyzed: hṛdaye natiḥ namaḥ padam śirasi pāvaka priyā svāhā iti sa vaṣaṭ vaṣaṭpada sahitā śikhā iti arthaḥ

original: hum api varmaṇi sthitaṃ varmaṇi kavace hum api padaṃ sthitam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: hum api varmaṇi sthitam varmaṇi kavace hum api padam sthitam iti arthaḥ

original: sa-phaḍ astraṃ phaṭ-pada-sahitam astram ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: sa phaṭ astram phaṭpada sahitam astram iti arthaḥ

original: ity anena prakāreṇa sa-caturthi yathā syāt tathaivam aṅga-pañcakam uditaṃ kathitaṃ caturthyā ca hṛdayādīnāṃ yogaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: iti anena prakāreṇa sa caturthi yathā syāt tathā evam aṅga pañcakam uditam kathitam caturthyā ca hṛdaya ādīnām yogaḥ kāryaḥ
kaiḥ saha cakraiḥ cakra śabdaiḥ

original: kīdṛśaiḥ ? mukha-vṛtta-visūpapannair mukha-vṛttam ā-kāraḥ vi iti su iti svarūpam
analyzed: kīdṛśaiḥ mukha vṛtta visūpapannaiḥ mukha vṛttam ākāraḥ vi iti su iti svarūpam

original: etaiḥ pratyekam upapannaiḥ sambaddhaīh trailokya-rakṣaṇa-yujāpi trailokya-rakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: etaiḥ pratyekam upapannaiḥ trailokya rakṣaṇa yujā api trailokya rakṣaṇam

original: yunaktīti tad-yug etādṛśena cakreṇa api-śabdāc cakrair iti vibhidyānvayaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: yunakti iti tad yuj etādṛśena cakreṇa apiśabdāt cakraiḥ iti vibhidya anvayaḥ kāryaḥ
tathā ca cakreṇa iti asurāntaka ākhya pūrveṇa
cakreṇa iti arthaḥ
ca samuccaye
punar kīdṛśaiḥ vibhakti yuktaiḥ

original: caturthī-yuktais tasyā eva prakṛtatvād etasyāpi padasya vibhidyānvayaḥ kāryaḥ dṛśor yadi iti yadi kvacin mantre dṛśor nyāso 'sti tadā tatra  #
analyzed: caturthī yuktaiḥ tasyāḥ eva prakṛta tvāt etasya api padasya vibhidya anvayaḥ kāryaḥ dṛśoḥ yadi iti yadi kvacid mantre dṛśoḥ nyāsaḥ sti tadā tatra
vauṣaṭ iti uditam kathitam

original: atra jvālā-cakrāyety api yojyam iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ /
analyzed: atra jvālā cakrāya iti api yojyam iti laghudīpikākāraḥ
prayogaḥ ca ā cakrāya svāhā hṛdayāya namaḥ

original: vi-cakrāya svāhā śirase svāhā su-cakrāya svāhā śikhāyai vaṣaṭ /
analyzed: vicakrāya svāhā śirase svāhā su cakrāya svāhā śikhāyai vaṣaṭ
trailokya rakṣaṇa cakrāya svāhā kavacāya hum

original: jvālā-cakrāya svāhā netra-dvayāya vauṣaṭ asurāntaka-cakrāya svāhā astrāya phaḍ iti
analyzed: jvālā cakrāya svāhā netra dvayāya vauṣaṭ asurāntaka cakrāya svāhā astrāya phaṭ iti

original: aṅgulīṣv aṅga-mantra-nyāse tu tat-tad-aṅga-mantrānte aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ namaḥ tarjanībhyāṃ
analyzed: aṅgulīṣu aṅga mantra nyāse tu tad tad aṅga mantra ante aṅguṣṭhābhyām namaḥ tarjanībhyām
svāhā iti ādi yojyam

original: āgamāntare hrīṃ aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ namaḥ hrīṃ tarjanībhyāṃ svāhā /
analyzed: āgama antare hrīṃ aṅguṣṭhābhyām namaḥ hrīṃ tarjanībhyām svāhā

original: tata ity ādi-darśanāt tenāṅguṣṭhādiṣu hṛdayāya namaḥ ity ādi-prayogāś cintyāḥ /
analyzed: tatas iti ādi darśanāt tena aṅguṣṭha ādiṣu hṛdayāya namaḥ iti ādi prayogāḥ cintyāḥ
asamaveta arthaka tvāt māna abhāvāt ca iti kecid

original: anye tu yathā-śrutāṅga-mantrasyaiva nyāsair aṅgulīṣv atideśān āhur ācyāryāḥ // KrdC_2.9-10 //
analyzed: anye tu yathāśruta aṅga mantrasya eva nyāsaiḥ aṅgulīṣu atideśān āhuḥ ācyāryāḥ
daśa aṅgāni darśayati
mantra arṇaiḥ daśabhiḥ upeta candra khaṇḍaiḥ
aṅgānām daśakam udīritam namaḥ ntam
hṛd śīrṣam tadanu śikhā tanutra mantram

original: mantrārṇair mantrākṣarir namo 'ntaṃ yathā syād evam aṅgānāṃ daśakam udīritaṃ kathitaṃ
analyzed: mantra arṇaiḥ mantra akṣariḥ namaḥ ntam yathā syāt evam aṅgānām daśakam udīritam kathitam

original: kīdṛśair upeta-candra-khaṇḍaiḥ sānusvāraiḥ sthānāny āhuḥ-hṛdayaṃ śīrṣaṃ mastakaṃ
analyzed: kīdṛśaiḥ upeta candra khaṇḍaiḥ sa anusvāraiḥ sthānāni āhuḥ hṛdayam śīrṣam mastakam

original: tat-paścāt śikhā prasiddhā tanutraṃ kavacaṃ astraṃ daśa-dikṣu pārśva-yugala-kaṭi-pṛṣṭha-mūrdha-sahitaṃ
analyzed: tad paścāt śikhā prasiddhā tanutram kavacam astram daśa dikṣu pārśva yugala kaṭi pṛṣṭha mūrdha sahitam

kaṭiḥ nābheḥ adhas iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: prayogas tu goṃ hṛdayāya nama iti pīṃ śirase svāhā ity ādi // KrdC_2.11 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu goṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ iti pīm śirase svāhā iti ādi

sa pradyumnaḥ bījam etat pradiṣṭam

original: asya mantrasya pūrvoktasya sa-śakti-śakty-ādi-sahitaṃ bījaṃ vakṣye bījam āha-cakrīti ka-kāraḥ /
analyzed: asya mantrasya pūrva uktasya sa śakti śakti ādi sahitam bījam vakṣye bījam āha cakrī iti kakāraḥ
kīdṛśaḥ yam śakrī śakraḥ lakāraḥ tad yuktaḥ
punar kīdṛśaḥ
vāmanetra pradīptaḥ vāmanetram caturtha svaraḥ tad sahitaḥ
punar kīdṛśaḥ

original: sa-pradyumnaḥ pradyumno binduḥ tat-sahitaḥ tathā cakrīm iti siddhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sa pradyumnaḥ pradyumnaḥ binduḥ tad sahitaḥ tathā cakrīm iti siddham bhavati
etat asya bījam pradiṣṭam kathitam

original: ayam eva prādyumno mantra ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva prādyumnaḥ mantraḥ iti arthaḥ
kimbhūtaḥ jagat mohanaḥ viśva vaśyā karaḥ
śaktim āha haṃsaḥ iti

proktā śaktiḥ sarva gīrvāṇa vṛndaiḥ

original: kimbhūtaḥ ? medo va-kāraḥ vaktra-vṛttam ā-kāraḥ ābhyām upetaḥ sambaddhaḥ tathā pautrī ha-kāraḥ /
analyzed: kimbhūtaḥ medaḥ vakāraḥ vaktra vṛttam ākāraḥ ābhyām upetaḥ sambaddhaḥ tathā pautrī hakāraḥ
kimbhūtaḥ netra ādiḥ ākāraḥ tena anvitaḥ

original: tathā ca svāheti siddham asau yugārṇo varṇa-dvayātmikā śaktiḥ proktā tatheyaṃ vahner vallabhā kimbhūtā kāmadā ākāṅkṣita-pradā /
analyzed: tathā ca svāhā iti siddham asau yuga arṇaḥ varṇa dvaya ātmikā śaktiḥ proktā tathā iyam vahneḥ vallabhā kimbhūtā kāma dā ākāṅkṣita pradā

original: kathambhūtasya vahner gīrvāṇa-vṛndair vandyasya sarvadeva-samūhaiḥ pūjyasya // KrdC_2.13 //
analyzed: kathambhūtasya vahneḥ gīrvāṇa vṛndaiḥ vandyasya sarva deva samūhaiḥ pūjyasya

vinyogasya mantrasya puruṣa artha catuṣṭaye

original: kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛtir ity ukto durgādhiṣṭhātṛ-devatā // Krd_2.14 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇam prakṛtiḥ iti uktaḥ durgā adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā

original: asya mantrasya puruṣārtha-catuṣṭaya-sādhanāya viniyoga ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: asya mantrasya puruṣa artha catuṣṭaya sādhanāya viniyogaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: prakṛtir mūla-kāraṇaṃ mantrotpādakaḥ mantra-svarūpa ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ mūla kāraṇam mantra utpādakaḥ mantra svarūpaḥ iti arthaḥ
adhiṣṭhātṛ devatām āha durgā adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā iti
mantra artham āha gopāyati iti ādinā

original: gopāyeti sakalam idaṃ gopāyati paraṃ pumāṃsam iti gopī /
analyzed: gopāya iti sakalam idam gopāyati param pumāṃsam iti gopī

original: prakṛtes tasyā jātaṃ jana iti nadādikaṃ pṛthivy-antam // Krd_2.15 //
analyzed: prakṛteḥ tasyāḥ jātam janaḥ iti nada ādikam pṛthivī antam

analyzed: idam sakalam nāma rūpābhyām vyākṛtam jagat gopāyati rakṣati tad kāraṇa tvāt svārthe āyaḥ

original: tathā paraṃ pumāṃsaṃ nitya-śuddha-buddham uktānandādvayātmakaṃ brahma-svarūpaṃ gopāyati
analyzed: tathā param pumāṃsam nitya śuddha buddham ukta ānanda advaya ātmakam brahma svarūpam gopāyati

original: gup gopana-kutsanayoḥ ajñātatvena viṣayīkarotīti vyutpattyā mahad-ādi-pṛthivy-antaṃ
analyzed: gup gopana kutsanayoḥ ajñāta tvena viṣayīkaroti iti vyutpattyā mahat ādi pṛthivī antam

original: mahat-tattvādi-pṛthivī-paryantaṃ sakalaṃ kārya-jātaṃ jana ucyate // KrdC_2.15 //
analyzed: mahat tattva ādi pṛthivī paryantam sakalam kārya jātam janaḥ ucyate

original: vallabha ity upadiṣṭaṃ sāndrānandaṃ nirañjanaṃ jyotiḥ // Krd_2.16 //

analyzed: svāhā iti ātmānam gamayāmi iti atejase tasmai

original: yaḥ kārya-kāraṇeśaḥ paramātmety acyutaikatāsya manoḥ // Krd_2.17 //
analyzed: yaḥ kārya kāraṇa īśaḥ paramātmā iti acyuta ekatā asya manoḥ

analyzed: anayoḥ gopī janayoḥ avidyā tad kāryayoḥ samīraṇāt antaryāmi tvena svasya kārye preraṇāt

original: niyamanādi iti yāvad āśrayatvato adhiṣṭhātṛtvena vyāptyā vyāpakatvena vallabhaḥ svāmīty
analyzed: niyamana ādi iti yāvat āśraya tvataḥ adhiṣṭhātṛ tvena vyāptyā vyāpaka tvena vallabhaḥ svāmī iti

param jyotiḥ brahma caitanyam

original: nirañjanaṃ māyā-kāluṣya-rahitaṃ svāheti tasmai sva-tejase sva-prakāśa-cid-rūpāya
analyzed: nirañjanam māyā kāluṣya rahitam svāhā iti tasmai sva tejase sva prakāśa cit rūpāya

original: paramātmane svātmānaṃ jīvaika-svarūpaṃ gamayāmi samarpayāmi tad-ātmakatāṃ prāpayāmīti svāhā-śabdārthaḥ /
analyzed: paramātmane sva ātmānam jīva eka svarūpam gamayāmi samarpayāmi tad ātmaka tām prāpayāmi iti svāhā śabda arthaḥ
prathamaḥ iti śabdaḥ svāhā śabda upasthāpakaḥ
tasmai kasmai tatra ahaye iti

original: yaḥ kārya-kāraṇayor jana-prakṛtyor īśaḥ svāmī adhiṣṭhātā tathā paramātmā nirupādhi-caitanyatvāc cety
analyzed: yaḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ jana prakṛtyoḥ īśaḥ svāmī adhiṣṭhātā tathā paramātmā nirupādhi caitanya tvāt ca iti
anena prakāreṇa asya upāsakasya acyuta ekatā acyutena saha abhinna tā bhavati
prakāra antareṇa artham āha athavā iti
athavā gopī janaḥ iti samasta jagat vana śakti samudāyaḥ

original: tasya svānanyasya svāmī vallabha iti ha nirdiṣṭaḥ // Krd_2.18 //
analyzed: tasya sva ananyasya svāmī vallabhaḥ iti ha nirdiṣṭaḥ

original: athavā gopījana iti śabdena sakala-viśva-rakṣaṇa-śakti-samudāyaḥ kathyate /
analyzed: athavā gopī janaḥ iti śabdena sakala viśva rakṣaṇa śakti samudāyaḥ kathyate
tatra gopī padena śaktiḥ ucyate
janapadena tasyāḥ samūhaḥ

original: tasya śakti-samūhasya svānanyasya svābhinnasya śakti-śaktimator abheda-vivakṣayā svāmī niyantā āśrayo vallabha iti hasya sphuṭaṃ nirdiṣṭa udita  #
analyzed: tasya śakti samūhasya sva ananyasya sva abhinnasya śakti śaktimatoḥ abheda vivakṣayā svāmī niyantā āśrayaḥ vallabhaḥ iti hasya sphuṭam nirdiṣṭaḥ udita
iti arthaḥ
svāhā śabda arthaḥ tu pūrva uktaḥ eva boddhavyaḥ

original: laghu-dīpikā-kāras tu-avana-śakti-samudāyaḥ avanaṃ sthitiḥ tatra kāraṇa-bhūtānāṃ śaktīnāṃ samudāyaḥ samūhaḥ jagat-pāliny-ādi-gaṇaḥ /
uktaṃ ca mahadbhiḥ jagat-pālinīty ādyāḥ proktās tāḥ sthitaye kalā iti tasya svāmī nāyaka ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.18 //
analyzed: uktam ca mahadbhiḥ jagatpālinī iti ādyāḥ proktāḥ tāḥ sthitaye kalāḥ iti tasya svāmī nāyakaḥ iti arthaḥ
prakāra antareṇa artham āha athavā iti

original: athavā vraja-yuvatīnāṃ dayitāya juhomi māṃ madīyam
analyzed: athavā vraja yuvatīnām dayitāya juhomi mām madīyam

original: apīty arpayet samastaṃ brahmaṇi sugaṇe samasta-sampattyai // Krd_2.19 //
analyzed: api iti arpayet samastam brahmaṇi su gaṇe samasta sampattyai

original: gopī-jano gopāṅganā-janas tasya vallabho niratiśaya-prema-viṣayaḥ tasmai vraja-yuvatīnāṃ gopa-ramaṇīnāṃ dayitāya hṛdayānanda-dāyine svāhā juhomi
analyzed: gopī janaḥ gopa aṅganā janaḥ tasya vallabhaḥ niratiśaya prema viṣayaḥ tasmai vraja yuvatīnām gopa ramaṇīnām dayitāya hṛdaya ānanda dāyine svāhā juhomi

original: kiṃ māṃ svātmānaṃ madīyam api ātmīya-suhṛd-ādikam api ity anena prakāreṇa sa-guṇe brahmaṇi saṃsāra-pravartake parameśvareśvare sarvaṃ samarpayet
analyzed: kim mām sva ātmānam madīyam api ātmīya suhṛd ādikam api iti anena prakāreṇa saguṇe brahmaṇi saṃsāra pravartake parameśvara īśvare sarvam samarpayet
kim artham samasta sampattyai sarva aiśvaryāya

original: aṣṭādaśākṣara-mantroddhārāya tad-antarbhūtau kṛṣṇa-govinda-śabdau prathamato vivicya darśayati-kṛṣ-śabda iti /
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa akṣara mantra uddhārāya tad antarbhūtau kṛṣṇa govinda śabdau prathamatas vivicya darśayati   śabdaḥ iti
kṛṣ śabdaḥ sattā arthaḥ
ṇaḥ ca ānanda ātmakaḥ tatas kṛṣṇaḥ
bhakta agha karṣaṇāt api
tad varṇa tvāt ca mantra maya vapuṣaḥ
go śabda vācaka tvāt jñānam
tena upalabhyate govindaḥ
vetti iti śabdarāśim govindo
go vicāranāt api ca
kṛṣ śabdaḥ sattā arthaḥ
tatra śaktaḥ

original: kṛṣ sattāyām ity atra kvib-antaḥ sattā-vācaka iti kāścit /
analyzed: sattāyām iti atra kvip antaḥ sattā vācakaḥ iti kāścid

original: kṛṭ ṇaś ca ṇa-kāraś ca ānandātmaka ānanda-vācī /
analyzed: kṛṭ ṇaḥ ca ṇakāraḥ ca ānanda ātmakaḥ ānanda vācī

original: nanda ānanda iti dhātor eka-deśa-grahaṇād iti kaścit /
analyzed: nandaḥ ānandaḥ iti dhātoḥ eka deśa grahaṇāt iti kaścid

original: tato dvandve kṛte 'trādarśaṃ ādyaci-kṛte ca kṛṣṇaḥ sad-ānanda ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tatas dvandve kṛte ca kṛṣṇaḥ sadānandaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: prakārāntareṇa kṛṣṇa-śabdaṃ vyutpādayati bhakteti bhaktānām agha-karṣaṇāt pāpa-parimārjanāt kṛṣṇa ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prakāra antareṇa kṛṣṇa śabdam vyutpādayati bhakta iti bhaktānām agha karṣaṇāt pāpa parimārjanāt kṛṣṇaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: bhaktādi-karṣaṇād iti pāṭhe ādi-śabdenābhakta-grahaṇaṃ bhaktasya karṣaṇaṃ sva-sthāna-nayanam abhaktasya karṣaṇaṃ naraka-nayanam ity arthaḥ
analyzed: bhakta ādi karṣaṇāt iti pāṭhe ādi śabdena abhakta grahaṇam bhaktasya karṣaṇam sva sthāna nayanam abhaktasya karṣaṇam naraka nayanam iti arthaḥ
prakāra antareṇa vyutpattim āha tad varṇa iti

original: kṛṣṇa-varṇa-śarīratvāt kṛṣṇaḥ mantramaya-śarīrasya vācya-vācakayor abhedena vivakṣayā /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa varṇa śarīra tvāt kṛṣṇaḥ mantra maya śarīrasya vācya vācakayoḥ abhedena vivakṣayā
go iti ādi
gauḥ jñānam

original: go-śabdasya vācakatvāt jñāna-vācakatvāt tena jñānenopalabhyate prāpyate jñāyate iti govindaḥ /
analyzed: go śabdasya vācaka tvāt jñāna vācaka tvāt tena jñānena upalabhyate prāpyate jñāyate iti govindaḥ

original: vid lābhe ity asya dhātoḥ prakārāntaram āha-vettīti /
analyzed: vid lābhe iti asya dhātoḥ prakāra antaram āha vetti iti
go śabdaḥ śabda vācī
vid jñāne dhātuḥ

original: gāṃ śabda-rāśiṃ śabda-samudāyaṃ mātṛkāṃ vettīti govindaḥ /
analyzed: gām śabda rāśim śabda samudāyam mātṛkām vetti iti govindaḥ

original: athavā gāva indriyāṇi teṣāṃ vicāraṇād viśeṣeṣu prati-niyata-viṣayeṣu pravartanād govindaḥ /
analyzed: athavā gāvaḥ indriyāṇi teṣām vicāraṇāt viśeṣeṣu pratiniyata viṣayeṣu pravartanāt govindaḥ
athavā gāvaḥ paśu viśeṣāḥ iti

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ-paśavo div-pādaś catuṣpādaś ca iti /
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ paśavaḥ div pādaḥ catuṣpādaḥ ca iti

original: teṣāṃ viśeṣeṣu puṇya-pāpeṣu cāraṇāt pravartanād govindaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām viśeṣeṣu puṇya pāpeṣu cāraṇāt pravartanāt govindaḥ

original: athavā, gāvaḥ paśu-viśeṣāḥ teṣāṃ rakṣanād govindaḥ /
analyzed: athavā gāvaḥ paśu viśeṣāḥ teṣām rakṣanāt govindaḥ
api śabdaḥ ca arthe
idānīm mantram uddharati
ete bhikhye nu kramataḥ tūrya vibhaktyā

original: ete abhikhye nāmanī kṛṣṇa-govindākhye anukrameṇa turya-vibhaktyā pratyekaṃ caturthī-vibhaktyā
analyzed: ete abhikhye nāmanī kṛṣṇa govinda ākhye anukrameṇa turya vibhaktyā pratyekam caturthī vibhaktyā

original: saha mantrāt pūrvokta-daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrād ādau manmatha-bījāt paścāt kāma-bījānantaram
analyzed: saha mantrāt pūrva ukta daśa akṣara gopāla mantrāt ādau manmatha bījāt paścāt kāma bīja anantaram

original: atha ced yadi syātāṃ bhavataḥ tadā eṣo 'ṣṭādaśārṇo mantra-śreṣṭho bhavati /
analyzed: atha ced yadi syātām bhavataḥ tadā eṣaḥ u ṣṭādaśa arṇaḥ mantra śreṣṭhaḥ bhavati

original: etasya balād eva daśākṣare 'pi kāma-bīja-sāhityaṃ kecid icchanti /
analyzed: etasya balāt eva daśa akṣare kāma bīja sāhityam kecid icchanti
kīdṛśaḥ guhyāt guhyaḥ
guhyāt api guhyaḥ
punar kīdṛśaḥ
vāñchitasya cintā mātreṇa abhīṣṭa pradaḥ iti arthaḥ
ṛṣi ādikam api āha pūrvā iti

original: pūrva-pradiṣṭe muni-devate 'sya chandas tu gāyatram uśanti santaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva pradiṣṭe muni devate sya chandaḥ tu gāyatram uśanti santaḥ

original: aṅgāni mantrārṇa-catuṣkair varmāvasānāni yugārṇam astram // Krd_2.23 //
analyzed: aṅgāni mantra arṇa catuṣkaiḥ varma avasānāni yuga arṇam astram

original: asya mantrasya pūrva-pradiṣṭe prathama-mantra-sambandhitayā kathite muni-devate boddhavye /
analyzed: asya mantrasya pūrva pradiṣṭe prathama mantra sambandhi tayā kathite muni devate boddhavye
punar santaḥ gāyatra chandaḥ uśanti vadanti

original: aṅgānīti mantrārṇa-catuś catuṣkair mantra-sambandhi-varṇānāṃ caturbhiś caturbhir akṣaraiḥ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśākṣarair varmāvasānāni kavacāntāni catvāry  #
analyzed: aṅgāni iti mantra arṇa catuḥ catuṣkaiḥ mantra sambandhi varṇānām caturbhiḥ caturbhiḥ akṣaraiḥ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśa akṣaraiḥ varma avasānāni kavaca antāni catvāri
aṅgāni bhavanti

analyzed: avaśiṣṭam yuga arṇam varṇa dvayam astra ākhyam aṅgam bhavati

analyzed: prayogaḥ caklīṃ kṛṣṇāya hṛdayāya namaḥ govindāya śirase svāhā

analyzed: bījam śaktiḥ prakṛtiḥ viniyogaḥ ca api pūrvavat amuṣya

original: pūrvatarasya manorathaṃ kathayāmi nyāsam akhila-siddhi-karam // Krd_2.24 //
analyzed: pūrvatarasya manoratham kathayāmi nyāsam akhila siddhi karam

original: amuṣyāsya mantrasya bījaṃ śaktiḥ prakṛtir viniyogaḥ pūrva-mantre yāni bījādīni kathitāni tāny atrāpi jñātavyānīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: amuṣya asya mantrasya bījam śaktiḥ prakṛtiḥ viniyogaḥ pūrva mantre yāni bīja ādīni kathitāni tāni atra api jñātavyāni iti arthaḥ

original: pūrvatarasyeti athānantaraṃ pūrvatarasya manor daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrasyākhila-siddhi-karaṃ samasta-siddhi-dāyakaṃ nyāsaṃ kathayāmīti pratijñā
analyzed: pūrvatarasya iti atha anantaram pūrvatarasya manoḥ daśa akṣara gopāla mantrasya akhila siddhi karam samasta siddhi dāyakam nyāsam kathayāmi iti pratijñā
adhunā nyāsa kramam daśārṇasya kathayati vyāpayya iti
vyāpayya arthaḥ hastayoḥ mantram

nyāsaḥ varṇaiḥ tāra yugma antara sthaiḥ

original: atho 'nantaraṃ budhena paṇḍitena varṇair mūla-mantrākṣarair nyāso vidheyaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: atho nantaram budhena paṇḍitena varṇaiḥ mūlamantra akṣaraiḥ nyāsaḥ vidheyaḥ kāryaḥ

original: kiṃ kṛtvā ? mūla-mantraṃ hastayor antar madhye tathā hastayor eva bāhye pṛṣṭhe tathā hastayor eva pārśve vyāpayya vyāpakatayā vinyasyety arthaḥ
analyzed: kim kṛtvā mūlamantram hastayoḥ antar madhye tathā hastayoḥ eva bāhye pṛṣṭhe tathā hastayoḥ eva pārśve vyāpayya vyāpaka tayā vinyasya iti arthaḥ

tāra ruddham praṇava puṭitam

punar kīdṛśaiḥ

original: bindūttaṃsair binduḥ śiro 'laṅkāro yeṣāṃ te tathā sānusvārair ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: bindu uttaṃsaiḥ binduḥ śiraḥ laṅkāraḥ yeṣām te tathā sa anusvāraiḥ iti arthaḥ
punar kīdṛśaiḥ

original: hārda-hṛdyair hārdena namaḥ-padena hṛdyair manojñaiḥ sahitair ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: hārda hṛdyaiḥ hārdena namaḥpadena hṛdyaiḥ manojñaiḥ sahitaiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: prayogaś ca-oṃ goṃ oṃ namaḥ dakṣāṅguṣṭha-parva-traye oṃ pīṃ oṃ namaḥ tarjanyām ity ādi /
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca om goṃ om namaḥ dakṣa aṅguṣṭha parva traye om pīṃ om namaḥ tarjanyām iti ādi

original: oṃ llaṃ oṃ namo vāma-kaniṣṭhikāyām ity ādi // KrdC_2.25 //
analyzed: om llaṃ om namaḥ vāma kaniṣṭhikāyām iti ādi
ukta varṇa nyāsa sthānam āha śākhāsu iti ādinā

original: śākhāsu trīṇi parvāṇy adhi daśasu pṛthag-dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭha-pūrvaṃ
analyzed: śākhāsu trīṇi parvāṇi adhi daśasu pṛthak dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭha pūrvam

original: vāmāṅgaṣṭhāvasānaṃ nyasatu vimala-dhīḥ sṛṣṭir uktā karasthā /
analyzed: vāma aṅgaṣṭha avasānam nyasatu vimala dhīḥ sṛṣṭiḥ uktā kara sthā
aṅguṣṭha dvandva pūrvā sthitiḥ ubhaya kare saṃhṛtiḥ vāma pūrvā

original: dakṣāṅguṣṭhāntikaitat trayam api sṛjati sthity-upetaṃ ca kāryam // Krd_2.26 //
analyzed: dakṣa aṅguṣṭha antikā etat trayam api sṛjati sthiti upetam ca kāryam

original: daśasu śākhāsu aṅgulīṣu pṛthak kṛtvaikaṃ trīṇi parvāṇi adhi parva-trayaṃ vyāpya,
analyzed: daśasu śākhāsu aṅgulīṣu pṛthak kṛtvā ekam trīṇi parvāṇi adhi parva trayam vyāpya

original: tripāṭhinas tu trīṇi parvāṇi iti parva-traye adhīti upari aṅguly-agre ca pṛthag ekaikaśaḥ /
analyzed: tripāṭhinaḥ tu trīṇi parvāṇi iti parva traye adhi iti upari aṅguli agre ca pṛthak ekaikaśas

original: tathā ca prathama-parvaṇi oṃ dvitīye oṃ tṛtīye oṃ aṅguly-agre namaḥ iti evam anyatrāpīty āhuḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca prathama parvaṇi om dvitīye om tṛtīye om aṅguli agre namaḥ iti evam anyatra api iti āhuḥ

original: dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭha-pūrvaṃ prathama-nyāsādau yathā syāt tathā vāmāṅgaṣṭhāvasānaṃ vāmāṅgaṣṭho 'vasāne nyāsānte yathā syād evaṃ viśada-dhīr vimala-buddhīr  #
analyzed: dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭha pūrvam prathama nyāsa ādau yathā syāt tathā vāma aṅgaṣṭha avasānam vāma aṅgaṣṭhaḥ vasāne nyāsa ante yathā syāt evam viśada dhīḥ vimala buddhīḥ
nyasatu

original: evaṃ ca karasthā sṛṣṭir uktā kare sṛṣṭi-nyāsa-prakāra ukta ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca kara sthā sṛṣṭiḥ uktā kare sṛṣṭi nyāsa prakāraḥ uktaḥ iti arthaḥ
aṅguṣṭha dvandva pūrvā sthitiḥ ubhaya kare hasta dvaye dakṣiṇa kare ṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhāsu

original: vinyasya vāma-kare 'py aṅguṣṭhādika-niṣṭhāsv aṅguliṣu nyased ayaṃ sthiti-nyāsa uktaḥ / saṃhṛtir
analyzed: vinyasya vāma kare pi aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhāsu aṅguliṣu nyaset ayam sthiti nyāsaḥ uktaḥ saṃhṛtiḥ

original: vāma-pūrvā dakṣeti saṃhṛtiḥ saṃhāraḥ vāmāṅguṣṭha-pūrvā dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhāvasānā ayaṃ ca saṃhāra-nyāsa uktaḥ /
analyzed: vāma pūrvā dakṣā iti saṃhṛtiḥ saṃhāraḥ vāma aṅguṣṭha pūrvā dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭha avasānā ayam ca saṃhāra nyāsaḥ uktaḥ

original: etat trayam api sṛṣṭi-sthiti-saṃhārātmakaṃ trayam api sṛjati sthity-upetaṃ kāryaṃ ca sṛṣṭy-ādi-nyāsa-pañcakaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.26
analyzed: etat trayam api sṛṣṭi sthiti saṃhāra ātmakam trayam api sṛjati sthiti upetam kāryam ca sṛṣṭi ādi nyāsa pañcakam kāryam iti arthaḥ
tatas iti
tatas sthiti kramāt budhaḥ daśa aṅgakāni vinyaset

original: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ tathā vidhiḥ samīritaḥ kare // Krd_2.27 //
analyzed: tad aṅga pañcakam tathā vidhiḥ samīritaḥ kare

original: tatas tad-anantaraṃ sthiti-kramāt sthiti-nyāsa-krameṇa daśasv aṅgulīṣu budhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ daśāṅgakāni pūrvokta-mantra-daśāṅgāni vinyaset /
analyzed: tatas tad anantaram sthiti kramāt sthiti nyāsa krameṇa daśasu aṅgulīṣu budhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ daśa aṅgakāni pūrva ukta mantra daśa aṅgāni vinyaset

original: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ tatheti tathā tena prakāreṇa sthiti-krameṇa tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ purvokta-pañcakaṃ pūrvoktāṅga-pañcakaṃ daśasu aṅgulīṣu vinyaset
analyzed: tad aṅga pañcakam tathā iti tathā tena prakāreṇa sthiti krameṇa tad aṅga pañcakam purva ukta pañcakam pūrva ukta aṅga pañcakam daśasu aṅgulīṣu vinyaset
karanyāsa jātam upasaṃharati vidhiḥ iti

original: evaṃ cāyaṃ vidhiḥ prakāraḥ kare hasta-dvaye samīritaḥ kathita ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.27 //
analyzed: evam ca ayam vidhiḥ prakāraḥ kare hasta dvaye samīritaḥ kathitaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: mātṛkā-nyāsa-viśeṣaṃ darśayan tattva-nyāsaṃ ca krameṇāha-puṭitair iti /
analyzed: mātṛkā nyāsa viśeṣam darśayan tattva nyāsam ca krameṇa āha puṭitaiḥ iti
puṭitaiḥ manunā atha mātṛ arṇaiḥ
abhivinyasya sa bindubhiḥ purovat
aṇu saṃhṛti sṛṣṭi mārga bhedāt
daśa tattvāni ca mantra varṇa bhāñji

original: athāntara-manunā daśārṇena puṭitair mātṛkākṣaraiḥ sa-bindubhiḥ sānusvāraiḥ purovat
analyzed: atha antara manunā daśa arṇena puṭitaiḥ mātṛkā akṣaraiḥ sa bindubhiḥ sa anusvāraiḥ purovat

original: pūrvavad yathā pūrvaṃ lalāṭādiṣu nyāsa evam abhivinyasya anu paścān mātṛkā-nyāsa-viśeṣa-karaṇānantaraṃ
analyzed: pūrvavat yathā pūrvam lalāṭa ādiṣu nyāse evam abhivinyasya anu paścāt mātṛkā nyāsa viśeṣa karaṇa anantaram
vakṣyamāṇāni daśa tattvāni vinyaset
kīdṛśāni mantra varṇa bhāñji mantra akṣara yuktāni
katham daśa tattvāni vinyaset

original: tatrāha-saṃhṛti-sṛṣṭi-mārga-bhedāt prathamaṃ saṃhāra-krameṇa tad-anantaraṃ sṛṣṭi-krameṇety arthaḥ // KrdC_2.28 //
analyzed: tatra āha saṃhṛti sṛṣṭi mārga bhedāt prathamam saṃhāra krameṇa tad anantaram sṛṣṭi krameṇa iti arthaḥ
saṃhāra sṛṣṭi prakāram darśayati saṃhṛtau iti
saṃhṛtau anagataḥ manu varyaḥ
sṛṣṭi vartmani bhavet pratiyātaḥ
uddhṛtiḥ khalu purā ukta vat eṣām
nyāsa karma kathayāmi adhunā aham

original: asau manu-varyaḥ manu-śreṣṭhaḥ saṃhṛtau saṃhāra-nyāse anugato yathaivāsti tathaiva sṛṣṭi-mārge sṛṣṭi-kara-nyāse pratiyāto bhavet tad-viparīto  #
analyzed: asau manu varyaḥ manu śreṣṭhaḥ saṃhṛtau saṃhāra nyāse anugataḥ yathā eva asti tathā eva sṛṣṭi mārge sṛṣṭi kara nyāse pratiyātaḥ bhavet tad viparītaḥ
bhavet
uddhāra prakāram āha auddhṛtiḥ iti

original: eṣāṃ tattvānāṃ khalu niścayena uddhṛtir uddhāraḥ pūrvoktavad yathā pūrvam ukta-tattva-nyāse /
analyzed: eṣām tattvānām khalu niścayena uddhṛtiḥ uddhāraḥ pūrva ukta vat yathā pūrvam ukta tattva nyāse

original: naty-upetaṃ bhūyaḥ parāya ca tad-āhvayam ātmane ca naty-antam uddharatu tattva-manūn krameṇa iti prakāreṇety arthaḥ /
analyzed: nati upetam bhūyas parāya ca tad āhvayam ātmane ca nati antam uddharatu tattva manūn krameṇa iti prakāreṇa iti arthaḥ

original: adhunā nyāsaṃ kathayāmīti sāmprataṃ nyāsa-sambandhi-tattva-nāma-kathanaṃ tat-sthāna-kathanaṃ ca karomīty arthaḥ // KrdC_2.29 //
analyzed: adhunā nyāsam kathayāmi iti sāmpratam nyāsa sambandhi tattva nāma kathanam tad sthāna kathanam ca karomi iti arthaḥ
tattva nāmāni āhamahi iti
mahī salila pāvaka anila viyanti garvaḥ mahān

original: punaḥ prakṛti-puruṣau para imāni tattvāny atha /
analyzed: punar prakṛti puruṣau paraḥ imāni tattvāni atha

original: padāndhu-hṛdayāsyakāny adhi tu pañca madhye dvayaṃ
analyzed: pada andhu hṛdaya āsyakāni adhi tu pañca madhye dvayam

original: trayaṃ sakala-gaṃ tato nyasatu tad-viparyāsataḥ // Krd_2.30 //
analyzed: trayam sakala gam tatas nyasatu tad viparyāsataḥ

hṛdaye

original: adhi saptamy-arthe madhye hṛdaye tattva-dvayaṃ trayaṃ sakala-gaṃ sakalāṅga-vyāpakaṃ tatas tad-anantaraṃ tad-viparyāsataḥ ukta-saṃhāra-viparīta-rītyā  #
analyzed: adhi saptamī arthe madhye hṛdaye tattva dvayam trayam sakala gam sakala aṅga vyāpakam tatas tad anantaram tad viparyāsataḥ ukta saṃhāra viparīta rītyā
nyasatu

original: prayogaś ca-oṃ goṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ iti pāda-dvaye ity ārabhya oṃ
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca om goṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivī ātmane namaḥ iti pāda dvaye iti ārabhya om

original: hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane namaḥ ity antaḥ saṃhāraḥ oṃ hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane
analyzed: hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane namaḥ iti antar saṃhāraḥ om hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane
namaḥ iti ārabhya om

original: goṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ pāda-dvaye iti sṛṣṭi-nyāsaḥ /

mahat ahaṅkārau hṛdi ākāśaḥ śirasi

original: kecit tu tattva-padāntar-bhāvena nyāsam icchanti tac cintyam // KrdC_2.30 //

analyzed: guptatamaḥ yam iti
guptatamaḥ yam nyāsaḥ samproktaḥ tattva daśaka parikptaḥ

original: kāryo 'nyṣv api sadbhir gopāla-manuṣu jhaṭiti phala-siddhyai // Krd_2.31 //
analyzed: kāryaḥ api sadbhiḥ gopāla manuṣu jhaṭiti phala siddhyai

original: ayaṃ proktaḥ kathito nyāsaḥ sadbhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ anyeṣv api gopāla-mantreṣu uddhṛta-daśākṣara-vyatirikteṣv api kāryaḥ /
analyzed: ayam proktaḥ kathitaḥ nyāsaḥ sadbhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ anyeṣu api gopāla mantreṣu uddhṛta daśa akṣara vyatirikteṣu api kāryaḥ
kīdṛśaḥ guhyatamaḥ atiśayena guptaḥ
punar kīdṛśaḥ

original: tattva-daśaka-parikptaḥ tattvānāṃ daśakaṃ tattva-daśakaṃ tena parikpta udghāṭita ity arthaḥ /

original: kim artham ? jhaṭiti phala-siddhyai śīghra-phala-prāptyai // KrdC_2.31 //

nyāsa antaram āha ākeśāt iti
ā keśāt ā pādam dorbhyām
triśas mūrdhani akṣṇoḥ śrutyoḥ ghrāṇe

original: athānantaraṃ dorbhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ dhruva-puṭitam praṇava-puṭitaṃ manu-varaṃ mantra-śreṣṭhaṃ
analyzed: atha anantaram dorbhyām hastābhyām dhruva puṭitam praṇava puṭitam manuvaram mantraśreṣṭham

original: daśākṣaraṃ gopāla-mantram ākeśād āpādaṃ keśādi-pāda-paryantaṃ triśaḥ sva-dehe vinyased
analyzed: daśa akṣaram gopāla mantram ākeśāt āpādam keśa ādi pāda paryantam triśas sva dehe vinyaset
iti vidyādhara ācārya tripāṭhi prabhṛtayaḥ

original: eteṣāṃ mata ākeśād āpādad iti pāṭhaḥ /
analyzed: eteṣām mataḥ ākeśāt āpādat iti pāṭhaḥ
adhunā sṛṣṭi sthiti saṃhāra krameṇa mantra akṣara nyāsam āha mūrdhani iti ādi
tathā daśa akṣarāṇi praṇava puṭitāni mūrdha ādi vakṣyamāṇa sthāneṣu vinyaset
sthānāni āha mūrdhani iti

original: mūrdhni cakṣuṣor ubhaya-netre ekam evākṣaraṃ śrutayoḥ karṇayoḥ atrāpy -ekam eva ghrāṇe nāsā-yugme tatrāpy ekam eva mukhaṃ hṛdayaṃ jaṭharaṃ  #
analyzed: mūrdhni cakṣuṣoḥ ubhaya netre ekam eva akṣaram śrutayoḥ karṇayoḥ atra api ekam eva ghrāṇe nāsā yugme tatra api ekam eva mukham hṛdayam jaṭharam

original: pāda-dvaye ekam eteṣu daśasu sthāneṣu daśākṣarāṇi
analyzed: pāda dvaye ekam eteṣu daśasu sthāneṣu daśa akṣarāṇi
vinyaset iti arthaḥ

original: uktā sṛṣṭiḥ śiṣṭair eṣā sthitir api
analyzed: uktā sṛṣṭiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ eṣā sthitiḥ api
munibhiḥ abhihitā hṛd ādi mukha antikā
saṃhāraḥ ṅghri ādi mūrdha antaḥ tritayam iti

original: viracayec ca sṛṣṭim anu sthitim // Krd_2.33 //
analyzed: viracayet ca sṛṣṭim anu sthitim

original: śiṣṭair āgama-jñair eṣā sṛṣṭir uktety arthaḥ /
analyzed: śiṣṭaiḥ āgama jñaiḥ eṣā sṛṣṭiḥ uktā iti arthaḥ

original: sthitir api sthiti-nyāso 'pi munibhir nāradādibhir hṛdayādi-mukhāntikā abhihitā hṛdayam ārabhya mukha-paryantaṃ kathitā /
analyzed: sthitiḥ api munibhiḥ nārada ādibhiḥ hṛdaya ādi mukha antikā abhihitā hṛdayam ārabhya mukha paryantam kathitā
tatra kramaḥ hṛdaya jaṭhara liṅga jānu pāda mūrdha akṣi śravaṇa ghrāṇa mukhāni iti saṃhāraḥ ṅghri ādi mūrdha antaḥ kāryaḥ

original: tatra mantrākṣarāṇi pratilomena deyānītīdaṃ tritayaṃ viracayatu anu paścād etat tritaya-karaṇānantaraṃ punaḥ sṛṣṭim sthitim ca viracayatu /
analyzed: tatra mantra akṣarāṇi pratilomena deyāni iti idam tritayam viracayatu anu paścāt etat tritaya karaṇa anantaram punar sṛṣṭim sthitim ca viracayatu

original: tathā ca pañca nyāsāḥ kāryā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca pañca nyāsāḥ kāryāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: prayogas tu goṃ namaḥ pīṃ namaḥ ity ādi //33//
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu goṃ namaḥ pīṃ namaḥ iti ādi

original: yeṣām āśramiṇāṃ yad-anto nyāsas tad darśayati -nyāsa iti /
analyzed: yeṣām āśramiṇām yad antaḥ nyāsaḥ tat darśayati nyāsaḥ iti
nyāsaḥ saṃhāra antaḥ maskari vaikhānaseṣu vihitaḥ yam

original: sthity-anto gṛhamedhiṣu sṛṣṭy-anto varṇinām iti prāhuḥ // Krd_2.34 //
analyzed: sthiti antaḥ gṛhamedhiṣu sṛṣṭi antaḥ varṇinām iti prāhuḥ

original: ayaṃ nyāsaḥ maskari-vaikhānaseṣu saṃhārānto vihitaḥ maskarī sannyāsī vaikhānaso vānaprasthaḥ,
analyzed: ayam nyāsaḥ maskari vaikhānaseṣu saṃhāra antaḥ vihitaḥ maskarī sannyāsī vaikhānasaḥ vānaprasthaḥ

original: tathā tābhyāṃ nyāsa-trayaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā tābhyām nyāsa trayam kāryam iti arthaḥ

original: gṛha-medhiṣu gṛhastheṣu ayaṃ nyāsaḥ sthity-anto vihitaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhamedhiṣu gṛhastheṣu ayam nyāsaḥ sthiti antaḥ vihitaḥ

original: tathā gṛhasthaiḥ pañca nyāsāḥ kāryā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā gṛhasthaiḥ pañca nyāsāḥ kāryāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: varṇināṃ brahmacāriṇām ayaṃ nyāsaḥ sṛṣṭy-anto vihitaḥ /
analyzed: varṇinām brahmacāriṇām ayam nyāsaḥ sṛṣṭi antaḥ vihitaḥ

original: tathā ca brahmacāribhir nyāsa-catuṣṭayaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca brahmacāribhiḥ nyāsa catuṣṭayam kāryam iti arthaḥ

original: iti pūrvoktam artha-jātaṃ prāhuḥ prācīnā āgamajñā iti śeṣaḥ // KrdC_2.34 //
analyzed: iti pūrva uktam artha jātam prāhuḥ prācīnāḥ āgama jñāḥ iti śeṣaḥ
vairāgya iti

original: vairāgya-yuji gṛhasthe saṃhāraṃ kecid āhur ācāryāḥ /
analyzed: vairāgya yuji gṛhasthe saṃhāram kecid āhuḥ ācāryāḥ

original: sahajānau vana-vāsini sthitiṃ ca vidyārthināṃ sṛṣṭim // Krd_2.35 //
analyzed: sahaja ānau vana vāsini sthitim ca vidyā arthinām sṛṣṭim

original: kecid ācāryāḥ vairāgya-yukta-gṛhasthe saṃhārāntaṃ nyāsam āhuḥ /
analyzed: kecid ācāryāḥ vairāgya yukta gṛhasthe saṃhāra antam nyāsam āhuḥ

original: kiṃ ca sahajānau vana-vāsini sapatnīke sthitiṃ sthity-antaṃ nyāsam āhuḥ /
analyzed: kim ca saha jānau vana vāsini sa patnīke sthitim sthiti antam nyāsam āhuḥ

original: tathā brahmacāri-bhinnānāṃ vidyārthinām api sṛṣṭim sṛṣṭy-antaṃ nyāsam āhur ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.35 //
analyzed: tathā brahmacāri bhinnānām vidyā arthinām api sṛṣṭim sṛṣṭi antam nyāsam āhuḥ iti arthaḥ
ukta akṣara nyāsa aṅguli niyamam darśayati śirasi iti ādinā
śirasi vihitā madhyā sā eva akṣṇi tarjanikā anvitā
śravasi rahita aṅguṣṭhā jyeṣṭhā anvitā ūṣa kaniṣṭhakā

original: nasi ca vadane sarvāḥ sajyāyasī hṛdi tarjanī
analyzed: nasi ca vadane sarvāḥ sa jyāyasī hṛdi tarjanī

original: prathamaja-yutā madhyā nābhau śravo-vihitā śive // Krd_2.36 //
analyzed: prathama ja yutā madhyā nābhau śravaḥ vihitā śive

original: tā evāṅgulayo jānvoḥ sāṅguṣṭhās tu pada-dvaye /
analyzed: tāḥ eva aṅgulayaḥ jānvoḥ sa aṅguṣṭhāḥ tu pada dvaye

original: sthānārṇayor vinimayo bhaven nāsty aṅguli-sthānayoḥ // Krd_2.37 //
analyzed: sthāna arṇayoḥ vinimayaḥ bhavet na asti aṅguli sthānayoḥ

original: madhyā madhyāṅguliḥ śirasi mūrdhni vihitā nyāsa-karaṇatvena tathā madhyāṅgulyā nyāsaḥ śirasi kārya ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: madhyā madhya aṅguliḥ śirasi mūrdhni vihitā nyāsa karaṇa tvena tathā madhya aṅgulyā nyāsaḥ śirasi kāryaḥ iti arthaḥ
sā eva madhyā tarjanikā anvitā akṣṇi nayana yugale vihitā

original: tathā ca madhyamā-tarjanībhyām akṣṇor nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca madhyamā tarjanībhyām akṣṇoḥ nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ

original: śravasi śrotra-yugale rahitāṅguṣṭhā aṅguṣṭha-rahitā sarvāṅgulayo vihitāḥ /
analyzed: śravasi śrotra yugale rahitā aṅguṣṭhā aṅguṣṭha rahitā sarva aṅgulayaḥ vihitāḥ

original: nasi nāsā-yugale jyeṣṭhānvitā aṅguṣṭha-yuktā upakaniṣṭhakā anāmikā vihitā /
analyzed: nasi nāsā yugale jyeṣṭhā anvitā aṅguṣṭha yuktā upakaniṣṭhakā anāmikā vihitā
vadane sarva aṅgulayaḥ vihitāḥ
hṛdi sa jyāyasī jyeṣṭhā sahitā sa aṅguṣṭha tarjanī vihitā

original: nābhau jaṭhare nābhi-padena jaṭharam upalakṣitam iti vidyādharaḥ /
analyzed: nābhau jaṭhare nābhi padena jaṭharam upalakṣitam iti vidyādharaḥ
nābhi padasya mukhyaḥ eva arthaḥ iti laghudīpikā prabhṛtayaḥ
prathama ja yutā aṅguṣṭha yuktā madhyamā vihitā

original: śive liṅge tathā vihitā yathā jaṭhare sāṅguṣṭhā madhyā
analyzed: śive liṅge tathā vihitā yathā jaṭhare sa aṅguṣṭhā madhyā
tathā iti arthaḥ iti kecid

original: śravo vihitā śiva iti pāṭhe śrotra-yugale yā aṅguṣṭha-rahitās tāḥ śive vihitā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: śravaḥ vihitā śive iti pāṭhe śrotra yugale yāḥ aṅguṣṭha rahitāḥ tāḥ śive vihitāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: jānvos tā evāṅgulayaḥ aṅguṣṭhena rahitāḥ sarvāṅgulaya ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: jānvoḥ tāḥ eva aṅgulayaḥ aṅguṣṭhena rahitāḥ sarva aṅgulayaḥ iti arthaḥ
pada dvaye sa aṅguṣṭhāḥ sarva aṅgulayaḥ vihitāḥ

original: sthānārṇayor ity ādinā sthānaākṣaraayor vinimayo viparyayo bhavati /
analyzed: sthāna arṇayoḥ iti ādinā sthāna ākṣara ayoḥ vinimayaḥ viparyayaḥ bhavati
yathā goṃ sṛṣṭau mūrdhni
sthitau hṛdaye
saṃhṛtau pādayoḥ nyāsaḥ iti
evam aṅgulī sthānayoḥ viparyayaḥ na asti

original: kintu sṛṣṭau sthitau saṃhṛtau vā yatra sthāne yāṅgulir vihitā tayaivāṅgulyā tatra stāne nyāsaḥ kārya ity arthaḥ / // KrdC_2.36-37 //
analyzed: kintu sṛṣṭau sthitau saṃhṛtau vā yatra sthāne yā aṅguliḥ vihitā tayā eva aṅgulyā tatra stāne nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ iti arthaḥ
idānīm vibhūti pañjara nyāsam āha vacmi iti
vacmi aparam nyāsa varam bhūti abhidham bhūtikaram
mantra daśa āvṛtti mayam guptatamam mantri varaiḥ

original: aparaṃ bhūty-abhidhaṃ bhūtir iti nāma yasya tad bhūti-nāmakaṃ vacmi kathayāmi /
