ye sapta rāgāḥ niṣāda ṛṣabha gāndhāra ṣaḍja madhyama dhaivata pañcama ākhyāḥ svarāḥ

original: tatra trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ samāhāro grāma-trayī tatra grāma-trayyāṃ gatāḥ prāptāḥ yā
analyzed: tatra trayāṇām grāmāṇām samāhāraḥ grāma trayī tatra grāma trayyām gatāḥ prāptāḥ yā
mūrchanāḥ manoharāḥ ekatriṃśati prakārāḥ tābhiḥ saṃprīṇayantam

original: sapta-svarās trayo grāmā mūrchanās tv ekaviṃśatiḥ /
analyzed: sapta svarāḥ trayaḥ grāmāḥ mūrchanāḥ tu ekaviṃśatiḥ
saṃmūrchitaḥ svaraḥ yatra rāga tām pratipadyate

original: mūrchanām iti tāṃ prāhuḥ kavayo grāma-sambhavām //
analyzed: mūrchanām iti tām prāhuḥ kavayaḥ grāma sambhavām
kimbhūtābhiḥ

original: mahatyā sapta-tantrī-yuktayā nārada-vīṇayā uditābhir udgatābhiḥ // KrdC_3.36 //
analyzed: mahatyā sapta tantrī yuktayā nārada vīṇayā uditābhiḥ udgatābhiḥ
adhunā prakṛtam upasaṃharan ātma pūjā kramam āha
iti dhyātvā ātmānam paṭu viśada dhīḥ nanda tanayam
puras buddhyā eva arghya prabhṛtibhiḥ anindya upahṛtibhiḥ

original: yajed bhūyo bhaktyā sva-vapuṣi bahiṣṭhaiś ca vibhavair
analyzed: yajet bhūyas bhaktyā sva vapuṣi bahiṣṭhaiḥ ca vibhavaiḥ

original: vidhānaṃ tad brūmo vayam atula-sānnidhya-kṛd atha // Krd_3.37 //
analyzed: vidhānam tat brūmaḥ vayam atula sānnidhya kṛt atha

original: iti pūrvokta-dhyāna-prakāreṇa paṭu-viśada-dhīḥ samarthā vicāra-kṣamā atha ca nirmalā
analyzed: iti pūrva ukta dhyāna prakāreṇa paṭu viśada dhīḥ samarthā vicāra kṣamā atha ca nirmalā

original: evambhūtā buddhir yasya sa tathā ātmānaṃ nanda-tanayaṃ gopāla-kṛṣṇa-rūpaṃ dhyātvā
analyzed: evambhūtā buddhiḥ yasya sa tathā ātmānam nanda tanayam gopāla kṛṣṇa rūpam dhyātvā

original: ātma-nanda-tanayayor abhedaṃ cintayitvā puraḥ prathamato buddhyaiva manasaivārghya-prabhṛtibhir
analyzed: ātma nanda tanayayoḥ abhedam cintayitvā puras prathamatas buddhyā eva manasā eva arghya prabhṛtibhiḥ

original: anindyopahṛtibhiḥ arghya-pādyādibhir upahṛtibhir aninditopacāraiḥ yathopadeśaṃ pūjayet /
analyzed: anindya upahṛtibhiḥ arghya pādya ādibhiḥ upahṛtibhiḥ anindita upacāraiḥ yathopadeśam pūjayet

original: tripāṭhinas tu abhinandyeti pāṭhe dhṛtvā pūjayed ity artham āhuḥ /
analyzed: tripāṭhinaḥ tu abhinandya iti pāṭhe dhṛtvā pūjayet iti artham āhuḥ

original: bhūyaḥ punar api sva-śarīre sākṣād bāhyopacārair arghyādibhiḥ pūjayet /
analyzed: bhūyas punar api sva śarīre sākṣāt bāhya upacāraiḥ arghya ādibhiḥ pūjayet
atha anantaram tad vidhānam bahiṣṭha vibhava arcana prakāram vayam brumaḥ
kīdṛśam parameśvara atyanta sānnidhya dātāram
śaṅkha pūraṇa vidhim darśayati
āracayya bhuvi gomaya ambhasā
sthaṇḍilam nijam amutra viṣṭaram
nyasya tatra vihita āspadaḥ mbhasā
śaṅkham astra manunā viśodhayet

original: bhuvi pṛthivyāṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ pūjā-sthalaṃ gomaya-sahitena jalenāracayya upalipya amutra
analyzed: bhuvi pṛthivyām sthaṇḍilam pūjā sthalam gomaya sahitena jalena āracayya upalipya amutra

original: sthaṇḍile nijaṃ svīyaṃ viṣṭaram āsanaṃ vastra-kambalādikaṃ nyasya saṃsthāpya tatra
analyzed: sthaṇḍile nijam svīyam viṣṭaram āsanam vastra kambala ādikam nyasya saṃsthāpya tatra

original: viṣṭare vihitāspadaḥ kṛtāsano jalena śaṅkham astra-manunā mūlamantrāstra-mantreṇa
analyzed: viṣṭare vihita āspadaḥ kṛta āsanaḥ jalena śaṅkham astra manunā mūlamantra astramantreṇa

original: astrāya phaḍ iti mantreṇa vā pralepayet // KrdC_3.38 //
analyzed: astrāya phaṭ iti mantreṇa vā pralepayet
tatra gandha sumanā ukṣatān atho
nikṣipet dhṛdayamantram uccaran
pūrayet vimala pāthasā sudhīḥ
akṣaraiḥ pratigataiḥ śiraḥ ntakaiḥ

original: mūla-mantram eva hṛdaya-mantram kevalaṃ hṛdayāya nama iti vā uccārya gandha-puṣpa-yava-taṇḍulān nikṣipet /
analyzed: mūlamantram eva hṛdaya mantram kevalam hṛdayāya namaḥ iti vā uccārya gandha puṣpa yava taṇḍulān nikṣipet
tathā vimala pāthasā nirmala jalena pūrayet
mantram āha pratigataiḥ iti

original: pratiloma-gataiḥ pratiloma-paṭhitair mātṛkākṣaraiḥ kṣa-kārādyair akārāntaiḥ śiro 'ntakaiḥ sa-bindukaiḥ /
analyzed: pratiloma gataiḥ pratiloma paṭhitaiḥ mātṛkā akṣaraiḥ kṣakāra ādyaiḥ akāra antaiḥ śiraḥ ntakaiḥ sa bindukaiḥ
bindu antakaiḥ iti laghudīpikā kāraḥ

original: svāhāntair iti vidyādharācāryaḥ vikrāya svāheyt antair iti tripāṭhinaḥ // KrdC_3.39 //
analyzed: svāhā antaiḥ iti vidyādhara ācāryaḥ vikrāya antaiḥ iti tripāṭhinaḥ
pīṭha iti
pīṭha śaṅkha salileṣu mantra vid
vahni vāsara niśā kṛtām kramāt
maṇḍalāni viṣakaśravaḥ ukṣaraiḥ
arcayet vadana pūrva dīpitaiḥ

original: pīṭhe śaṅkhe salile ca yathā-kramaṃ vahni-sūrya-candrāṇāṃ maṇḍalāni viṣaṃ ma-kāraḥ
analyzed: pīṭhe śaṅkhe salile ca yathākramam vahni sūrya candrāṇām maṇḍalāni viṣam makāraḥ

original: kaṃ śiras tatra nyasyamāno 'kāraḥ śravaḥ śrotraṃ tatra nyasyamāno-kāra ebhir akṣarair
analyzed: kam śiraḥ tatra nyasyamānaḥ ukāraḥ śravaḥ śrotram tatra nyasyamānaḥ ukāraḥ ebhiḥ akṣaraiḥ
mantra vid upāsakaḥ krameṇa pūjayet

original: kīdṛśaiḥ ? vadana-pūrva-dīpitaiḥ vadana-pūrve śirasi nyasyamānam aṃ bindur iti yāvat tena dīpitaiḥ sānusvārair ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛśaiḥ vadana pūrva dīpitaiḥ vadana pūrve śirasi nyasyamānam aṃ binduḥ iti yāvat tena dīpitaiḥ sa anusvāraiḥ iti arthaḥ
prayogaḥ vahni maṇḍalāya daśa kalā ātmane namaḥ
aṃ arka maṇḍalāya dvādaśa kalā ātmane namaḥ
um soma maṇḍalāya ṣoḍaśa kalā ātmane namaḥ
tatra tīrtham anunā abhivāhayet
tīrtham uṣṇaruci maṇḍalāt tatas
svīya hṛd kamalataḥ harim tathā
gālinīm ca śikhayā pradarśayet

original: tatra śaṅkha-jale vakṣyamāṇa-tīrtha-mantreṇa sūrya-maṇḍala-tīrtham āvāhayet tathā tataḥ svīya-hṛt-padmāt kṛṣṇam āvāhayet /
analyzed: tatra śaṅkha jale vakṣyamāṇa tīrtha mantreṇa sūrya maṇḍala tīrtham āvāhayet tathā tatas svīya hṛd padmāt kṛṣṇam āvāhayet

original: anantaraṃ śikhā-mantreṇa vakṣyamāṇāṃ gālinīṃ mudrāṃ pradarśayet ca-kārāt dhenu-mudrāṃ ca /
analyzed: anantaram śikhāmantreṇa vakṣyamāṇām gālinīm mudrām pradarśayet cakārāt dhenumudrām ca
vāma hasta tale dakṣiṇa tarjanyā tāḍanam prabodhanam
tat jalam nayana mantra vīkṣitam
varmaṇā samavaguṇṭhya dos yujā
aṅgakaiḥ ca kalayā uddiśaḥ strataḥ

original: taj-jalaṃ śaṅkha-jalaṃ vauṣaḍ iti nayana-mantreṇa vīkṣitaṃ yatra nayana-mantraḥ sambhavati tatraiva nayana-mantreṇa vīkṣaṇam iti tripāṭhinaḥ
analyzed: tat jalam śaṅkha jalam vauṣaṭ iti nayanamantreṇa vīkṣitam yatra nayanamantraḥ sambhavati tatra eva nayanamantreṇa vīkṣaṇam iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: varmaṇā hum iti kavaca-mantreṇāguṇṭhya mūla-mantra-sakalīkṛtaṃ mūla-mantrāṅga-sambandham /
analyzed: varmaṇā hum iti kavaca mantreṇa āguṇṭhya mūlamantra sakalīkṛtam mūlamantra aṅga sambandham
etasya eva vivaraṇam nyaset iti

original: devatāṅge ṣaḍ-aṅgānāṃ nyāsaḥ syāt sakalī-kṛtir iti rudradharaḥ /
analyzed: devatā aṅge ṣaṣ aṅgānām nyāsaḥ syāt sakalīkṛtiḥ iti rudradharaḥ

original: yad vā, mūla-mantra-dhyānena sadaivatam iti tripāṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā mūlamantra dhyānena sa daivatam iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: aṅgakaiś ca nyased iti mūla-mantrasya ṣaḍ-aṅga-nyāsaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgakaiḥ ca nyaset iti mūlamantrasya ṣaḍaṅga nyāsam kuryāt iti arthaḥ

original: anantaraṃ śaṅkhasya daśa diśaḥ astra-mantreṇa choṭikayā badhnīyāt // KrdC_3.42 //
analyzed: anantaram śaṅkhasya daśa diśaḥ astramantreṇa choṭikayā badhnīyāt
akṣata ādi yutam acyutīkṛtam
saṃspṛśan japatu mantram aṣṭaśas
kim ca nikṣipatu vardhanī jale
prokṣayet nija tanum tatas mbunā

original: taj-jalam abhagna-taṇḍula-candan-puṣpa-sahitaṃ viṣṇu-svarūpatāṃ nītaṃ spṛśan mūla-mantram aṣṭa-kṛtvo japet /
analyzed: tat jalam abhagna taṇḍula candan puṣpa sahitam viṣṇu sva rūpa tām nītam spṛśan mūlamantram aṣṭa kṛtvas japet

original: anantaram ardha-jalasya kiñcit sva-dakṣiṇa-bhāga-sthāpita-vardhanī-jale prokṣaṇīya-pātra-jale nikṣipet / tad uktam-
analyzed: anantaram ardha jalasya kiñcid sva dakṣiṇa bhāga sthāpita vardhanī jale prokṣaṇīya pātra jale nikṣipet tat uktam
dakṣiṇe prokṣaṇī pātram ādāya adbhiḥ prapūjayet

original: kiñcid arghyāmbu saṅgṛhya prokṣaṇy ambhasi yojayet // iti /
analyzed: kiñcid arghya ambu saṅgṛhya prokṣaṇī ambhasi yojayet iti
tad anantaram argdhapātra jalena vāra trayam nija śarīram prokṣayet
vardhanī ghaṭa jalena iti vidyādhara ācāryāḥ
tris kareṇa manunā akhilam tathā
sādhanam kusuma candana ādikam
śaṅkhapūraṇa vidhiḥ samīritaḥ
guptaḥ eṣa yajanāgraṇīḥ iha

original: tathā mūla-mantreṇa dakṣa-hastena puṣpa-candanādikaṃ pūjopakaraṇa-dravyaṃ vāra-trayaṃ prokṣayet /
analyzed: tathā mūlamantreṇa dakṣa hastena puṣpa candana ādikam pūjā upakaraṇa dravyam vāra trayam prokṣayet
upasaṃharati śaṅkha iti
eṣa śaṅkha pūraṇa prakāraḥ samīritaḥ uktaḥ

original: kīdṛśaḥ ? iha āgama-śāstre yajanāgraṇīḥ prathama-vidhāne yaḥ śreṣṭhataraḥ // KrdC_3.44 //
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ iha āgama śāstre yajana agraṇīḥ prathama vidhāne yaḥ śreṣṭhataraḥ
adhunā tīrtha mantram darśayati

original: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
analyzed: gaṅge ca yamune ca eva godāvari sarasvati

original: narmade sindhu-kāveri jale 'smin sannidhiṃ kuru // Krd_3.45 //
analyzed: narmade sindhu kāveri jale smin sannidhim kuru
eṣa tīrtham anuproktaḥ durita ogha nivāraṇaḥ
kaniṣṭhā aṅguṣṭhakau saktau karayoḥ itaretaram
tarjanī madhyamā anāmāḥ saṃhatāḥ bhugna saṃjitāḥ

original: mudraiṣā gālinī proktā śaṅkhasyopari cālitā // Krd_3.47 //
analyzed: mudrā eṣā gālinī proktā śaṅkhasya upari cālitā
eṣa tīrtha āvāhana mantraḥ kathitaḥ durita iti pāpa samūha vināśakaḥ

original: adhunā gālinī mudrāyā lakṣaṇam āha-kaniṣṭhety ādinā /
analyzed: adhunā gālinī mudrāyāḥ lakṣaṇam āha kaniṣṭhā iti ādinā

original: hastayor anyonya-kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhakau sambandhau tathā tarjanī-madhyamānāmikāḥ saṃhatāḥ kṛtvā bhugnāḥ kiñcid ākuñcitāḥ paraspara-saṃsaktāḥ kāryā  #
analyzed: hastayoḥ anyonya kaniṣṭhā aṅguṣṭhakau sambandhau tathā tarjanī madhyamā anāmikāḥ saṃhatāḥ kṛtvā bhugnāḥ kiñcid ākuñcitāḥ paraspara saṃsaktāḥ kāryā  /
iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ ca sati eṣā gālinī mudrā proktā /
analyzed: evam ca sati eṣā gālinī mudrā proktā

original: śaṅkhasyopari cālitā satī devatā-prītiṃ sampādayatīty arthaḥ // KrdC_3.45-47 //
analyzed: śaṅkhasya upari cālitā satī devatā prītim sampādayati iti arthaḥ
adhunā sva dehe pīṭha pūjā kramam āha
atha mūrdhani mūlacakra madhye
nija nāthān gaṇanāyakam samarcya
nyasana kramataḥ ca pīṭha mantraiḥ
jala gandha akṣata puṣpa dhūpa dīpaiḥ

original: athānantaraṃ mūrdhani svakīya-śirasi mūla-cakra-madhye mūlādhāra-cakre yathā-kramaṃ
analyzed: atha anantaram mūrdhani svakīya śirasi mūlacakra madhye mūlādhāra cakre yathākramam

original: sva-nāthān sva-gurūn gaṇapatiṃ ca pūjayitvā pūrvokta-nyāsa-krameṇa pīṭha-mantrair
analyzed: sva nāthān sva gurūn gaṇapatim ca pūjayitvā pūrva ukta nyāsa krameṇa pīṭha mantraiḥ
ādhāra śaktim ārabhya pīṭha mantra antam tad tad mantraiḥ jala gandha akṣata puṣpa dhūpa dīpaiḥ
sva śarīre pīṭha pūjanam kuryāt
prayajet atha mūlamantra tejaḥ
nija mūle hṛdaye bhruvoḥ ca madhye
tritayam smarataḥ smaret tat ekī
kṛtam ānanda ghanam taḍit latā ābham

original: athānantaraṃ tan-mūlādhāra-hṛdaya-bhrū-madhya-gata-tejas-tritayaṃ mūla-mantrātmakaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ smarataḥ kāma-bījena klīm ity anenaikībhūtaṃ  #
analyzed: atha anantaram tad mūlādhāra hṛdaya bhrū madhya gata tejaḥ tritayam mūlamantra ātmakam param jyotiḥ smarataḥ kāmabījena klīm iti anena ekībhūtam
cintayet
kīdṛśam ānanda ghanam cit ānandam
punar kīdṛśam
vidyut prabham
tat tejaḥ ṅgaiḥ sāvayavīkṛtya vibhūti ādi
aṅga antam vinyasya yajet āsana pūrvaiḥ
bhūṣā antaiḥ bhūyas jala gandha ādibhiḥ arcām
kuryāt bhūti ādi aṅga vidhāna avadhi mantrī

original: tad ekīkṛtaṃ tejaḥ pañcāṅgaiḥ sāvayavī-kṛtya śarīra-yuktaṃ sampādya tatra vibhūtyādy-aṅgāntaṃ
analyzed: tat ekīkṛtam tejaḥ pañcāṅgaiḥ sāvayavīkṛtya śarīra yuktam sampādya tatra vibhūti ādi aṅga antam
vibhūti pañjaram ārabhya aṅganyāsa paryantam sva śarīre vinyasya āsana ādi bhūṣā antaiḥ
upacāraiḥ devam pūjayet

original: bhūyaḥ punar api jala-gandhādibhir vibhūti-pañjara-mūrti-pañjara-karastha-sṛṣṭi-sthiti-daśa-pañcāṅga-nyāsa-sthāneṣu nyāsa-krameṇaiva tan-mantrair  #
analyzed: bhūyas punar api jala gandha ādibhiḥ vibhūti pañjara mūrti pañjara kara stha sṛṣṭi sthiti daśa pañca aṅga nyāsa sthāneṣu nyāsa krameṇa eva tad mantraiḥ
eva pūjayet
bhūyas veṇum vadana stham vakṣaḥ deśe vanamālām

original: vakṣojo 'rdhaṃ prayajec ca śrīvatsaṃ kaustubha-ratnam // Krd_3.51 //
analyzed: vakṣojaḥ ūrdham prayajet ca śrīvatsam kaustubha ratnam

original: bhūyaḥ punar api mukha-sthaṃ veṇuṃ pūjayet hṛdaye ca vanamālāṃ kaṇṭham ārabhya pāda-dvayam avalambinīṃ patra-puṣpa-mayīṃ mālām / tad uktam-
analyzed: bhūyas punar api mukha stham veṇum pūjayet hṛdaye ca vanamālām kaṇṭham ārabhya pāda dvayam avalambinīm patra puṣpa mayīm mālām  / tat uktam
kaṇṭham ārabhya yā tiṣṭhet pāda dvaya vilambinī
patra puṣpa mayī mālā vanamālā prakīrtitā iti

original: stanasyopari śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ ca prapūjayet // KrdC_3.51 //
analyzed: stanasya upari śrīvatsam kaustubham ca prapūjayet
śrīkhaṇḍa niḥsyanda vicarcita aṅgo
mūlena bhāla ādiṣu citrakāṇi
likhyāt atho
ra nāmayā dīpa śikhā ākṛtīni

original: athānantaraṃ mūla-mantreṇa candana-paṅka-liptāṅgaḥ pūjaka eva lalāṭādiṣu mūrti-pañjara-nyāsa-sthāneṣu
analyzed: atha anantaram mūlamantreṇa candana paṅka lipta aṅgaḥ pūjakaḥ eva lalāṭa ādiṣu mūrti pañjara nyāsa sthāneṣu

original: citrakāṇi tilakāni dīpa-śikhākārāṇi anāmikayā mūrti-pañjara-mantraiḥ aṃ oṃ keśava-dhātṛbhyāṃ
analyzed: citrakāṇi tilakāni dīpa śikhā ākārāṇi anāmikayā mūrti pañjara mantraiḥ aṃ om keśava dhātṛbhyām

original: nama ity ādinā dvādaśa-mūrtibhir likhyāt kuryād ity arthaḥ // KrdC_3.52 //
analyzed: namaḥ iti ādinā dvādaśa mūrtibhiḥ likhyāt kuryāt iti arthaḥ
adhunā puṣpa añjali vidhim darśayati
puṣpa añjalim vitanuyāt atha pañca kṛtvas
mūlena pāda yugale tulasī dvayena
madhye haya ari yugalena ca mūrdhni padma

original: dvandvena ṣaḍbhir api sarva-tanau ca sarvaiḥ // Krd_3.53 //

analyzed: mukha catuṣke dvāra catuṣṭaye payaḥ tarubhiḥ kṣīravṛkṣaiḥ toraṇam bahis dvāram yatra tādṛśam

punar kīdṛśam
ujjvalam nirmalam
kuṇḍa vidhim āha
vasu tri guṇita aṅgula pramita khāta tārā āyātam

original: vasor vasupater atho kakubhi-dhiṣṇyam asmin budhaḥ /
analyzed: vasoḥ vasu pateḥ atha u kakubhi dhiṣṇyam asmin budhaḥ
karotu vasu mekhalam vasu gaṇa ardha koṇam pratīcī
avasthita gaja adhara pratima yoni saṃlakṣitam

original: athānantaram asmin maṇḍape budhaḥ vasor vahner dhiṣṇyaṃ kuṇḍaṃ karotu /
analyzed: atha anantaram asmin maṇḍape budhaḥ vasoḥ vahneḥ dhiṣṇyam kuṇḍam karotu

original: kīdṛśaṃ ? vasur aṣṭa-saṅkhyā aṣṭau vasavaḥ iti prasiddheḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛśam vasuḥ aṣṭa saṅkhyā aṣṭau vasavaḥ iti prasiddheḥ
teṣām vasūnām triguṇāni caturviṃśa aṅgulāni

original: taiḥ pramitaṃ tat-pramāṇaṃ khātasya gartasya uccatvaṃ vistāraś ca yatra tādṛśam /
analyzed: taiḥ pramitam tat pramāṇam khātasya gartasya ucca tvam vistāraḥ ca yatra tādṛśam

original: kutra ? vasupateḥ kuberasya kakubhi diśi uttarasyām /
analyzed: kutra vasupateḥ kuberasya kakubhi diśi uttarasyām

original: paścima-diśy avasthitaṃ gajo 'ṣta-sadṛśa-dvādaśāṅgulāyāmā yā yonis tayā bhūṣitam /
analyzed: paścima diśi avasthitam yā yoniḥ tayā bhūṣitam

original: tad uktam-dvādaśāṅguli-rūpatvād yoniḥ syād dvādaśāṅguliḥ iti /
analyzed: tat uktam dvādaśa aṅguli rūpa tvāt yoniḥ syāt dvādaśa aṅguliḥ iti
aparaḥ tra viśeṣaḥ śāradātilakataḥ vagantavyaḥ
adhunā rāśi maṇḍala vidhim
tatas maṇḍape gavya gandha ambu sikte
catur dhāra śobhā upaśobhā asra yuktam

original: tato maṇḍapānantaram asmin maṇḍape samyak yathokta-prakāreṇa maṇḍalaṃ likhet /
analyzed: tatas maṇḍapa anantaram asmin maṇḍape samyak yathā ukta prakāreṇa maṇḍalam likhet
kīdṛśe gavyaiḥ pañcagavyaiḥ śāradātilaka ukta vaiṣṇava gandhāṣṭaka jalena prokṣite
kīdṛśam aṣṭa dala padma sahitam
punar kīdṛśam
vṛtta traya sahitam

original: punaḥ rāśayo meṣādayaḥ pīṭhaṃ kalasa-sthāpana-sthānaṃ tasyāṅghri-pīṭha-pātra-catuṣṭayaṃ catasro vīthayaḥ catvāri-dvārāṇi śobhā upaśobhā asraṃ  #
analyzed: punar rāśayaḥ meṣa ādayaḥ pīṭham kalasa sthāpana sthānam tasya aṅghri pīṭha pātra catuṣṭayam catasraḥ vīthayaḥ catvāri dvārāṇi śobhā upaśobhā asram
koṇam etaiḥ yuktam

original: ayam arthaḥ-sārdha-hasta-dvaya-pramāṇena samaṃ catur-asram bhū-bhāgaṃ pariṣkṛtya tatra pūrvāparāyatāni saptadaśa-sūtrāṇi pālayet /
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ sārdha hasta dvaya pramāṇena samam catur asram bhū bhāgam pariṣkṛtya tatra pūrva apara āyatāni saptadaśa sūtrāṇi pālayet

original: evaṃ sati ṣaṭ-pañcaāśad uttaraṃ dvi-śataṃ koṣṭhānāṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam sati ṣaṭpañcaāśat uttaram dviśatam koṣṭhānām bhavati

original: tatra koṣṭha-vibhāgo madhye ṣoḍaśabhiḥ koṣṭhair vṛtta-trayānvitaṃ padmaṃ
analyzed: tatra koṣṭha vibhāgaḥ madhye ṣoḍaśabhiḥ koṣṭhaiḥ vṛtta traya anvitam padmam

original: likhet / (tatra ca padmopari-śiṣṭe pīṭhaṃ tad-aṅgaṃ ca likhet /
analyzed: likhet tatra ca padma upari śiṣṭe pīṭham tad aṅgam ca likhet
tad bahis aṣṭa adhika catvāriṃśatā dvādaśa rāśīn likhet
tad bahis ṣaṭtriṃśatā pīṭham pīṭha aṅgam ca likhet
tad bahis aśītibhiḥ padaiḥ likhet

original: ) atredaṃ boddhavyaṃ padmasya dalāgra-sthaṃ vṛttaṃ pīṭha-śaktiś ca etayor madhye pūrva-dakṣiṇa-paścimottaraṃ sūtra-catuṣṭayaṃ dadyāt /
analyzed: atra idam boddhavyam padmasya dala agra stham vṛttam pīṭha śaktiḥ ca etayoḥ madhye pūrva dakṣiṇa paścima uttaram sūtra catuṣṭayam dadyāt
anantaram dvādaśa adhikaiḥ śata padaiḥ dvāra śobhā upaśobhā koṇāni vilikhet
tatra sarvasyām diśi dvāram ṣaṣ padam

original: tatra prakāraḥ bāhya-paṅkti-gata-madhya-koṣṭha-dvayaṃ tad-antargata-paṅkti-gatamadhya-koṣṭha-dvayam iti dvārasyaikasmin bhāge koṣṭha-catuṣṭayenaikā  #
analyzed: tatra prakāraḥ bāhya paṅkti gata madhya koṣṭha dvayam tad antargata paṅkti gata madhya koṣṭha dvayam iti dvārasya ekasmin bhāge koṣṭha catuṣṭayena ekā  /
śobhā bhavati

original: tatra bāhya-paṅkti-gatam eka-koṣṭhaṃ tad-antargata-paṅkti-gataṃ koṣṭha-trayam iti / evaṃ
analyzed: tatra bāhya paṅkti gatam eka koṣṭham tad antargata paṅkti gatam koṣṭha trayam iti evam
koṣṭha catuṣṭayena ekā upaśobhā bhavati

original: atra bāhya-paṅkti-gata-koṣṭha-traya-tad-antargata-paṅkti-gatam ekaṃ koṣṭham iti tathā koṣṭha-ṣaṭkena koṇam iti /
analyzed: atra bāhya paṅkti gata koṣṭha traya tad antargata paṅkti gatam ekam koṣṭham iti tathā koṣṭha ṣaṭkena koṇam iti
evam aparasmin bhāge pi śobhā upaśobhā koṇāni boddhavyāni

original: evaṃ dik-catuṣṭaye 'pi militvā dvādaśādhikaṃ śataṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: evam diś catuṣṭaye militvā dvādaśa adhikam śatam bhavati iti
atra anuktam śāradātilake bodhyam
tatas deśikaḥ snāna pūrvam vidhānam
vidhāya ātma pūjā avasānam vidhi jñaḥ
sva vāma agratas śaṅkham api arghya pādyā
camādyāni pātrāṇi sampūritāni
vidhāya anyatas puṣpa gandha akṣata ādyam
kara kṣālanam pṛṣṭhatas ca api pātram
pradīpa āvalī dīpite sarvam anyat
sva dṛś gocare sādhanam ca ādadīta

original: tad-anantaraṃ vidhijñaḥ āgamokta-prakārajñaḥ deśiko guruḥ snāna-pūrvakaṃ vidhānaṃ
analyzed: tad anantaram vidhi jñaḥ āgama ukta prakāra jñaḥ deśikaḥ guruḥ snāna pūrvakam vidhānam
sva gṛhya ukta ādi snāna vidhim ātma pūjā paryantam samāpya sva vāma agre śaṅkha arghya pādya ācamānīya pātrāṇi
jala ādi svaccha dravyaiḥ sampūritāni

original: kṛtvā yathottaraṃ sthāpayitvānyato dakṣiṇa-bhāge puṣpāṇi pūjā-dravyāṇi nidhāya kara-prakṣālaṇa-pātram
analyzed: kṛtvā yathottaram sthāpayitvā anyatas dakṣiṇa bhāge puṣpāṇi pūjā dravyāṇi nidhāya kara prakṣālaṇa pātram

original: ekaṃ pṛṣṭha-deśe nidhāya sarvam anyat sādhanam upakaraṇaṃ sva-dṛg-gocare cakṣur-gocare
analyzed: ekam pṛṣṭha deśe nidhāya sarvam anyat sādhanam upakaraṇam sva dṛś gocare cakṣuḥ gocare
pradīpa śreṇi virājite sthāpayet

original: atrāparo viśeṣaḥ śrī-paramānanda-bhaṭṭācārya-kṛte prapañca-sāra-vivaraṇe draṣṭavyaḥ // KrdC_4.9-10 //
analyzed: atra aparaḥ viśeṣaḥ śrī paramānanda bhaṭṭa ācārya kṛte prapañcasāra vivaraṇe draṣṭavyaḥ
vāyavya āśā ādi īśa paryantam arcya
pīṭhasya udak gauravī paṅktiḥ ādau
pūjyaḥ nyatra api āmbikeyaḥ kara abjaiḥ
pāśam dantam śṛṇī abhītī dadhānaḥ

original: pīṭhasya rāśi-pīṭhasya udak uttara-bhāge vāyavya-koṇād īśāna-koṇa-paryantaṃ guru-sambandhinī paṅktir ādau prathamataḥ pūjyā /
analyzed: pīṭhasya rāśi pīṭhasya udak uttara bhāge vāyavya koṇāt īśāna koṇa paryantam guru sambandhinī paṅktiḥ ādau prathamatas pūjyā

original: prayogas tu oṃ gurubhyo namaḥ iti /
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu om gurubhyaḥ namaḥ iti
anyatra dakṣiṇa bhāge āmbikeyaḥ gaṇapatiḥ pūjyaḥ

original: kīdṛśaṃ ? hasta-padmaiḥ sva-dantaṃ śṛṇim aṅkuśam abhayaṃ dadhānaḥ // KrdC_4.11 //
analyzed: kīdṛśam hasta padmaiḥ svadantam śṛṇim aṅkuśam abhayam dadhānaḥ

original: adhunā kalaśa-sthāpana-prakāraṃ darśayati yato deśika ity ādinā-
analyzed: adhunā kalaśa sthāpana prakāram darśayati yatas deśikaḥ iti ādinā
ārādhya ādhāra śakti ādi amara caraṇa pau adhi atho madhya bhāge

original: dharmādīn vahnir akṣaḥ-pavana-śiva-gatān dikṣv adharmādikāṃś ca /
analyzed: dharma ādīn vahniḥ akṣaḥ pavana śiva gatān dikṣu adharma ādikān ca
madhye śeṣa abja bimba tritaya guṇa gaṇa ātma ādikam keśarāṇām

original: vahner madhye ca śaktīr nava-samabhiyajet pīṭha-mantreṇa bhūyaḥ // Krd_4.12 //
analyzed: vahneḥ madhye ca śaktīḥ nava samabhiyajet pīṭha mantreṇa bhūyas

original: athānantaraṃ maṇḍala-madhya-bhāge ādhāra-śaktim ārabhya kalpa-vṛkṣa-paryantam ārādhya
analyzed: atha anantaram maṇḍala madhya bhāge ādhāra śaktim ārabhya kalpavṛkṣa paryantam ārādhya

original: pūjayitvā pīṭha-nyāsa-krameṇa vahnīti agny-ādi-koṇa-gatān dharmādīn pūrvādi-caturdikṣu
analyzed: pūjayitvā pīṭha nyāsa krameṇa vahni iti agni ādi koṇa gatān dharma ādīn pūrva ādi catur dikṣu

original: adharmādīn tathā madhye śeṣaṃ padmaṃ tathā sūrya-soma-vahnīnāṃ bimba-trayaṃ dvī̀adaśa-ṣoḍaśa-daśa-kalā-vyāptaṃ
analyzed: adharma ādīn tathā madhye śeṣam padmam tathā sūrya soma vahnīnām bimba trayam dvīa daśa ṣoḍaśa daśa kalā vyāptam
maṇḍala trayam tathā ātma ādi catuṣṭayam pūjayet

original: atha keśarāṇāṃ madhye karṇikāyāṃ cca vimalādyā nava-śaktīḥ pūrvādi-krameṇa pūjayet /
analyzed: atha keśarāṇām madhye karṇikāyām ca vimalā ādyāḥ nava śaktīḥ pūrva ādi krameṇa pūjayet

original: bhūyaḥ punar api pūrvoktena pīṭha-mantreṇa pīṭhaṃ pūjayed ity arthaḥ // KrdC_4.12 //
analyzed: bhūyas punar api pūrva uktena pīṭha mantreṇa pīṭham pūjayet iti arthaḥ
tatas śālīn madhye kamalam amalān taṇḍulavarān

original: api nyasyed darbhāṃs tad upari ca kūrcākṣata-yutān /
analyzed: api nyasyet darbhān tat upari ca kūrca akṣata yutān

original: nyaset prādakṣiṇyāt tad-upari kṛśānor daśa kalā-
analyzed: nyaset prādakṣiṇyāt tad upari kṛśānoḥ daśa kalā

original: ya-kārādy-arṇādyā yajatu ca sugandhādibhir imāḥ // Krd_4.13 //
analyzed: yakāra ādi arṇa ādyāḥ yajatu ca su gandha ādibhiḥ imāḥ

original: tad-anantaraṃ madhye-kamalaṃ kamala-madhye śālīn āḍhaka-parimitān tathā śubhrān śāly-aṣṭa-bhāga-parimitān taṇḍulān śreṣṭhān nyasyet sthāpayet  #
analyzed: tad anantaram madhye kamalam kamala madhye śālīn āḍhaka parimitān tathā śubhrān śāli aṣṭa bhāga parimitān taṇḍulān śreṣṭhān nyasyet sthāpayet
yat uktam
śālīn vai karṇikāyām ca nikṣipya āḍhaka saṃmitān

original: taṇḍulāṃś ca tad-aṣṭāṃśān darbhaiḥ kūrcaiḥ pravinyaset // iti /
analyzed: taṇḍulān ca tad aṣṭa aṃśān darbhaiḥ kūrcaiḥ pravinyaset iti
tad upari taṇḍula upari kūrca akṣata yuktān darbhān vinyaset

original: kuśa-traya-ghaṭito brahma-granthiḥ kūrca-śabdenocyate kūrcaḥ kuśa-muṣṭir iti tripāṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: kuśa traya ghaṭitaḥ brahmagranthiḥ kūrca śabdena ucyate kūrcaḥ kuśa muṣṭiḥ iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: tad-upari kūrcopari kṛśānor vahner daśa kalā ya-kārādayo daśa-varṇā ādyāḥ prathamā yāsāṃ tāḥ prādakṣiṇyena nyaset tad-anantaraṃ imā daśa kalā  #
analyzed: tad upari kūrca upari kṛśānoḥ vahneḥ daśa kalāḥ yakāra ādayaḥ daśa varṇāḥ ādyāḥ prathamāḥ yāsām tāḥ prādakṣiṇyena nyaset tad anantaram imāḥ daśa kalāḥ
gandha ādibhiḥ pūjayet
tāḥ ca

original: suśrīḥ surūpā kapilā havya-vahā kavyavahā // iti /
analyzed: suśrīḥ surūpā kapilā havyavahā kavyavahā iti

original: prayogas tu dhūmrārciṣe nama iti // KrdC_4.13 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu dhūmra arciṣe namaḥ iti
nyaset kumbham tatra triguṇi tala sat tantu kalitam
japan tāram dhūpaiḥ su parimalitam joṅkaṭa mayaiḥ
ka bha ādyaiḥ kumbhe smin ṭhaṭ avasitibhiḥ varṇa yugalaiḥ

original: tathānyasyābhyarcyās tad-anu kha-maṇer dvādaśa kalāḥ // Krd_4.14 //
analyzed: tathā anyasya abhyarcyāḥ tadanu khamaṇeḥ dvādaśa kalāḥ

original: tatra daśa-kalā-maye kūrce tī̀aram oṅkāram uccaran kumbhaṃ nyaset /
analyzed: tatra daśa kalā maye kūrce tīaram oṅkāram uccaran kumbham nyaset
kumbhaḥ tu suvarṇa ādi nirmitaḥ tat uktam

original: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi mṛṇmayaṃ vā yathoditam /
analyzed: sauvarṇam rājatam vā api mṛṇmayam vā yathā uditam

original: kṣāṇayed astra-mantreṇa kumbhaṃ samyak sureśvari // iti /
analyzed: kṣāṇayet astramantreṇa kumbham samyak sureśvari iti

original: kīdṛśam ? grīvāyāṃ triguṇitā lasantaḥ śobhamānā ye tantavaḥ kanyā-kartita-kārpāsa-sūtrāṇi taiḥ kalitam astra-mantreṇa veṣṭitam /
analyzed: kīdṛśam grīvāyām tri guṇitāḥ lasantaḥ śobhamānāḥ ye tantavaḥ kanyā kartita kārpāsa sūtrāṇi taiḥ kalitam astramantreṇa veṣṭitam
punar kīdṛśam

original: joṅkaṭa-mayaiḥ kṛṣṇāguru-pradhānair dhūpaiḥ sudhūpitaṃ tad-anantaraṃ khamaṇeḥ sūryasya dvādaśa-kalā asmin kumbhe nyasya anantaraṃ pūjyāḥ /
analyzed: joṅkaṭa mayaiḥ kṛṣṇa aguru pradhānaiḥ dhūpaiḥ su dhūpitam tad anantaram khamaṇeḥ sūryasya dvādaśa kalāḥ asmin kumbhe nyasya anantaram pūjyāḥ
kaiḥ varṇa yugalaiḥ
kīdṛśaiḥ kabha ādyaiḥ kakāra bhakāra ādyaiḥ
punar kīdṛśaiḥ
ṭha ḍ avasitibhiḥ ṭhakāra ḍakāra avasānaiḥ

original: ayam arthaḥ-anuloma-paṭhita-ka-kārādy-ekaikam akṣaraṃ pratiloma-paṭhita-bha-kārādy-ekaikam akṣareṇa sahitaṃ tapiny-ādiṣu dvādaśa-kalāsu saṃyojya  #
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ anuloma paṭhita kakāra ādi ekaikam akṣaram pratiloma paṭhita bhakāra ādi ekaikam akṣareṇa sahitam tapinī ādiṣu dvādaśa kalāsu saṃyojya
nyāsa ādikam kāryam tāḥ ca

original: tapanī tāpanī dhūmrā bhrāmarī jvālinī ruciḥ /
suṣumṇā bhogadā viśvā bodhinī dhāriṇī kṣamā // iti /
analyzed: suṣumṇā bhoga dā viśvā bodhinī dhāriṇī kṣamā iti
prayogaḥ tukam bham tapinyai namaḥ

original: khaṃ vaṃ tāinyai namaḥ ity ādi kāryam //14//
analyzed: kham vam tāinyai namaḥ iti ādi kāryam
evam saṅkalpya agnim ādhāra rūpam
bhānum tadvat kumbha rūpam vidhi jñaiḥ
nyasyet tasmin akṣata ādyaiḥ sametam
kūrcam svarṇaiḥ ratna varyaiḥ pradīptam

original: evam anena prakāreṇādhāra-rūpam agniṃ saṅkalpya tadvat kumbha-rūpaṃ bhānuṃ vicintya
analyzed: evam anena prakāreṇa ādhāra rūpam agnim saṅkalpya tadvat kumbha rūpam bhānum vicintya

original: tasmin kumbhe vidhijña āgamokta-prakārābhijñaḥ mūla-mantreṇākṣatādyaiḥ sahitaṃ kūrcaṃ
analyzed: tasmin kumbhe vidhi jñaḥ āgama ukta prakāra abhijñaḥ mūlamantreṇa akṣata ādyaiḥ sahitam kūrcam
pūrva ukta lakṣaṇaiḥ suvarṇa ratna varyaiḥ navaratnaiḥ śobhitam nyaset
tat uktam bhairaveṇa
etān nayitvā tad madhye śukla puṣpam sita akṣatam

original: nava-ratnaṃ ca kūrcaṃ ca mūlenaiva vinikṣipet // iti // KrdC_4.15 //
analyzed: navaratnam ca kūrcam ca mūlena eva vinikṣipet iti
atha kvātha toyaiḥ kṣakāra ādi varṇaiḥ
akāra avasānaiḥ samāpūrayet tam
sva mantra tri jāpa avasānam payobhiḥ

original: gavāṃ pañca-gavyair jalaiḥ kevalair vā // Krd_4.16 //
analyzed: gavām pañcagavyaiḥ jalaiḥ kevalaiḥ vā

original: athānantaraṃ pīṭha-kumbhayor aikyaṃ vicintya pañcāśad-varṇair oṣadhi-toyaiḥ palāśa-tvag-jalaiḥ
analyzed: atha anantaram pīṭha kumbhayoḥ aikyam vicintya pañcāśat varṇaiḥ oṣadhi toyaiḥ palāśa tvac jalaiḥ

original: kṣīra-druma-tvak-kvātha-jalair vā sarvauṣadhi-jalair vā gavāṃ payobhir vā pañca-gavyair
analyzed: kṣīradruma tvac kvātha jalaiḥ vā sarva oṣadhi jalaiḥ vā gavām payobhiḥ vā pañcagavyaiḥ

original: vā kevala-jalaiḥ karpūrādi-jalair vā tīrtha-jalair vā kṣa-kārādi-varṇair akārāvasānair
analyzed: vā kevala jalaiḥ karpūra ādi jalaiḥ vā tīrtha jalaiḥ vā kṣakāra ādi varṇaiḥ akāra avasānaiḥ
viloma mātṛkābhiḥ sva mantra tri japa avasānam mūlamantra vāra traya japī antam yathā
syāt evam pūrayet
kalaśa jale smin vasu yuga saṅkhyāḥ
svara gaṇa pūrvāḥ nyasatu tathā eva
uḍupa kalāḥ tāḥ salila sugandhā
kṣata sumanobhiḥ tadanu yajeta

original: tasmin kalaśa-jale uḍupa-kalāś candra-kalāḥ vasu-yuga-saṅkhyāḥ ṣoḍaśa-saṅkhyāḥ svara-gaṇa-pūrvā a-kārādi-varṇa-pūrvā nyasatu /
analyzed: tasmin kalaśa jale uḍupa kalāḥ candra kalāḥ vasu yuga saṅkhyāḥ ṣoḍaśa saṅkhyāḥ svara gaṇa pūrvāḥ akāra ādi varṇa pūrvāḥ nyasatu

original: tad-anu tad-anantaraṃ tāś candra-kalās tathaiva tenaiva krameṇa puṣpāñjalibhiḥ pūjayet / tāś coktāḥ-
analyzed: tadanu tad anantaram tāḥ candra kalāḥ tathā eva tena eva krameṇa puṣpa añjalibhiḥ pūjayet tāḥ ca uktāḥ

original: amṛtā mānadā pūṣā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭī ratir dhṛtiḥ /
analyzed: amṛtā mānadā pūṣā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ ratiḥ dhṛtiḥ

original: śaśinī candrikā kāntir jyotsnā śrīḥ prītir aṅgadā /

analyzed: pūrṇā pūrṇāmṛtā ca iti
adhunā vaiṣṇava gandha aṣṭakam āha

original: saśītam ity udīritaṃ hareḥ priyāṣṭa-gandhakam // Krd_4.18 //
udīcyam uśīraṃ kuṣṭaṃ kuṅkumam ambu-bālā netra-bālā lohaḥ kṛṣṇāgurur jaṭayā saha
analyzed: udīcyam uśīram kuṣṭam kuṅkumam ambubālā netrabālā lohaḥ kṛṣṇa aguruḥ jaṭayā saha

original: murā jaṭā māṃsī ca etaiḥ saha śītaṃ candanam iti hareḥ priya-kāri-gandhāṣṭakam uktam // KrdC_4.18 //
analyzed: murā jaṭā māṃsī ca etaiḥ saha śītam candanam iti hareḥ priya kāri gandhāṣṭakam uktam
śaṅkhapūraṇam āha
kvātha toya paripūrita udare
saṃviloḍya vidhinā aṣṭa gandhakam
soma sūrya śikhinām pṛthak kalāḥ
seca karma viniyojayet kramāt

original: udare śaṅkhe vidhināgamokta-prakāreṇa mūla-manteṇa pūrvokta-kvātha-jalena paripūrite
analyzed: udare śaṅkhe vidhinā āgama ukta prakāreṇa mūla manteṇa pūrva ukta kvātha jalena paripūrite

original: gandhī̀aṣṭakaṃ namo-mantreṇa saviloḍya dattvā soma-sūrya-vahnīnāṃ kalāḥ pṛthak samāvāhya
analyzed: gandhī aṣṭakam namaḥ mantreṇa sa viloḍya dattvā soma sūrya vahnīnām kalāḥ pṛthak samāvāhya

original: seca-karma prāṇa-pratiṣṭhā-karma krameṇa viniyojayet kuryāt // KrdC_4.19 //
analyzed: seca karma prāṇa pratiṣṭhā karma krameṇa viniyojayet kuryāt
tadvat ā akṣara bhavāḥ tu ka ādibhiḥ
ṭādibhiḥ punar ukāra jāḥ kalāḥ
pa ādibhiḥ ma lipi jāḥ tu bindu jāḥ
ṣa ādibhiḥ svara gaṇena nāda jāḥ

original: pūrvokta-prakāreṇa ākṣara-bhavā a-kārākṣara-bhavā daśa kalāḥ kādibhiḥ ka-kārādibhir
analyzed: pūrva ukta prakāreṇa ā akṣara bhavāḥ akāra akṣara bhavāḥ daśa kalāḥ ka ādibhiḥ kakāra ādibhiḥ

original: daśabhir akṣaraiḥ sahitāḥ punar u-kāra-jā u-kārākṣara-bhavā daśa kalāḥ ṭādibhir daśabhir
analyzed: daśabhiḥ akṣaraiḥ sahitāḥ punar ukāra jāḥ ukāra akṣara bhavāḥ daśa kalāḥ ṭādibhiḥ daśabhiḥ

original: akṣaraiḥ sahitās tathā malipi-jā ma-kārākṣara-bhavā daśa kalāḥ pādibhir daśabhir
analyzed: akṣaraiḥ sahitāḥ tathā ma lipi jāḥ makāra akṣara bhavāḥ daśa kalāḥ pādibhiḥ daśabhiḥ

original: akṣaraiḥ sahitās tathā bindujā bindu-prabhavāḥ catasraḥ kalāḥ ṣādibhiś catur-akṣaraiḥ
analyzed: akṣaraiḥ sahitāḥ tathā bindu jāḥ bindu prabhavāḥ catasraḥ kalāḥ ṣa ādibhiḥ catur akṣaraiḥ

original: sahitāḥ tathā nādajā nāda-prabhavāḥ ṣoḍaśca kalāḥ svara-samūhena ṣoḍaśabhiḥ svaraiḥ
analyzed: sahitāḥ tathā nāda jāḥ nāda prabhavāḥ ṣoḍaśa ca kalāḥ svara samūhena ṣoḍaśabhiḥ svaraiḥ
sahitāḥ śaṅkha salile nyasyāḥ tāḥ ca

original: sṛṣṭir ṛddhiḥ smṛtir medhā kāntir lakṣmīr dhṛitḥ sthirā /
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ ṛddhiḥ smṛtiḥ medhā kāntiḥ lakṣmīḥ dhṛitḥ sthirā

original: sthitiḥ siddhir akārotthāḥ kalā daśa samīritaḥ //
analyzed: sthitiḥ siddhiḥ akāra utthāḥ kalāḥ daśa samīritaḥ

original: jarā ca pālinī śāntir aiśvarī rati-kāmike /
analyzed: jarā ca pālinī śāntiḥ aiśvarī rati kāmike

original: varadā hlādinī prītir dīrghā cokāra-jāḥ kalāḥ //
analyzed: varadā hlādinī prītiḥ dīrghā ca ukāra jāḥ kalāḥ

original: tīkṣṇā raudrā bhayā nidrā tantīr kṣut krodhanī kriyā /
analyzed: tīkṣṇā raudrā bhayā nidrā tantīḥ kṣudh krodhanī kriyā

original: utkārī caiva mṛtyuś ca makārākṣarajāḥ kalāḥ //
analyzed: utkārī ca eva mṛtyuḥ ca makāra akṣara jāḥ kalāḥ

original: nivṛttiś ca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntis tathaiva ca /
analyzed: nivṛttiḥ ca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntiḥ tathā eva ca

original: indhikā dīpikā caiva recikā mocikā parā //
analyzed: indhikā dīpikā ca eva recikā mocikā parā

original: sūkṣmā sūkṣmāmṛtā jñānājñānā cāpy āyanī tathā /
analyzed: sūkṣmā sūkṣmā amṛtā jñānā ajñānā ca api āyanī tathā

original: vyāpinī vyoma-rūpā ca anantā nāda-sambhavāḥ // iti /
analyzed: vyāpinī vyomarūpā ca anantā nādasambhavāḥ iti

original: prayogaś ca kaṃ sṛṣṭyai nama ity ādi // KrdC_4.20 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca kam sṛṣṭyai namaḥ ityādi
samāvāhana ante su saṃsthāpanāt prāk
ṛcaḥ tatra tatra abhijapyāḥ budhena

original: samabhyarcya tās tāḥ pṛthak tac ca pātho
analyzed: samabhyarcya tāḥ tāḥ pṛthak tat ca pāthaḥ
rpayet mūlamantreṇa kumbhe yathāvat

original: samāvāhanasyānte 'susaṃsthāpanāt prāk prāṇa-pratiṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvaṃ tatra tatra sthāne paṇḍitena dhāryāś cābhijapyāḥ paṭhanīyāḥ /
analyzed: samāvāhanasya ante susaṃsthāpanāt prāk prāṇa pratiṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvam tatra tatra sthāne paṇḍitena dhāryāḥ ca abhijapyāḥ paṭhanīyāḥ

original: ayam arthaḥ-śaṅkha-jale 'kāra-prabhava-ka-kārādi-kalāvāhanānantaraṃ prāṇa-pratiṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvaṃ haṃsaḥ śuciṣad iti ṛcaṃ paṭhet /
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ śaṅkha jale kāra prabhava kakāra ādi kalā vāhana anantaram prāṇa pratiṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvam haṃsaḥ śuciṣad iti ṛcam paṭhet

original: u-kāra-prabhava-ṭadi-kalāvāhanānantaraṃ pratad viṣṇuḥ iti ṛcaṃ paṭhet /
analyzed: ukāra prabhava ṭadi kalā vāhana anantaram viṣṇuḥ iti ṛcam paṭhet

original: ma-kārādi-prabhava-pa-kārādi-kalāvāhanānantaraṃ tat savitur ity ādi ṛcaṃ paṭhet /
analyzed: makāra ādi prabhava pakāra ādi kalā vāhana anantaram tat savituḥ iti ādi ṛcam paṭhet

original: nāda-prabhava-ta-kārādi-kalāvāhanānantaraṃ viṣṇor yonir ity ādi ṛcaṃ paṭhet /
analyzed: nāda prabhava takāra ādi kalā vāhana anantaram viṣṇoḥ yoniḥ iti ādi ṛcam paṭhet
anantaram mūlamantram śaṅkha jale vilomena japet

original: tās tāḥ kalāḥ pṛthag ekaikaśaḥ yathāvat yathā-vidhi sampūjya tac ca pī̀athaḥ tac-chaṅkhodakaṃ mūla-mantraṃ paṭhitvā kumbhe vinikṣipet // KrdC_4.21
analyzed: tāḥ tāḥ kalāḥ pṛthak ekaikaśas yathāvat yathāvidhi sampūjya tat ca tat śaṅkha udakam mūlamantram paṭhitvā kumbhe vinikṣipet  /
sahakāra bodhi panasa stavakaiḥ
śatamanyu vallik kalitaiḥ kalaśam
pidadhātu puṣpa phala taṇḍulakaiḥ
abhipūrṇayā api śubha cakrikayā
sahakāraḥ āmraḥ
bodhiḥ aśvatthaḥ
panasaḥ kaṇṭaki phala vṛkṣaḥ

original: eteṣāṃ stavakaiḥ pallavaiḥ śatamanyu-valli-kalitair indavallī-baddhaiḥ kalaśaṃ kalaśa-mukhaṃ
analyzed: eteṣām stavakaiḥ pallavaiḥ śatamanyu valli kalitaiḥ inda vallī baddhaiḥ kalaśam kalaśa mukham

original: suradruma-dhiyā pidadhātu samācchādayatu tathā puṣpādibhiḥ paripūrṇayā śubha-cakrikayā
analyzed: suradruma dhiyā pidadhātu samācchādayatu tathā puṣpa ādibhiḥ paripūrṇayā śubha cakrikayā
śobhamāna śarāveṇa tad upari pidadhāt
abhiveṣṭayet tadanu kumbha mukham
nava nirmala aṃśuka yugena budhaḥ
samalaṅkṛte tra kusuma ādibhiḥ api
abhivāhayet parataram ca mahaḥ

original: tad anu tad-anantaraṃ nūtana-mala-rahita-vastra-dvayena paritḥ kumbha-mukham abhiveṣṭayet /
analyzed: tat anu tad anantaram nūtana mala rahita vastra dvayena paritas kumbha mukham abhiveṣṭayet

original: anantaraṃ kumbhe puṣpādibhir alaṅkṛte paramotkṛṣṭaṃ mahas tejaḥ pūjya-devatā-svarūpam āvāhayet āvāhanādikaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: anantaram kumbhe puṣpa ādibhiḥ alaṅkṛte parama utkṛṣṭam mahaḥ tejaḥ pūjya devatā svarūpam āvāhayet āvāhana ādikam kuryāt

original: yathā śrī-kṛṣṇehāgaccheha tiṣṭha iha saṃnidhehi // KrdC_4.23 //
analyzed: yathā śrī kṛṣṇa iha āgaccha iha tiṣṭha iha saṃnidhehi
sakalīvidhāya kalaśa stham amum
harim arṇa tattva manu vinyasanaiḥ
paripūjayet guruḥ atha avahitaḥ
parivāra yuktam upacāra gaṇaiḥ

original: amuṃ kalaśasthaṃ hariṃ sakalīkṛtya devatāṅge ṣaḍ-aṅgānāṃ nyāsaḥ syāt sakalīkṛtir iti /
analyzed: amum kalaśa stham harim sakalīkṛtya devatā aṅge ṣaṣ aṅgānām nyāsaḥ syāt sakalīkṛtiḥ iti

original: uttamāṅgaṃ vidhāya varṇa-tattvam anv iti akṣara-maya-tattva-mantra-nyāsaiḥ saheti rudradharaḥ /
analyzed: uttamāṅgam vidhāya varṇa tattvam anu iti akṣara maya tattva mantra nyāsaiḥ saha iti rudradharaḥ

original: arṇa iti sṛṣṭi-saṃhāra-bhedena aṅgulyāropaṇa-bhedena ca mantra-varṇa-vinyāso 'rṇa-nyāso manu-nyāsaḥ manu-puṭita-mātṛkā-nyāsa ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: arṇaḥ iti sṛṣṭi saṃhāra bhedena aṅguli āropaṇa bhedena ca mantra varṇa vinyāsaḥ ṇa nyāsaḥ manu nyāsaḥ manu puṭita mātṛkā nyāsaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ity ādi-nyāsais tat-tejo-rūpa-dharaṃ sakalaṃ saguṇaṃ śarīraṃ kuryād iti bhairava-tripāṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: iti ādi nyāsaiḥ tad tejaḥ rūpa dharam sakalam sa guṇam śarīram kuryāt iti bhairava tripāṭhinaḥ
pi evam āha pīṭṭa nyāsa karanyāsau vinā api prathama dvitīya paṭala prokta nyāsa ādi jātaiḥ iti

original: kecit aṣṭādaśākṣare pakṣe tattva-nyāsa-sthāne mantrākṣara-nyāso draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: kecid aṣṭādaśa akṣare pakṣe tattva nyāsa sthāne mantra akṣara nyāsaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: athānantaram avahitaḥ sāvadhāno guruḥ sa-parivāraṃ āvaraṇa-sametam upacāra-gaṇaiḥ ṣoḍaśa-pañcopacārānyatamopacāreṇa
analyzed: atha anantaram avahitaḥ sa avadhānaḥ guruḥ sa parivāram āvaraṇa sametam upacāra gaṇaiḥ ṣoḍaśa pañca upacāra anyatama upacāreṇa
pūjayet
pūjā kramam āha
dattvā āsanam svāgatam iti udīyas
tathā adhya pādya ācamanīyakāni
deyāni pūrvam madhuparka yūñji
nanda ātmajāya ācamana antakāni
sthānam ca vāsaḥ ca vibhūṣaṇāni
sa aṅgāya tasmai viniyojya mantrī
gātre pavitraiḥ atha gandha puṣpaiḥ
pūrvam yajet

original: tasmai sāṅgāya nandātmajāya kṛṣṇāya āsanaṃ padmādi-kusuma-rūpaṃ dattvā svāgatam ity
analyzed: tasmai sāṅgāya nanda ātmajāya kṛṣṇāya āsanam padma ādi kusuma rūpam dattvā svāgatam iti

original: udīrya svāgatam iti śabdam uccārya anantaraṃ pūrvaṃ prathamato 'rghya-pādyācamanīyakāni
analyzed: udīrya svāgatam iti śabdam uccārya anantaram pūrvam prathamatas arghya pādya ācamanīyakāni

original: madhuparka-sahitāni deyāni ācamanāntakāni madhu-parkaṃ dattvā punar ācamanīyaṃ deyaṃ
analyzed: madhuparka sahitāni deyāni ācamana antakāni madhuparkam dattvā punar ācamanīyam deyam

original: snānaṃ gandha-jalādibhiḥ kāryaṃ vāso vastra-yugalaṃ śarīre deyaṃ vibhūṣaṇāni kuṇḍalādīni
analyzed: snānam gandha jala ādibhiḥ kāryam vāsaḥ vastra yugalam śarīre deyam vibhūṣaṇāni kuṇḍala ādīni
yathāsthānam viniyojyāni

original: athānantaram asya parameśvarasya gātre śarīre pūrvaṃ prathamataḥ pavitraiḥ śuddhair gandha-puṣpair nyāsa-prakāreṇa yajet pūjayet // KrdC_4.25-26
analyzed: atha anantaram asya parameśvarasya gātre śarīre pūrvam prathamatas pavitraiḥ śuddhaiḥ gandha puṣpaiḥ nyāsa prakāreṇa yajet pūjayet  /
pūjā prakāram eva āha
sṛṣṭi sthitī sva aṅga yugam ca veṇum
mālām abhijñāna vara aśma mukhyau
mūlena ca ātma arcana vat prapūjya
samarcayet āvaraṇāni bhūyas
varṇa nyāsa mantraiḥ yathākramam pūjayet

original: oṃ goṃ oṃ namaḥ ity ādi /
analyzed: om goṃ om namaḥ iti ādi

original: sṛṣṭi-sthitī pūrvoktaṃ svāṅga-yugaṃ pañcāṅga-daśāṅga-nyāsau veṇuṃ mālāṃ vanamālām abhijñāna-varaṃ śrīvatsalāñchanam iti aśma-mukhyaḥ kaustubhaḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭi sthitī pūrva uktam sva aṅga yugam pañcāṅga daśa aṅga nyāsau veṇum mālām vanamālām abhijñāna varam śrīvatsa lāñchanam iti aśma mukhyaḥ kaustubhaḥ

original: etāni sampūjya mūlena cātmārcanavat yathātmani parameśvara-pūjā mūla-mantreṇa pañca-kṛtvaḥ
analyzed: etāni sampūjya mūlena ca ātma arcana vat yathā ātmani parameśvara pūjā mūlamantreṇa pañca kṛtvas

original: tulasyādi-puṣpāñjalibhiḥ pada-dvayādiṣu kṛtā tathā kumbhastham api sampūjya bhūyaḥ
analyzed: tulasī ādi puṣpa añjalibhiḥ pada dvaya ādiṣu kṛtā tathā kumbha stham api sampūjya bhūyas
punar api āvaraṇāni vakṣyamāṇāni pūjayet

original: aṣṭādaśārṇa-pakṣe sṛṣṭy-ādi-sthāneṣu varṇa-nyāsa-pada-nyāsānāṃ pūjā kāryeti boddhavyam // KrdC_4.27 //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa arṇa pakṣe sṛṣṭi ādi sthāneṣu varṇa nyāsa padanyāsānām pūjā kāryā iti boddhavyam
āvaraṇa pūjā kramam āha

original: dikṣv atha dāma-sudāmau vasudāmaḥ kiṅkiṇī ca sampūjyāḥ /
analyzed: dikṣu atha dāma sudāmau vasudāmaḥ kiṅkiṇī ca sampūjyāḥ

original: tejo-rūpās tad-bahiraṅgāni ca keśareṣu samabhiyajet // Krd_4.28 //
analyzed: tejaḥ rūpāḥ tad bahis aṅgāni ca keśareṣu samabhiyajet

original: athānantaraṃ karṇikāyāṃ devasya pūrvādi-catur-dikṣu dāmādayaś catvāraḥ pūjyāḥ /
analyzed: atha anantaram karṇikāyām devasya pūrva ādi catur dikṣu dāma ādayaḥ catvāraḥ pūjyāḥ
kīdṛśāḥ tejaḥ rūpāḥ dedīpyamānāḥ

original: prayogas tu-oṃ dāmāya nama ity ādi /
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu om dāmāya namaḥ iti ādi
dvitīya āvaraṇam āha tad bahis iti
karṇikā koṇeṣu aṅgāni samabhiyajet
pūjā vidhānam āha
hutavaha nirṛti samīra śiva dikṣu hṛd ādi varma paryantam

original: pūrvādi-dikṣv athāstraṃ krameṇa gandhādibhiḥ suśuddha-manāḥ // Krd_4.29 //
analyzed: pūrva ādi dikṣu atha astram krameṇa gandha ādibhiḥ su śuddha manāḥ

analyzed: kim artham saṃsāra eva sāgaraḥ tasya uttīrtyai uttaraṇāya
punar kim artham
sakala manoratha prāpti artham
dhūpa dāna vidhim darśayati
sāra aṅgāre ghṛta vilulitaiḥ jarjaraiḥ saṃvikīrṇaiḥ
guggulu ādyaiḥ ghana parimalaiḥ dhūpam āpādya mantrī
dadyāt nīcais danuja mathanāya apareṇa atha doṣṇā
ghaṇṭām gandha akṣata kusumakaiḥ arcitām vādayānaḥ
sāra aṅgāre dṛḍha kāṣṭha aṅgāre
khādira aṅgāre iti tripāṭhinaḥ
saṃvikīrṇaiḥ kṣiptaiḥ guggulu ādyaiḥ guggulu śarkarā madhu candana aguru śīraiḥ ghṛta vilulitaiḥ

original: dhṛta-plutaiḥ jarjaraiḥ kuṭṭanena cūrṇitair ghana-parimalair niviḍa-saurabha-śālibhiḥ
analyzed: dhṛta plutaiḥ jarjaraiḥ kuṭṭanena cūrṇitaiḥ ghana parimalaiḥ nibiḍa saurabha śālibhiḥ

original: dhūpam āpādya kṛtvā mantrī upāsakaḥ nīcair nābhi-pradeśe danuja-mathanāya gopāla-kṛṣṇāya dadyāt /
analyzed: dhūpam āpādya kṛtvā mantrī upāsakaḥ nīcais nābhi pradeśe danuja mathanāya gopālakṛṣṇāya dadyāt

original: kiṃ kurvan ? athānantaram apareṇa vāmena doṣṇā hastena gaja-dhvani-mantra-mātaḥ svāheti ghaṇṭāṃ vādayan /
analyzed: kim kurvan atha anantaram apareṇa vāmena doṣṇā hastena gajadhvani mantram ātar svāhā iti ghaṇṭām vādayan
kimbhūtām gandha akṣata puṣpaiḥ pūjitām
dīpa dāne vidhim darśayati
tadvat dīpam surabhi ghṛta saṃsikta karpūra vartyā
dīptam dṛṣṭi ādi ati viśada dhīḥ padma paryantam uccais

original: dattvā puṣpāñjalim api ca vidhāyārpayitvā ca pādyaṃ
analyzed: dattvā puṣpa añjalim api ca vidhāya arpayitvā ca pādyam
sā ācāmam kalpayatu vipula svarṇa pātre nivedya
tadvat āpādya dīpam kuryāt

original: kayā ? surabhi sugandhi yad ghṛtaṃ tena siktā ukṣitā karpūra-sahitā vartis tayā /
analyzed: kayā surabhi sugandhi yat ghṛtam tena siktā ukṣitā karpūra sahitā vartiḥ tayā
kīdṛśam dṛṣṭyā dīptam
dṛṣṭi manoharam iti rudradharaḥ

original: padma-paryantaṃ mastaka-paryantam uccair upari dattvā dṛṣṭyādīti dakṣiṇāvartena padma-paryantam /
analyzed: padma paryantam mastaka paryantam uccais upari dattvā dṛṣṭi ādi iti dakṣiṇa āvartena padma paryantam
caraṇa kamala paryantam iti tripāṭhinaḥ
pāda paryantam iti kvacid pāṭhaḥ

original: anantaraṃ puṣpāñjalim api śirasi dattvā pādyācamanīye ca dattvā vipula-svarṇa-pātre bṛhat-kanaka-bhājane naivedyaṃ kalpayatu sampādayatu /
analyzed: anantaram puṣpa añjalim api śirasi dattvā pādya ācamanīye ca dattvā vipula svarṇa pātre bṛhat kanaka bhājane naivedyam kalpayatu sampādayatu

original: sācāmam ācamana-sahitaṃ prathamaṃ vadanety ādibhir ācamanaṃ dattvā anantaraṃ naivedyaṃ dadātv ity arthaḥ // KrdC_4.51 //
analyzed: sa ācāmam ācamana sahitam prathamam vadana iti ādibhiḥ ācamanam dattvā anantaram naivedyam dadātu iti arthaḥ
naivedya svarūpam darśayati
surabhitareṇa dugdha haviṣā su śṛtena sitā
samupadeśakaiḥ rucira hṛdya vicitra rasaiḥ
dadhi navanīta nūtana sitopala pūpa puli
ghṛta guḍa nārikela kadalī phala puṣpa rasaiḥ

original: atisurabhiṇā dugdhānnena suśṛtena supakvena sitā-samupadeśakaiḥ śarkarā-vyañjanaiḥ saha /
analyzed: ati surabhiṇā dugdha annena su śṛtena su pakvena sitā samupadeśakaiḥ śarkarā vyañjanaiḥ saha

original: śarkarayā saha upadaṃśakair vyañjanair iti tripāṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: śarkarayā saha upadaṃśakaiḥ vyañjanaiḥ iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: asmin pakṣe śucitena sitā-samupadaṃśakair iti pāṭhaḥ /
analyzed: asmin pakṣe śucitena sitā samupadaṃśakaiḥ iti pāṭhaḥ

original: rucira icchī̀akaraḥ hṛdyaḥ susvādaḥ vicitro madhurādi-raso yeṣu taiḥ nūtanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ
analyzed: ruciraḥ icchī akaraḥ hṛdyaḥ su svādaḥ vicitraḥ madhura ādi rasaḥ yeṣu taiḥ nūtanam śreṣṭham

original: sitopalaṃ khaṇḍādi-prasiddhaṃ puṣpa-raso madhu etair dravyair naivedyaṃ kalpayatu // KrdC_4.52 //
analyzed: sitopalam khaṇḍa ādi prasiddham puṣpa rasaḥ madhu etaiḥ dravyaiḥ naivedyam kalpayatu
kim viśiṣṭam naivedyam kalpayatu tatra āha
astra ukṣitam tat ari mudrikayā abhirakṣya
vāyavyatīya pariśoṣitam agni doṣṇā
sandahya vāmakara saudha rasa abhipūrṇam
mantra amṛtīkṛtam atha abhimṛṣan prajapyāt
manum aṣṭaśas surabhimudrikayā
paripūrṇam arcayatu gandha mukhaiḥ
harim arcayet atha kṛta prasava añjaliḥ
āsyataḥ sya prasaret ca mahaḥ

original: mūla-mantrāstra-mantreṇāstrāya phaḍ-ity anena vā ukṣitaṃ siktaṃ cakra-mudrayābhirakṣya
analyzed: mūlamantra astra mantreṇa astrāya phaṭ iti anena vai ukṣitam siktam cakra mudrayā abhirakṣya
vāyavyā iti vāyu bīja japta udaka prokṣaṇa pariśoṣita doṣam agni doṣṇā sandahya iti ram

original: iti vahni-bījābhijapta-dakṣiṇa-kareṇa spṛṣṭvā doṣān dagdhvā vāma-kara-saudha-rasābhipūraṇam
analyzed: iti vahnibīja abhijapta dakṣiṇa kareṇa spṛṣṭvā doṣān dagdhvā vāma kara saudha rasa abhipūraṇam

original: iti vāma-hastena pidhāya baṃ-bīja-japenāmṛta-rasābhipūrṇaṃ vicintya mūla-mantreṇāmṛta-rūpaṃ
analyzed: iti vāma hastena pidhāya baṃ bīja japena amṛta rasa abhipūrṇam vicintya mūlamantreṇa amṛta rūpam

original: vicintyāthānantaraṃ tad etādṛśaṃ naivedyam abhimṛśan spṛṣṭvā manuṃ mantram aṣṭaśaḥ
analyzed: vicintya atha anantaram tat etādṛśam naivedyam abhimṛśan spṛṣṭvā manum mantram aṣṭaśas

original: aṣṭa-vāraṃ prajapatu surabhi-mudrikayā dhenu-mudrikayā paripūrṇaṃ naivedyaṃ vicintya
analyzed: aṣṭa vāram prajapatu surabhi mudrikayā dhenu mudrikayā paripūrṇam naivedyam vicintya
gandha mukhaiḥ candana ādyaiḥ pūjayatu

original: kṛta-prasavāñjalir hariṃ pratyarcayet naivedya-grahaṇāyāsyatas tejo niḥsaratv iti prārthayet
analyzed: kṛta prasava añjaliḥ harim pratyarcayet naivedya grahaṇāya asyataḥ tejaḥ niḥsaratu iti prārthayet

original: / athānantaram asya harer āsyato mukhatas tejo niḥsaret prasaratv iti cintayet /
analyzed: atha anantaram asya hareḥ āsyataḥ mukhataḥ tejaḥ niḥsaret prasaratu iti cintayet
naivedye saṃyojayet iti tripāṭhinaḥ
vītihotra dayitā antam uccaran
mūlamantram atha nikṣipet jalam
arpayet tat amṛta ātmakam haviḥ
dos yujā su kusumam samuddharan

original: athānantaraṃ vīti-hotra-dayitāntaṃ svāhā-kārāntaṃ mūla-mantram uccaran kiṃcij jalaṃ tad-upari kṣipet prokṣayet /
analyzed: atha anantaram vītihotra dayitā antam svāhākāra antam mūlamantram uccaran kiṃcid jalam tad upari kṣipet prokṣayet

original: atra svāhānte 'pi mantre punaḥ svāhā-pada-prayogaḥ kāryaḥ etad-balād eva anantara-dor-yujā
analyzed: atra svāhā ante mantre punar svāhā pada prayogaḥ kāryaḥ etad balāt eva anantara dos yujā

original: hasta-dvayena sa-kusumaṃ sa-puṣpaṃ samuddharan uttolayan tad-amṛtātmakaṃ haviḥ samarpayet // KrdC_4.55 //
analyzed: hasta dvayena sa kusumam sa puṣpam samuddharan uttolayan tat amṛta ātmakam haviḥ samarpayet
naivedya arpaṇa mantram āha
nivedayāmi bhagavate juṣāṇā idam haviḥ hare
nivedya arpaṇa mantraḥ yam sarva arcāsu nija ākhyayā

original: ayaṃ mantraḥ sarvāsu devānāṃ pūjāsu nijākhyayeti hare ity asmin sthāne yasmai devāya dīyate tan-nāma-grahaṇaṃkartavyam iti nijākhyā-śabdārthaḥ
analyzed: ayam mantraḥ sarvāsu devānām pūjāsu nija ākhyayā iti hare iti asmin sthāne yasmai devāya dīyate tad nāma grahaṇam kartavyam iti nija ākhyā śabda arthaḥ
nivedya ākhyayā iti kecid
bhojana upayogi mudrā viśeṣam darśayati
grāsa mudrām vāma doṣṇā vikaca utpala sannibhām

original: pradarśayed dakṣiṇena prāṇādīnāṃ ca darśayet // Krd_4.57 //
analyzed: pradarśayet dakṣiṇena prāṇa ādīnām ca darśayet
vāma doṣṇā grāsa mudrām darśayet
kimbhūtām praphulla utpala sadṛśīm

original: anantaraṃ dakṣiṇa-hastena prāṇādīnāṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ mudrāṃ darśayed iti // KrdC_4.57 //
analyzed: anantaram dakṣiṇa hastena prāṇa ādīnām vakṣyamāṇām mudrām darśayet iti
spṛśet kaniṣṭha upakaniṣṭhe dve
aṅguṣṭha mūrdhnā prathamā iha mudrā
tathā aparā tarjanī madhyame syāt
anāmika madhyamike ca madhyā
anāmika tarjanī madhyamāḥ syāt
tadvat caturthī sa kaniṣṭhikāḥ taḥ
syāt pañcamī tadvat iti pradiṣṭā
kaniṣṭhā upakaniṣṭhe kaniṣṭhā anāmike dve sva aṅguṣṭha mūrdhnā spṛśet

original: iha mudrā prathamā tathā tarjanī-madhyame svāṅguṣṭha-mūrdhnā spṛśet anāmika-madhyamike ca tena spṛśed evaṃ vyāna-mudrā anāmā-tarjanī-madhyamās  #
analyzed: iha mudrā prathamā tathā tarjanī madhyame sva aṅguṣṭha mūrdhnā spṛśet anāmika madhyamike ca tena spṛśet evam vyāna mudrāḥ anāmā tarjanī madhyamāḥ
tena spṛśet
caturthī udānasya tāḥ tisraḥ kaniṣṭhā sahitāḥ

original: tadvat svāṅguṣṭha-mūrdhnā yadi spṛśet tadā samāna-mudrā ity anena prakāreṇa prāṇādi-mudrāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ kathitāḥ /
analyzed: tadvat sva aṅguṣṭha mūrdhnā yadi spṛśet tadā samāna mudrāḥ iti anena prakāreṇa prāṇa ādi mudrāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ kathitāḥ

original: kimbhūtāḥ ? yathāyogya-sva-mantra-sahitāḥ mantra-sāhityena tāsāṃ mudrātvaṃ bhavati bilva-mudrāvad ity arthaḥ // KrdC_4.58-59 //
analyzed: kimbhūtāḥ yathāyogya sva mantra sahitāḥ mantra sāhityena tāsām mudrā tvam bhavati bilva mudrā vat iti arthaḥ

original: ke te mantrā ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ prāṇādīnāṃ mantrān āha-
analyzed: ke te mantrāḥ iti ākāṅkṣāyām prāṇa ādīnām mantrān āha
prāṇa apāna vyāna udāna samānāḥ kramāt caturthī antāḥ

original: tārādhārā vadhvā ceddhāḥ kṛṣṇādhvanas tv ime manavaḥ // Krd_4.60 //
analyzed: tārādhārāḥ vadhvā ca iddhāḥ kṛṣṇādhvanaḥ tu ime manavaḥ

original: prāṇādayaḥ pañca kramāc caturthī-vibhakti-sahitāḥ tathā tārā-dhārāḥ oṃkārādhārāḥ praṇavādyā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa ādayaḥ pañca kramāt caturthī vibhakti sahitāḥ tathā tārā ādhārāḥ oṃkāra ādhārāḥ praṇava ādyāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tathā kṛṣṇādhvano 'gner vadhvā priyayā iddhā uddīptāḥ sambaddhāḥ svāhā-kārāntā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā kṛṣṇādhvanaḥ gneḥ vadhvā priyayā iddhāḥ uddīptāḥ sambaddhāḥ svāhākāra antāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ ca sati oṃ prāṇāya svāhā ity ādyāḥ pañca mantrā bhavatīty arthaḥ // KrdC_4.60 //
analyzed: evam ca sati om prāṇāya svāhā iti ādyāḥ pañca mantrāḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
nivedya mudrām pradarśayan mantram ca darśayati
tatas nivedya mudrikām pradhānayā kara dvaye

original: spṛśann anāmikāṃ nijaṃ manuṃ japan pradarśayet // Krd_4.61 //
analyzed: spṛśan anāmikām nijam manum japan pradarśayet
tatas tad anantaram nivedya mudrām pradarśayet

original: kiṃ kurvan ? kara-dvaye karayor anāmikāṃ pradhānayāṅguṣṭhena spṛśan /
analyzed: kim kurvan kara dvaye karayoḥ anāmikām pradhānayā aṅguṣṭhena spṛśan
punar kim kurvan

original: nijaṃ svīyaṃ manuṃ mantraṃ prajapan // KrdC_4.61 //
analyzed: nijam svīyam manum mantram prajapan

analyzed: nanda jaḥ ṭhakāraḥ ambuḥ vakāraḥ manuḥ aukāraḥ binduḥ etaiḥ yuktā natiḥ namaḥ pārśvaḥ

original: pa-kāraḥ rā iti svarūpaṃ marut ya-kāraḥ avātmane iti ani svarūpaṃ ruddhaṃ iti svarūpaṃ
analyzed: pakāraḥ rā iti svarūpam marut yakāraḥ iti ani svarūpam ruddham iti svarūpam

original: nivedyam iti trayaḥ ātma-bhūḥ ka-kāraḥ māṃso la-kāraḥ pārśvaḥ pa-kāraḥ la-kāra-ya-kārābhyāṃ
analyzed: nivedyam iti trayaḥ ātmabhūḥ kakāraḥ māṃsaḥ lakāraḥ pārśvaḥ pakāraḥ lakāra yakārābhyām

original: yukto 'nilo ya-kāraḥ amīti svarūpaṃ tathā ṭhvauṃ namaḥ paryāvātmane aniruddhāya naivedyaṃ
analyzed: yuktaḥ nilaḥ yakāraḥ amī iti svarūpam tathā ṭhvaum namaḥ paryāva ātmane aniruddhāya naivedyam

original: maṇḍala-parito bījāṅkura-pātrāṇi saṃsthāpya tathaiva piṣṭa-kṛtān ghṛta-paripūrṇān prajvalita-śikhān pradīpān sthāpayet // KrdC_4.63 //

original: athānantaraṃ śāstrokta-saṃskāraiḥ saṃskṛte vahnau nirmala-buddhiḥ yathokta-rūpaṃ harim āvāhya gandhādibhiś ca yathāvidhi sampūjyāṣṭottara-sahasraṃ  #

juhuyāt

original: rāśiṣu meṣādiṣu adhināthebhyo rāśi-devatābhyo maṅgalādibhyaḥ nakṣatrebhyo 'śvinyādibhyaḥ

karaṇebhyaḥ va vā ādibhyaḥ balim dadyāt

original: gītaiḥ sutṛptam abhipūjayatāt punar eva // Krd_4.67 //
analyzed: gītaiḥ su tṛptam abhipūjayatāt punar eva

original: bhūyaḥ punar api gaṇḍūṣaṃ culūkodakaṃ danta-dhavanaṃ danta-kāṣṭham /
analyzed: bhūyas punar api gaṇḍūṣam culūka udakam dantadhavanam dantakāṣṭham
dantadhavanam dantadhāvanam iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: ācamanaṃ śeṣācamane dvir-ācamanam āsya-hastayor mṛjyaṃ mukha-hastayoḥ proñchana-vastram
analyzed: ācamanam śeṣa ācamane dvis ācamanam āsya hastayoḥ mṛjyam mukha hastayoḥ proñchana vastram

original: anulepaś candanādiḥ mukhaṃ vāsyate surabhi kriyate aneneti mukha-vāsaṃ karpūrādi
analyzed: anulepaḥ candana ādiḥ mukham vāsyate surabhi kriyate anena iti mukhavāsam karpūra ādi

original: mālyaṃ puṣpaṃ bhūṣālaṅkaraṇaṃ tāmbūlam api samuccaye etāni samarpya punar eva yathā-pūrvaṃ
analyzed: mālyam puṣpam bhūṣā alaṅkaraṇam tāmbūlam api samuccaye etāni samarpya punar eva yathāpūrvam

original: pūjā kṛtā evaṃ suvādya-nṛtya-gītaiḥ sutṛptaṃ hariṃ natvā bhipūjayet // KrdC_4.67 //
analyzed: pūjā kṛtā evam su vādya nṛtya gītaiḥ su tṛptam harim natvā abhipūjayet
gandha ādibhiḥ sa parivāram atha argham asmai
dattvā vidhāya kusumāñjalim ādareṇa
stutvā praṇamya śirasā culuka udakena
sva ātmānam arpayatu tat caraṇa abja mūle

original: kaiḥ ? gandhādibhiḥ saparivāraṃ pūrvoktāvaraṇa-sahitam athānantaram asmai haraye
analyzed: kaiḥ gandha ādibhiḥ sa parivāram pūrva ukta āvaraṇa sahitam atha anantaram asmai haraye

original: arghyaṃ dattvā ādareṇa puṣpāñjaliṃ dattvā stutvā śirasā praṇamya sac-caraṇāravinda-mūle
analyzed: arghyam dattvā ādareṇa puṣpa añjalim dattvā stutvā śirasā praṇamya sat caraṇa aravinda mūle
sva ātmānam culukena argha śeṣa jalena samarpayatu

original: ātmanaḥ samarpaṇa-mantram āha ita ity ādinā svātma-samarpaṇe ity antena granthena-
analyzed: ātmanaḥ samarpaṇa mantram āha itas iti ādinā sva ātma samarpaṇe iti antena granthena
itas pūrvam prāṇa buddhi deha dharma adhikārataḥ jāgrat svapna suṣupti avasthāsu manasā

original: vācā karmaṇā hastābhyāṃ padbhyām udareṇa śiśnā yat smṛtaṃ yad uktaṃ yat kṛtaṃ tat
analyzed: vācā karmaṇā hastābhyām padbhyām udareṇa śiśnā yat smṛtam yat uktam yat kṛtam tat

original: sarvaṃ brahmārpaṇaṃ bhavatu svāhā māṃ madīyaṃ ca sakalaṃ haraye samyag arpaye oṃ
analyzed: sarvam brahmārpaṇam bhavatu svāhā mām madīyam ca sakalam haraye samyak arpaye om

original: tat sad iti ca prokta-mantraḥ svātma-samarpaṇe //
analyzed: tat sat iti ca prokta mantraḥ sva ātma samarpaṇe

original: etac ca mantra-trayaṃ spaṣṭatvān na likhyate-
analyzed: etat ca mantra trayam spaṣṭa tvāt na likhyate
anusmaran kalaśa gam acyutam japet
sahasrakam manum atha sa aṣṭakam budhaḥ
vapuṣi atha u ditijājitaḥ samāvṛtīḥ

original: vilāpya tās tad api nayet sudhātmatām // Krd_4.69 //
analyzed: vilāpya tāḥ tat api nayet sudhā ātma tām

original: athānantaraṃ budhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ kalaśagaṃ kumbhādi-niṣṭhaṃ hariṃ cintayan sāṣṭakam aṣṭa-sahitaṃ sahasraṃ manuṃ mantraṃ japet /
analyzed: atha anantaram budhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ kalaśa gam kumbha ādi niṣṭham harim cintayan sa aṣṭakam aṣṭa sahitam sahasram manum mantram japet

original: athānantaraṃ ditija-jitaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya vapuṣi śarīre tāḥ pūrvoktāḥ samāvṛtīḥ āvaraṇa-devatā vilāpy vilīnā iti vicintya tad api deva-vapuḥ sudhātmatām  #
analyzed: atha anantaram ditija jitaḥ śrī kṛṣṇasya vapuṣi śarīre tāḥ pūrva uktāḥ samāvṛtīḥ āvaraṇa devatāḥ vilāpi vilīnāḥ iti vicintya tat api deva vapuḥ sudhā ātma tām
amṛta tām nayet
dhvaja toraṇa diś kalaśa ādi gatām
api maṇḍapa maṇḍala kuṇḍa gatām
abhiyojya citim kalaśe kusumaiḥ
paripūjya japet punar aṣṭaśatam

original: kalaśe citiṃ mantra-devatāṃ caitanya-rūpam abhiyojya kusumaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sampūjya punar aṣṭa-sahitaṃ śataṃ japet /
analyzed: kalaśe citim mantradevatām caitanya rūpam abhiyojya kusumaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sampūjya punar aṣṭa sahitam śatam japet

original: kimbhūtām ? citiṃ dhvaja-toraṇa-dik-kalaśādi-gatāṃ na kevalaṃ dhvajādi-gatām api tu maṇḍale maṇḍape kuṇḍa-gatām // KrdC_4.70 //
analyzed: kimbhūtām citim dhvaja toraṇa diś kalaśa ādi gatām na kevalam dhvaja ādi gatām api tu maṇḍale maṇḍape kuṇḍa gatām
atha śiṣyaḥ upoṣitaḥ prabhāte
kṛta naityaḥ su sita ambaraḥ su veśaḥ
dharaṇī dhana dhānya go kulaiḥ
dhinuyāt vipra varān hareḥ prasattyaiḥ

original: athānantaram upoṣitaḥ kṛtopavāsaḥ śiṣyaḥ prabhāte prātaḥ-kāle kṛta-nitya-kṛtyaḥ śukla-vastra-dharaḥ
analyzed: atha anantaram upoṣitaḥ kṛta upavāsaḥ śiṣyaḥ prabhāte prātaḥkāle kṛta nityakṛtyaḥ śukla vastra dharaḥ

original: suveśaḥ śobhana-bhūṣaṇaḥ dharaṇī pṛthivī dhanaṃ suvarṇādi dhānyaṃ vrīhy-ādi gaur
analyzed: su veśaḥ śobhana bhūṣaṇaḥ dharaṇī pṛthivī dhanam suvarṇa ādi dhānyam vrīhi ādi gauḥ

original: dogdhrī dukūlaṃ paṭṭa-vastram etair yathā-yogyaṃ vipra-varān brāhmaṇa-śreṣṭhān dhinuyāt prīṇayet /
analyzed: dogdhrī dukūlam paṭṭavastram etaiḥ yathāyogyam vipra varān brāhmaṇa śreṣṭhān dhinuyāt prīṇayet
kimartham hareḥ śrī kṛṣṇasya prasāda artham
bhūyas pratarpya praṇipatya deśikam
tasmai parasmai puruṣāya dehine
tām vitta śāṭhyam parihṛtya dakṣiṇām

original: dattvā tanuṃ svāṃ ca samarpayet sudhīḥ // Krd_4.72 //
analyzed: dattvā tanum svām ca samarpayet sudhīḥ

original: bhūyaḥ punar api pratarpya brāhmaṇān santoṣya punaḥ kathanam atyanta-tarpaṇārthaṃ parītyeti pāṭhe pradakṣiṇī-kṛtyety arthaḥ /
analyzed: bhūyas punar api pratarpya brāhmaṇān santoṣya punar kathanam atyanta tarpaṇa artham parītya iti pāṭhe pradakṣiṇīkṛtya iti arthaḥ

original: deśikaṃ guruṃ praṇipatya namaskṛtya tasmai gurave dehine deha-dhāriṇe parasmai puruṣāya
analyzed: deśikam gurum praṇipatya namaskṛtya tasmai gurave dehine deha dhāriṇe parasmai puruṣāya

original: śrī-kṛṣṇāya dhana-śāṭhyaṃ parihṛtya vaibhavānusāreṇa tāṃ prasiddhāṃ vittārdhaṃ caturthāṃśaṃ
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇāya dhana śāṭhyam parihṛtya vaibhava anusāreṇa tām prasiddhām vitta ardham caturtha aṃśam

original: vā dattvā na tu dakṣiṇām iva mantrādānānantaram eva tat-prasaṅgāt svāṃ svīyāṃ tanuṃ
analyzed: vā dattvā na tu dakṣiṇām iva mantra ādāna anantaram eva tad prasaṅgāt svām svīyām tanum
subuddhiḥ samarpayet
atha abhiṣeka maṇḍape sukha upaviṣṭam āsane

original: gurur viśodhayed amuṃ pureva śoṣaṇādibhiḥ // Krd_4.73 //
analyzed: guruḥ viśodhayet amum purā iva śoṣaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: athānantaraṃ gurur amuṃ śiṣyaṃ pureva pūrvavad eva śoṣaṇādibhir bhūta-śuddhy-ādibhir viśodhayet /
analyzed: atha anantaram guruḥ amum śiṣyam purā iva pūrvavat eva śoṣaṇa ādibhiḥ bhūtaśuddhi ādibhiḥ viśodhayet
kīdṛśam abhiṣeka maṇḍape āsane sukha upaviṣṭam

āśīrvādaiḥ dvijānām viśada paṭu ravaiḥ gīta vāditra ghoṣaiḥ

original: māṅgalyair ānayattaṃ kalaśam abhivṛtas tat-samīpaṃ pratītaḥ // Krd_4.74 //
analyzed: māṅgalyaiḥ ānayat tam kalaśam abhivṛtaḥ tad samīpam pratītaḥ

original: tasya śiṣyasya vapuṣi śarīre pīṭha-nyāsāvasānaṃ pīṭha-nyāsa-paryantaṃ sakalaṃ nyāsaṃ vinyasya āsikāyā āsanasya mantreṇāsanaṃ pūjayitvā rocanāṃ  #
analyzed: tasya śiṣyasya vapuṣi śarīre pīṭhanyāsa avasānam pīṭhanyāsa paryantam sakalam nyāsam vinyasya āsikāyāḥ āsanasya mantreṇa āsanam pūjayitvā rocanām

kīdṛśīm rocanām
dūrvā akṣata puṣpa sahitām
anantaram dvijānām āśīrvādaiḥ gīti maṅgala ādi śabdaiḥ
kīdṛśaiḥ etaiḥ

original: viśada-paṭu-ravaiḥ spaṣṭottama-śabdaiḥ tathā anyair api māṅgalyair maṅgalasyopayuktaiḥ sahitaṃ taṃ kalaśam abhivṛta ācāryatvena vṛtaḥ tat-samīpaṃ  #
analyzed: viśada paṭu ravaiḥ spaṣṭa uttama śabdaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ api māṅgalyaiḥ maṅgalasya upayuktaiḥ sahitam tam kalaśam abhivṛtaḥ ācārya tvena vṛtaḥ tad samīpam
śiṣya samīpam ānayet

original: kīdṛśaḥ ? śiṣyātmīyatayā pratīto viśvāsānvito yaḥ kaścid ity arthaḥ // KrdC_4.74 //
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ śiṣya ātmīya tayā pratītaḥ viśvāsa anvitaḥ yaḥ kaścid iti arthaḥ

dhāmnā parama amṛta rūpa bhājā

tat sāmarasyam abhiṣecayatāt yathāvat

original: kumbhasya palvalān śiṣya-śirasi nidhāya tena kalasenety arthād yathāvat yathā-yukta-prakāreṇābhiṣecayet abhiṣecanaṃ kuryāt / tad uktam-
analyzed: kumbhasya palvalān śiṣya śirasi nidhāya tena kalasena iti arthāt yathāvat yathā yukta prakāreṇa abhiṣecayet abhiṣecanam kuryāt tat uktam
vidhivat kumbham uddhṛtya tad mukha sthān suradrumān

analyzed: śiśoḥ śirasi vinyasya mātṛkām manasā japet iti
kimbhūtena

original: abhilīnaḥ saṃlīnaḥ maṇir nava-ratnāni mantraḥ ṛk mahauṣadhaṃ divya-pippalī-prabhṛti yatra tena /
analyzed: abhilīnaḥ saṃlīnaḥ maṇiḥ navaratnāni mantraḥ ṛc mahauṣadham divyapippalī prabhṛti yatra tena

original: kiṃ kurvan ? amuṣya śiśor vapuḥ śarīraṃ pūrayan /
analyzed: kim kurvan amuṣya śiśoḥ vapuḥ śarīram pūrayan

original: kṣa-ādir yeṣāṃ taiḥ āntaiḥ a-kārānto yeṣāṃ tair varṇair mātṛkākṣarair mūla-mantra-tri-japāvasānair
analyzed: kṣa ādiḥ yeṣām taiḥ ā antaiḥ akāra antaḥ yeṣām taiḥ varṇaiḥ mātṛkā akṣaraiḥ mūlamantra tri japa avasānaiḥ

original: abhiṣikta-śarīraḥ śiṣyaḥ dhṛta-navīnātiśukla-vasana-yugalaḥ maunī kṛta-dvir-ācamanaḥ // KrdC_4.76 //
analyzed: abhiṣikta śarīraḥ śiṣyaḥ dhṛta navīna ati śukla vasana yugalaḥ maunī kṛta dvis ācamanaḥ

analyzed: tat dakṣiṇatas upāstām abhimukham ekāgra mānasaḥ śiṣyaḥ

analyzed: bahu vāram deśika nāmānam guru rūpam harim natvā atha anantaram upasaṅgṛhya guru caraṇau

analyzed: brūyāt triśas guruḥ anarghyam a vāma kareṇa

acyutasādvidhāya śrī kṛṣṇa rūpam kṛtvā gandha akṣata puṣpaiḥ vibhūṣita śarīrasya asya

analyzed: mantra śreṣṭham triśas tri vāram brūyāt yathāvat yathā ukta prakāreṇa sa ca prakāraḥ

analyzed: prathamam dakṣiṇa haste guruḥ jalam dadāti amuka mantram dadāmi iti anena śiṣyaḥ upi

analyzed: dadasva iti brūyāt tatas mantram dadyāt iti atra avaśyam vāra trayam guruṇā mantraḥ

analyzed: paṭhanīyaḥ datte yāvat śiṣyasya mantraḥ sva āyattaḥ bhavati tāvat paṭhanīyaḥ iti

analyzed: te sampadām nilayanam hi te eva dhanyāḥ

analyzed: bhojya samūhaiḥ dvijaśreṣṭhān santoṣayet etad karaṇasya phalam āha eha jagati anena

analyzed: vidhinā anayā paripāṭyā ye abhiṣekam kurvanti te sampadām sarva samṛddhīnām nilayanam

original: śuddha-matiḥ sādhakaḥ akṣaya-phaladaṃ mokṣa-phalaṃ daśākṣaraṃ manuṃ daśa-lakṣaṃ pratijapya hutavahe saṃskṛtāgnau aruṇāmbujair aruṇa-kamalair  #
analyzed: śuddha matiḥ sādhakaḥ akṣaya phala dam mokṣa phalam daśa akṣaram manum daśa lakṣam pratijapya hutavahe saṃskṛta agnau aruṇa ambujaiḥ aruṇa kamalaiḥ

original: śuṣira-yugala-varṇaṃ śuṣiraṃ chidraṃ nava-saṅkhyātmakaṃ tasya yugalaṃ dvandvaṃ aṣṭādaśākṣaraṃ
analyzed: śuṣira yugala varṇam śuṣiram chidram nava saṅkhyā ātmakam tasya yugalam dvandvam aṣṭādaśa akṣaram

analyzed: japet tadā pañca lakṣam prajapatu prokta kptyā pūrva ukta paripāṭyā ca ardha lakṣam juhuyāt

original: yathokta-homa-dravyālābhe dravyāntaram āha amala-matir iti śuddha-matiḥ ambujānāṃ
analyzed: yathā ukta homa dravya alābhe dravya antaram āha amala matiḥ iti śuddha matiḥ ambujānām

analyzed: padmānām alābhe prāptau pāyasaiḥ paramānnaiḥ homam ārabheta

original: kīdṛśaiḥ ? sahite ghṛta-site yeṣu taiḥ ghṛta-śarkarā-sahitair ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛśaiḥ sahite ghṛta site yeṣu taiḥ ghṛta śarkarā sahitaiḥ iti arthaḥ

analyzed: svāhā antena homa pūjā iti sarvatra boddhavyam homa ādeḥ ca anuṣṭhāna prakāraḥ mad kṛta homa anuṣṭhāna paddhateḥ avagantavyaḥ

original: eṣāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ homa-sahitaś cej japaḥ tadā trayāṇām api ayuta-catuṣṭayādi-samānam eva varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ homa-rahito ya ukto japaḥ

analyzed: guḍa sahitam dadhi prātaḥkāle navanīta sahitam pāyasam madhyāhne sa sitopalam śarkarā vikāra sahitam

original: kṣīraṃ tṛtīya-kāle ity amunā prakāreṇa dravyaṃ tarpaṇa-dravyaṃ kathitam // KrdC_5.74 //
analyzed: kṣīram tṛtīyakāle iti amunā prakāreṇa dravyam tarpaṇa dravyam kathitam
tarpaṇa mantram āha
tarpayāmi padam yojyam mantra ante sveṣu nāmasu

original: dvitīyānteṣu tu tataḥ pūjāśeṣaṃ samāpayet // Krd_5.75 //
analyzed: dvitīya anteṣu tu tatas pūjā śeṣam samāpayet

original: mantrānte mūla-mantrāvasāne svakīyāni tarpaṇīya-devatānāṃ nāmāni teṣu tat-samīpeṣu
analyzed: mantra ante mūlamantra avasāne svakīyāni tarpaṇīya devatānām nāmāni teṣu tad samīpeṣu

original: dvitīyānteṣu amuka-devatām ity ādi-rūpeṣu tarpayāmīti-padaṃ yojyam anantaraṃ pūjāśeṣaṃ
analyzed: dvitīyā anteṣu amuka devatām iti ādi rūpeṣu tarpayāmi iti padam yojyam anantaram pūjā śeṣam
samāpayet
uttara kṛtyam āha
abhyukṣya tad prasāda adbhiḥ ātmānam prativedapaḥ

original: taj japtvā tam athodvāsya tan-mayaḥ prajapen manum // Krd_5.76 //
analyzed: tat japtvā tam atha udvāsya tad mayaḥ prajapet manum

original: tat-prasādādbhiḥ parameśvara-prasāda-tat-tarpaṇa-jalaiḥ ātmānaṃ śarīraṃ siktvā taj japtvā mantraṃ japtvā apaḥ prapibet /
analyzed: tad prasāda adbhiḥ parameśvara prasāda tad tarpaṇa jalaiḥ ātmānam śarīram siktvā tat japtvā mantram japtvā apaḥ prapibet

original: athānantaraṃ taṃ devam udvāsya sva-hṛdaye saṃyojya tan-mayaḥ san-mantraṃ japet // KrdC_5.76 //
analyzed: atha anantaram tam devam udvāsya sva hṛdaye saṃyojya tad mayaḥ san mantram japet
sa prakāram sa dravyam kāmyam tarpaṇam āha

original: atha dravyāṇi kāmyeṣu vakṣyante tarpaṇeṣu tu /
analyzed: atha dravyāṇi kāmyeṣu vakṣyante tarpaṇeṣu tu
tāni prokta vidhānānām āśritya anyataram bhajet

original: athānantaraṃ kāmyeṣu tarpaṇeṣu yāni nāradādibhiḥ kathitāni dravyāṇi tāni vakṣyante
analyzed: atha anantaram kāmyeṣu tarpaṇeṣu yāni nārada ādibhiḥ kathitāni dravyāṇi tāni vakṣyante

original: prokta-vidhānānām trikālokta-vidhānānām anantaram ekaṃ vidhānam āśritya kāmya-tarpaṇa-karma
analyzed: prokta vidhānānām tri kāla ukta vidhānānām anantaram ekam vidhānam āśritya kāmya tarpaṇa karma
bhajet

original: dravyaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhir amuṃ pratarpayed ekaśaś catur-vāram /
analyzed: dravyaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ amum pratarpayet ekaśas catur vāram

original: sa catuḥ-kṣīrādy-antaiḥ sakṛj-jalādy-antam acyutaṃ bhaktyā // Krd_5.78 //
analyzed: sa catur kṣīra ādi antaiḥ sakṛt jala ādi antam acyutam bhaktyā

original: ṣoḍaśabhir dravyair amuṃ śrī-kṛṣṇam ekaśaś catur-vāram tad-dravya-buddhyā jalair eva tarpayet /
analyzed: ṣoḍaśabhiḥ dravyaiḥ amum śrī kṛṣṇam ekaśas catur vāram tad dravya buddhyā jalaiḥ eva tarpayet

original: kīdṛśaiḥ ? catvāri kṣīrāṇi ādyaṃ yeṣāṃ taih /
analyzed: kīdṛśaiḥ catvāri kṣīrāṇi ādyam yeṣām taiḥ

original: ṣoḍaśa-dravyāṇām ādau dugdhāñjali-catuṣṭayam ante ca catuṣṭayam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa dravyāṇām ādau dugdha añjali catuṣṭayam ante ca catuṣṭayam iti arthaḥ
sakṛt jala ādi antam iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam

original: tathā ca prathamam eka-vāraṃ jalena tataś caturvāraṃ tataḥ caturvāraṃ kṣīraiḥ tataḥ sakṛj jalena iti paryavasannam // KrdC_5.78 //
analyzed: tathā ca prathamam eka vāram jalena tatas catur vāram tatas catur vāram kṣīraiḥ tatas sakṛt jalena iti paryavasannam
ṣoḍaśa dravyāṇi āha pāyasam iti
pāyasa dādhika kṛsaram gauḍa anna payaḥ dadhīni navanītam
ājyam kadalī mocā rajasvalā coca modaka apūpam

original: pṛthukaṃ lājopetaṃ dravyāṇāṃ kathitam iha ṣoḍaśakam /
analyzed: pṛthukam lāja upetam dravyāṇām kathitam iha ṣoḍaśakam
lāja ante ntya kṣīrāt prāk samarpya
pāyasam paramānnam
dādhikam dadhnā pariṣkṛtam annam
kṛsaram mudga odanam gauḍa annam guḍa udaka pakvam annam

original: payo dugdhaṃ dadhi prasiddhaṃ navanītam ājyaṃ ghṛtaṃ kadalī campā-kadalī mocā svarṇa-kadalī rajasvalā kadalī-viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: payaḥ dugdham dadhi prasiddham navanītam ājyam ghṛtam kadalī campā kadalī mocā svarṇakadalī rajasvalā kadalī viśeṣaḥ
cocaḥ pi kadalī viśeṣaḥ
modakaḥ laḍḍukaḥ

original: apūpam pūlikā pṛthak cipiṭakaṃ lāja-sametaṃ lāja-sahitam iti dravyāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ kathitam iha grantheti lājeti /
analyzed: apūpam pūlikā pṛthak cipiṭakam lāja sametam lāja sahitam iti dravyāṇām ṣoḍaśakam kathitam iha grantha iti lāja iti

original: lāja-tarpaṇānantaram antya-catuḥ-kṣīra-tarpaṇāt pūrvaṃ sitopalā-puñjaiḥ śveta-śarkarā-samūhaiḥ bhāvanayā toya-bhāvāpannaiḥ sakṛt santarpayet

analyzed: ukta kāmya tarpaṇasya phalam āha
prage catuḥsaptati vāram iti amum
pratarpayet yaḥ nu dinam naraḥ harim
an anya dhīḥ tasya samasta sampadaḥ
kare sthitāḥ maṇḍalataḥ

original: ity anena prakāreṇa prage prātaḥ-kāle catuḥ-saptati-vāram amuṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ yo naro
analyzed: iti anena prakāreṇa prage prātaḥkāle catuḥsaptati vāram amum harim kṛṣṇam yaḥ

original: 'nudinaṃ pratyaham ananya-dhīḥ ekāgra-cittaḥ san santarpayet tasya puṃsaḥ maṇḍalataḥ
analyzed: nu dinam pratyaham an anya dhīḥ ekāgra cittaḥ san santarpayet tasya puṃsaḥ maṇḍalataḥ

original: ekonapañcāśad-divasāt arvāg iti tripāṭhinaḥ aṣṭa-catvāriṃśad-divasābhyantara iti
analyzed: ekonapañcāśat divasāt arvāk iti tripāṭhinaḥ aṣṭacatvāriṃśat divasa abhyantare iti
pañcatriṃśat divasa abhyantare iti rudradharaḥ

original: abhivāñchitā ākāṅkṣitāḥ sakala-siddhi-samṛddhayaḥ hasta-sthitā bhavanti atra sitopalā-puñjasya gaṇanā na kāryā // KrdC_5.81 //
analyzed: abhivāñchitāḥ ākāṅkṣitāḥ sakala siddhi samṛddhayaḥ hasta sthitāḥ bhavanti atra sitopalā puñjasya gaṇanā na kāryā
kāmya tarpaṇa anantaram āha
dhārā uṣṇa pakva payasī dadhi navanīte ghṛtam ca daugdha annam

original: matsyaṇḍī-madhv-amṛtaṃ dvādaśaśaḥ tarpayen navabhir ebhiḥ // Krd_5.82 //
analyzed: matsyaṇḍī madhu amṛtam dvādaśaśas tarpayet navabhiḥ ebhiḥ

original: dhāroṣṇaṃ payaḥ tadānīntanam eva niṣpāditaṃ dugdhaṃ tathā pakvam payaḥ sādhitaṃ dugdhaṃ dhāroṣṇa-pakve ca payasī ca amū dhāroṣṇa-pakva-payasī
analyzed: dhāroṣṇam payaḥ tadānīntanam eva niṣpāditam dugdham tathā pakvam payaḥ sādhitam dugdham dhāroṣṇa pakve ca payasī ca amū dhāroṣṇa pakva payasī

original: dadhi prasiddhaṃ navanītaṃ ghṛtaṃ daugdhānnaṃ pāyasaṃ matsyaṇḍī śarkarā-viśeṣaḥ sa-śarkaraṃ vinaṣṭa-dugdham iti tripāṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: dadhi prasiddham navanītam ghṛtam daugdha annam pāyasam matsyaṇḍī śarkarā viśeṣaḥ sa śarkaram vinaṣṭa dugdham iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: madhu prasiddham amṛtam etair navabhir dravyair dvādaśaśa-vāraṃ tarpayet // KrdC_5.82 //
analyzed: madhu prasiddham amṛtam etaiḥ navabhiḥ dravyaiḥ dvādaśa śa vāram tarpayet
etasya phalam āha
tarpaṇa vidhiḥ ayam aparaḥ pūrva udita sama phalaḥ ṣta śa saṅkhyaḥ

original: kārmaṇa-karmaṇi kīrtau jana-saṃvanane viśeṣato vihitaḥ // Krd_5.83 //
analyzed: kārmaṇa karmaṇi kīrtau jana saṃvanane viśeṣataḥ vihitaḥ
ayam tarpaṇa prakāraḥ pūrva ukta tarpaṇa prakārāt bhinnaḥ

punar kīdṛśaḥ

original: aṣṭottara-śata-pramāṇakaḥ tato navabhir dravyair dvādaśa-kṛtvā tarpaṇenāṣṭottara-saṅkhyā bhavati /
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśata pramāṇakaḥ tatas navabhiḥ dravyaiḥ dvādaśa kṛtvā tarpaṇena aṣṭa uttara saṅkhyā bhavati
punar kīdṛśaḥ

original: kārmaṇa-karmaṇi vaśya-karaṇa-karmaṇi tathā kīrtau sat-kathāyāṃ jana-saṃvanane loka-vaśī-karaṇe loka-priyatvena vā viśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ // KrdC_5.83
analyzed: kārmaṇa karmaṇi vaśya karaṇa karmaṇi tathā kīrtau sat kathāyām jana saṃvanane loka vaśīkaraṇe loka priya tvena vā viśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ
tarpaṇa anantaram āha
vrajan pura grāmam api pratarpya
labheta bhojyam sa rasam sa bhṛtyaiḥ

original: sakhaṇḍa-dhāroṣṇa-dhiyāmukundaṃ vrajan pura-grāmam api pratarpya labheta bhojyaṃ sarasaṃ sa-bhṛtyair vāsāṃsi dhānyāni dhanāni mantrī // KrdC_5.84
analyzed: sa khaṇḍadhāra uṣṇa dhiyā mukundam vrajan pura grāmam api pratarpya labheta bhojyam sa rasam sa bhṛtyaiḥ vāsāṃsi dhānyāni dhanāni mantrī

original: akhilāni samastāni kāryāṇi vāñchitāni tarpaṇenaiva vināpi pūjā-homaṃ sādhayet /
analyzed: akhilāni samastāni kāryāṇi vāñchitāni tarpaṇena eva vinā api pūjā homam sādhayet

original: atra yāvat-saṅkhyaṃ tarpaṇaṃ karoti tāvat-saṅkhyaṃ mantraṃ japet // KrdC_5.85 //
analyzed: atra yāvatsaṅkhyam tarpaṇam karoti tāvatsaṅkhyam mantram japet
prayoga antaram āha
yaḥ iha dinaśas nanda tanayaḥ

analyzed: svayam bhūtvā bhikṣām aṭati viharan gopa sudṛśām
amā cetobhiḥ svvaiḥ lalita lalitaiḥ narma vidhibhiḥ
dadhi ksīra ājya āḍhyām pracuratara bhikṣām sa labhate

original: bhikṣā-vṛttir jīvanopāyo yasya sa dvijo traivarṇiko dinaśaḥ pratidinaṃ svayaṃ nanda-tanayo bhūtvā tad-rūpeṇātmānaṃ vicintya iha bhikṣām aṭati  #
analyzed: bhikṣā vṛttiḥ jīvana upāyaḥ yasya sa dvijaḥ traivarṇikaḥ dinaśas pratidinam svayam nanda tanayaḥ bhūtvā tad rūpeṇa ātmānam vicintya iha bhikṣām aṭati
yācate

original: kiṃ kurvan ? svakīyair lalita-lalitaiḥ atimanoharaiḥ narma-vidhibhiḥ krīḍā-karmabhir
analyzed: kim kurvan svakīyaiḥ lalita lalitaiḥ ati manoharaiḥ narma vidhibhiḥ krīḍā karmabhiḥ

original: gopa-sudṛśāṃ gopa-strīṇāṃ cetobhiḥ sārdhaṃ viharan amā-śabdaḥ sahārthe sa-dadhi-dugdha-ghṛta-pracurāṃ
analyzed: gopa sudṛśām gopa strīṇām cetobhiḥ sārdham viharan amā śabdaḥ saha arthe sa dadhi dugdha ghṛta pracurām
bahu bhikṣām prāpnoti

original: madhye koṇeṣu ṣaṭsv apy anala-puṭasyālikhet karṇikāyāṃ
analyzed: madhye koṇeṣu ṣaṭsu api anala puṭasya ālikhet karṇikāyām
kandarpam sādhya yuktam vivara gata ṣaṣ arṇam dviśas keśareṣu
śakti śrī pūrvakāni dvi nava lipi manoḥ akṣarāṇi chadānām

original: madhye varṇān daśānāṃ daśa-lipi-manu-varyasya caikekaśo 'bjam // Krd_5.87 //
analyzed: madhye varṇān daśānām daśa lipi manu varyasya ca ekekaśas bjam

original: daśa-dala-padmaṃ vilikhya karṇikāyāṃ ṣaṭ-koṇaṃ vahni-gṛhaṃ vilikhya vahni-gṛha-yugmasya madhye ṣaṭ-koṇeṣu vilikhet /
analyzed: daśa dala padmam vilikhya karṇikāyām ṣaṣ koṇam vahni gṛham vilikhya vahni gṛha yugmasya madhye ṣaṣ koṇeṣu vilikhet

original: lekhana-prakāram āha-karṇikāyāṃ madhye sādhya-nāma-sahitam amukasyāmukaṃ sidhyatv ity anena sahitaṃ kandarpaṃ kāma-bījaṃ vilikhet /
analyzed: lekhana prakāram āha karṇikāyām madhye sādhya nāma sahitam amukasya amukam sidhyatu iti anena sahitam kandarpam kāmabījam vilikhet

original: tathā vivara-gataṃ ṣaḍ-arṇaṃ ṣaṭ-koṇa-gata-vakṣyamāṇa-ṣaḍ-akṣaraṃ vilikhet tathā
analyzed: tathā vivara gatam ṣaṣ arṇam ṣaṣ koṇa gata vakṣyamāṇa ṣaṣ akṣaram vilikhet tathā

original: keśareṣu daśa-dala-mūleṣu dviśaḥ dvau dvau kṛtvā dvi-nava-lipi-manor aṣṭādaśākṣara-mantrasya
analyzed: keśareṣu daśa dala mūleṣu dviśas dvau dvau kṛtvā dvi nava lipi manoḥ aṣṭādaśa akṣara mantrasya
śakti śrī pūrvakāni bhuvaneśvarī bīja śrī bīja ādyāni akṣarāṇi vilikhet

original: tathā daśānāṃ pātrāṇāṃ madhye daśa-lipi-manu-varyasya daśākṣara-mantra-śreṣṭhasya varṇān ekaikaśo vilikhet tato 'bjaṃ padmam // KrdC_5.87 //
analyzed: tathā daśānām pātrāṇām madhye daśa lipi manu varyasya daśa akṣara mantra śreṣṭhasya varṇān ekaikaśas vilikhet tatas bjam padmam
bhū sadmanā abhivṛtam asraga manmathena
gorocanā abhilikhitam tapanīya sūcyā
paṭṭe hiraṇya racite gulikīkṛtam tat
gopālayantram akhila artha dam etat uktam
bhū bimbena catur asreṇa veṣṭitam kuryāt

original: kīdṛśena ? bhū-sadmanā asraga-manmathena koṇa-gata-kāma-bījena etad akhilārthadaṃ gopāla-yantram uktaṃ kīdṛśam ?
analyzed: kīdṛśena bhūsadmanā asra ga manmathena koṇa gata kāmabījena etat akhila artha dam gopālayantram uktam kīdṛśam
suvarṇa śalākayā gorocanā ādinā suvarṇa racite paṭṭe likhitam
anantaram vartulīkṛtam
sampāta siktam abhijaptam idam mahadbhiḥ
dhāryam jagattraya vaśīkaraṇa eka dakṣam
rakṣā yaśaḥ suta mahīdhana dhānya lakṣmī
saubhāgya lipsubhiḥ ajasram anarghya vīryam

original: idaṃ mantraṃ sampāta-siktam āhūti-dāna-śeṣa-puraḥ-sthita-ghṛta-siktaṃ tathā mantreṇābhimantritam
analyzed: idam mantram sampāta siktam āhūti dāna śeṣa puras sthita ghṛta siktam tathā mantreṇa abhimantritam

original: rakṣā-bhaya-nivāraṇaṃ yaśaḥ sat-kathā-prakāśaḥ sutaḥ putraḥ mahī pṛthivī dhanaṃ suvarṇādi
analyzed: rakṣā bhaya nivāraṇam yaśaḥ sat kathā prakāśaḥ sutaḥ putraḥ mahī pṛthivī dhanam suvarṇa ādi

original: lakṣmīḥ sarva-sampattiḥ saubhāgyaṃ sarva-jana-priyatvam etat prāptum icchadbhir mahadbhiḥ
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ sarva sampattiḥ saubhāgyam sarva jana priya tvam etat prāptum icchadbhiḥ mahadbhiḥ
śauca yuktaiḥ satatam dhāraṇīyam

original: ayam arthaḥ-yathoktaṃ yantraṃ sampādya prāṇa-pratiṣṭhāṃ kṛtvā pañcāmṛtādibhiḥ abhiṣicya
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ yathā uktam yantram sampādya prāṇa pratiṣṭhām kṛtvā pañcāmṛta ādibhiḥ abhiṣicya

original: aṣṭottara-śataṃ sahasraṃ vā sampāta-ghṛta-siktaṃ kṛtvā yathokta-saṅkhyaṃ japtvā dhārayed iti kīdṛśaṃ ?
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśatam sahasram vā sampāta ghṛta siktam kṛtvā yathā ukta saṅkhyam japtvā dhārayet iti kīdṛśam

punar anarghya vīryam mahā prabhāvam
yantrasya darśayati dhāraṇāt anyatra api upayogam

original: dhyāyan śirasi prajapen mantram imaṃ jhaṭiti śamayituṃ vikṛtim // Krd_5.90 //
analyzed: dhyāyan śirasi prajapet mantram imam jhaṭiti śamayitum vikṛtim

original: bhūtaḥ śamśāna-deśa-vartī adṛśya-rūpo 'niṣṭa-kārī unmādaś citta-vibhramaḥ apasmṛtir
analyzed: bhūtaḥ śamśāna deśa vartī adṛśya rūpaḥ niṣṭa kārī unmādaḥ citta vibhramaḥ apasmṛtiḥ

original: apasmāraṇa-yogaḥ viṣaṃ mūrchākāri-sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca mūrcchā aceṣṭā vibhramaḥ
analyzed: apasmāraṇa yogaḥ viṣam mūrchā kāri sthāvaram jaṅgamam ca mūrcchā aceṣṭā vibhramaḥ

original: prasādaḥ jvaro roga-viśeṣaḥ etair ārtānāṃ pīḍitānāṃ śirasi mastakopari idaṃ yantra-rūpaṃ
analyzed: prasādaḥ jvaraḥ roga viśeṣaḥ etaiḥ ārtānām pīḍitānām śirasi mastaka upari idam yantra rūpam
