original: khara-mañjaryā apāmārgasya mañjarībhir agra-bhāgaiḥ pañca-gavya-jalaiḥ siktair vibhāvasau vahnau pūjanā-hantuḥ kṛṣṇasyānana-rūpe juhuyāt //
analyzed: kharamañjaryāḥ apāmārgasya mañjarībhiḥ agra bhāgaiḥ pañcagavya jalaiḥ siktaiḥ vibhāvasau vahnau pūjana ahantuḥ kṛṣṇasya ānana rūpe juhuyāt
prāśayet śiṣṭa gavyam tad kalaśena abhiṣecayet
sādhyam sahasra japtena sarva upadrava śāntaye

original: homāvaśiṣṭaṃ pañca-gavya-sādhyaṃ prāśayet sahasra-japtena pūrvokta-vidhinā sādhitena kalaśena vābhiṣecayet sarvopadra-nivṛtty-artham // KrdC_6.16
analyzed: homa avaśiṣṭam pañcagavya sādhyam prāśayet sahasra japtena pūrva ukta vidhinā sādhitena kalaśena vā abhiṣecayet sarva upadra nivṛtti artham
mantra antaram āha

original: amunaitad dvādaśārṇaṃ huṃ phaṭ svāhāntakena vā /
analyzed: amunā etat dvādaśa arṇam hum phaṭ svāhā antakena vā
ṛṣi ādyāḥ brahma gāyatrī graha ghna harayoḥ tu
etat pūrva ukta prayoga dvayam vakṣyamāṇa mantreṇa vā kuryāt

original: mantram āha-dvādaśeti-pūrvokta-vāsudeva-dvādaśākṣarānte huṃ phaṭ svāheti ṣoḍaśākṣaro mantraḥ daśāṣṭādaśākṣara-samānaḥ /
analyzed: mantram āha dvādaśa iti pūrva ukta vāsudeva dvādaśa akṣara ante hum phaṭ svāhā iti ṣoḍaśa akṣaraḥ mantraḥ daśa aṣṭādaśa akṣara samānaḥ
ṛṣi ādikam āha ṛṣi ādyāḥ iti
ṛṣi prabhṛtayaḥ brahma ādayaḥ
tatra brahmā ṛṣiḥ
gāyatrī chandaḥ
graha ghna rūpaḥ hariḥ devatā
mantra uddhāraḥ

original: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya huṃ phaṭ svāhā /
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya hum phaṭ svāhā
nija pāda ambuja ākṣipta śakaṭam cintayan japet
ayutam mantrayoḥ ekam sarva vighna upaśantaye
nija caraṇa kamala nikṣipta śakaṭam harim cintayet
mantrayoḥ pūrva mantra apara mantrayoḥ ekam ayutam japet

original: kim-artham ? sakala-vighnopaśamanārthaṃ daśāṣṭādaśākṣarayor eva sarva-vighna-śānty-arthaṃ viśeṣa-dhyānam iti tripāṭhinaḥ // KrdC_6.18 //
analyzed: kimartham sakala vighna upaśamana artham daśa aṣṭādaśa akṣarayoḥ eva sarva vighna śānti artham viśeṣa dhyānam iti tripāṭhinaḥ
aṅgāni amīṣām mantrāṇām ā cakra ādibhiḥ arcanā

original: aṅgair indrādi-vajrādyair uditā sampade sadā // Krd_6.19 //
analyzed: aṅgaiḥ indra ādi vajra ādyaiḥ uditā sampade sadā

original: amīṣāṃ kathita-mantrāṇām ācakrādibhir daśākṣara-kathitair aṅgāni kāryāṇi arcanā pūjās tu aṅgais tathendrādyais tad-āyudhaiś ceti sampatty-arthaṃ  #
analyzed: amīṣām kathita mantrāṇām ācakra ādibhiḥ daśa akṣara kathitaiḥ aṅgāni kāryāṇi arcanā pūjāḥ tu aṅgaiḥ tathā indra ādyaiḥ tad āyudhaiḥ ca iti sampatti artham
sadā kathitā
mṛtyuñjaya vidhim darśayati

original: bālo nīla-tanur dorbhyāṃ dadhy-utthaṃ pāyasaṃ dadhat /
analyzed: bālaḥ nīla tanuḥ dorbhyām dadhyuttham pāyasam dadhat
hariḥ vaḥ vyāt dvīpi nakha kiṅkiṇī jāla maṇḍitaḥ

original: daśāṣṭādaśākṣarayor vārogyārthaṃ viśeṣa-dhyānam āha-bāla ity ādineti tripāṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: daśa aṣṭādaśa akṣarayoḥ vā ārogya artham viśeṣa dhyānam āha bālaḥ iti ādinā iti tripāṭhinaḥ
hariḥ vaḥ yuṣmān rakṣatu
kīdṛśaḥ bālaḥ
pañca varṣīyaḥ
punar kīdṛśaḥ nīla tanuḥ
punar kīdṛśaḥ

original: hastābhyāṃ dadhy-utthaṃ navanītaṃ pāyasaṃ paramānnaṃ ca dhārayet /
analyzed: hastābhyām dadhyuttham navanītam pāyasam paramānnam ca dhārayet
punar kīdṛśaḥ
vyāghra nakha kṣudra ghaṇṭikā samūhābhyām alaṅkṛtaḥ
dhyātvā eva agnau juhuyāt śata vīrya aṅkura trikaiḥ

original: payaḥ-sarpiḥ-plutair lakṣam ekaṃ tāvaj japen manum // Krd_6.21 //
analyzed: payaḥ sarpiḥ plutaiḥ lakṣam ekam tāvat japet manum

original: evambhūtaṃ hariṃ dhyātvā vahnau śatavīryāṅkurair durvāṅkurais tribhiḥ /
analyzed: evambhūtam harim dhyātvā vahnau śata vīrya aṅkuraiḥ durvā aṅkuraiḥ tribhiḥ

original: kīdṛśaiḥ ? payo dugdhaṃ sarpi-ghṛtaṃ tābhyāṃ plutaiḥ siktaiḥ ekaṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt lakṣam ekaṃ japet // KrdC_6.21 //
analyzed: kīdṛśaiḥ payaḥ dugdham sarpi ghṛtam tābhyām plutaiḥ siktaiḥ ekam lakṣam juhuyāt lakṣam ekam japet
gurave dakṣiṇām dattvā bhojayet dvija puṅgavān

original: sa hy abdānāṃ śataṃ jīven na rogo nātra saṃśayaḥ // Krd_6.22 //
analyzed: sa hi abdānām śatam jīvet na rogaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: anantaraṃ gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇān bhojayec ca sa varṣāṇāṃ śataṃ roga-rahitaḥ san jīvet-atra saṃśayo nāsti // KrdC_6.22 //
analyzed: anantaram gurave dakṣiṇām dattvā brāhmaṇān bhojayet ca sa varṣāṇām śatam roga rahitaḥ san jīvet atra saṃśayaḥ na asti
mantra antaram āha
atrā aparaḥ manuḥ dvādaśa arṇa ante puruṣottama

original: āyur me dehi sambhāṣya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave // Krd_6.23 //
analyzed: āyuḥ me dehi sambhāṣya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave
namaḥ ntaḥ dvi adhikatriṃśat arṇaḥ sya ārṣiḥ tu nāradaḥ

original: chando 'nuṣṭup-devatā ca śrī-kṛṣṇo 'ṅgāny ato bruve // Krd_6.24 //
analyzed: chandaḥ nuṣṭubh devatā ca śrī kṛṣṇaḥ ṅgāni atas bruve
etādṛśe kārye paraḥ mantraḥ sti

original: mantram āha-dvādaśākṣara-vāsudeva-mantrānte puruṣottama iti svarūpam āyur me dehīti svarūpaṃ viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave iti svarūpam /
analyzed: mantram āha dvādaśa akṣara vāsudeva mantra ante puruṣottamaḥ iti sva rūpam āyuḥ me dehi iti sva rūpam viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave iti sva rūpam

original: nama ity anto dvy-adhika-triṃśad-arṇo dvātriṃśad-akṣaro mantraḥ kathitas tu /
analyzed: namaḥ iti antaḥ dvi adhikatriṃśat arṇaḥ dvātriṃśat akṣaraḥ mantraḥ kathitaḥ tu

original: punar asya mantrasya nārada ṛṣir anuṣṭup-chando devatā śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ iti ato 'nantaram aṅgāni bruve vadāmi // KrdC_6.23-24 //
analyzed: punar asya mantrasya nāradaḥ ṛṣiḥ anuṣṭubh chandaḥ devatā śrī kṛṣṇaḥ iti atas nantaram aṅgāni bruve vadāmi
mantra uddhāraḥ

original: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya puruṣottam āyur me dehi viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave namaḥ /
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya puruṣottam āyuḥ me dehi viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave namaḥ
ravi bhūta indriya vasu netra arṇaiḥ ca ātmane yutaiḥ

original: dvādaśa-pañca-pañcāṣṭa-dvi-saṅkhyātair mantrākṣarair ātmanepadāntair mahānandādi-padaiḥ saha krameṇa pañcāṅgāni /
analyzed: dvādaśa pañca pañca aṣṭa dvi saṅkhyātaiḥ mantra akṣaraiḥ ātmanepada antaiḥ mahānanda ādi padaiḥ saha krameṇa pañca aṅgāni
sahānanda iti api kvacid pāṭhaḥ
etasya puraścaraṇa ādim āha

original: japtvā lakṣam imaṃ mantram ayutaṃ pāyasair hunet /
analyzed: japtvā lakṣam imam mantram ayutam pāyasaiḥ hunet

original: pūrvavad dūrvayā juhvad āyur dīrghataraṃ labhet // Krd_6.26 //
analyzed: pūrvavat dūrvayā juhvat āyuḥ dīrghataram labhet

original: imaṃ mantraṃ lakṣaṃ japtvā pāyasair ayutaṃ hunet juhuyāt /
analyzed: imam mantram lakṣam japtvā pāyasaiḥ ayutam hunet juhuyāt

original: evaṃ mantraṃ saṃsādhya pūrvavad dūrvayāṅkurakaiḥ dugdha-ghṛta-militair lakṣam ekaṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: evam mantram saṃsādhya pūrvavat dūrvayā aṅkurakaiḥ dugdha ghṛta militaiḥ lakṣam ekam juhuyāt

original: japaiś ca dīrghataram atiśayam āyuḥ prāpnoti // KrdC_6.26 //
analyzed: japaiḥ ca dīrghataram atiśayam āyuḥ prāpnoti

original: dārayantaṃ bakaṃ dorbhyāṃ kṛṣṇaṃ saṃgṛhya tuṇḍayoḥ /
analyzed: dārayantam bakam dorbhyām kṛṣṇam saṃgṛhya tuṇḍayoḥ
smaran śiśūnām ātaṅke spṛṣṭvā ayataram abhyaset

original: taj-japta-tilajābhyaṅgād bhaveyuḥ sukhinaś ca te // Krd_6.27 //
analyzed: tad japta tilaja abhyaṅgāt bhaveyuḥ sukhinaḥ ca te

original: śiśūnāṃ bālānām ātaṅke bhaye samupasthite tān bālān spṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ smaran anyataram ukteṣv ekaṃ mantram abhyasej japyāt /
analyzed: śiśūnām bālānām ātaṅke bhaye samupasthite tān bālān spṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam smaran anyataram ukteṣu ekam mantram abhyaset japyāt
kīdṛśam kṛṣṇam

original: karābhyāṃ tuṇḍayoḥ saṃgṛhya baka-nāmānam asuraṃ vidārayantam /
analyzed: karābhyām tuṇḍayoḥ saṃgṛhya baka nāmānam asuram vidārayantam
tad mantra japta taila abhyaṅgāt te bālāḥ sukhinaḥ bhavanti
smaran iti śuśunāmānam kṛṣṇam smaran

original: ke śirasi spṛṣṭvā japyād iti boddhavya-mantra-daśāṣṭādaśākṣarayor viśeṣa-dhyānam iti tripāṭhinaḥ // KrdC_6.27 //
analyzed: ke śirasi spṛṣṭvā japyāt iti boddhavya mantra daśa aṣṭādaśa akṣarayoḥ viśeṣa dhyānam iti tripāṭhinaḥ
asmin eva bāla rakṣā arthe mantraḥ sti iti āha
atrā api anyaḥ manuḥ bāla vapuṣe vahni vallabhā

original: gorakṣāyāṃ kvaṇad-veṇuṃ cārayantaṃ paśūṃs tathā // Krd_6.28 //
analyzed: gorakṣāyām kvaṇat veṇum cārayantam paśūn tathā

original: bāla-vapuṣe iti svarūpaṃ vahni-vallabheti svāhā asminn arthe gorakṣāyāṃ ca viśeṣa-dhyānam āha-kvaṇad iti /
analyzed: bāla vapuṣe iti svarūpam vahni vallabha iti svāhā asmin arthe gorakṣāyām ca viśeṣa dhyānam āhakvaṇat iti

original: veṇu-vādana-paraṃ paśūṃś cārayantaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ smaran japyāt // KrdC_6.28 //
analyzed: veṇu vādana param paśūn cārayantam kṛṣṇam smaran japyāt

original: asminn eva bāla-rakṣārthe go-rakṣāyāṃ ca mantrāntaram āha-
analyzed: asmin eva bāla rakṣā arthe gorakṣāyām ca mantra antaram āha
uktvā gopālaka padam punar veśadharāya ca
vāsudevāya varma astra śirāṃsi aṣṭādaśa akṣara

original: gopālaka ity uktvā punar veśadharāya ity uktvā vāsudevāyeti vadet varma hum astraṃ phaḍ iti śiraḥ svāhā etāni vadet /
analyzed: gopālake iti uktvā punar veśadharāya iti uktvā vāsudevāya iti vadet varma hum astram phaṭ iti śiraḥ svāhā etāni vadet
evam sati aṣṭādaśa akṣaraḥ bhavati
mantra uddhāraḥ
gopālaka veśa dharāya vāsudevāya hum phaṭ svāhā
manoḥ nārada gāyatrī kṛṣṇa ṛṣi ādiḥ anena vā
kuryāt gopāla saṃrakṣām ācakra ādi aṅginā budhaḥ

original: asya pūrvoktasya ca manor nārado munir gāyatrī-cchandaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇo devatā anena vā mantreṇa ukta-dravyādinā vā gopāla-rakṣāṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: asya pūrva uktasya ca manoḥ nāradaḥ muniḥ gāyatrī chandaḥ śrī kṛṣṇaḥ devatā anena vā mantreṇa ukta dravya ādinā vā gopāla rakṣām kuryāt
kīdṛśeṇa ā cakra ādi aṅga yuktena
viṣa haraṇa prayogam āha
kumbhīnasa ādi kṣveḍa ārtau daṣṭa mūrdhni smaran harim
nṛtyantam kāliya phaṇa āraṅge nyataram abhyaset

original: dṛśā pīyūṣa-varṣiṇyā siñcantaṃ tat tanuṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: dṛśā pīyūṣa varṣiṇyā siñcantam tat tanum budhaḥ

original: tarjayan vāma-tarjanyā taṃ drāṅ mocayate viṣāt // Krd_6.32 //
analyzed: tarjayan vāma tarjanyā tam drāk mocayate viṣāt
kumbhīnasa ādi kṣveḍa ārtau sarpa viṣa pīḍāyām

original: kumbhīnasās tu te sarpā ye syur dṛṣṭi-viṣolbaṇāḥ iti dharaṇiḥ /
analyzed: kumbhīnasāḥ tu te sarpāḥ ye syuḥ dṛṣṭi viṣa ulbaṇāḥ iti dharaṇiḥ

original: ādi-padād vṛścikādi-saṅgraho daṣṭa-mūrdhni ārta-mastake spṛṣṭvā kāliyo nāga-viśeṣas tasya phaṇā saivaa raṅga-bhūmis tatra nṛtyantaṃ smaran  #
analyzed: ādi padāt vṛścika ādi saṅgrahaḥ daṣṭa mūrdhni ārta mastake spṛṣṭvā kāliyaḥ nāga viśeṣaḥ tasya phaṇā raṅga bhūmiḥ tatra nṛtyantam smaran
anyatama mantram abhyaset japet

original: kīdṛśaṃ ? hariṃ tat tanuṃ śarīram amṛta-varṣiṇyā dṛṣṭyā siñcantam /
analyzed: kīdṛśam harim tat tanum śarīram amṛta varṣiṇyā dṛṣṭyā siñcantam
kim kurvan smaret vāma tarjanyā ātarjayan

original: evaṃ sati taṃ daṣṭaṃ mantrī drāk śīghraṃ viṣān mocayet /
analyzed: evam sati tam daṣṭam mantrī drāk śīghram viṣāt mocayet

original: atra daśāṣṭādaśākṣarayor viśeṣa-dhyānam iti tripāṭhinaḥ // KrdC_6.31-32 //
analyzed: atra daśa aṣṭādaśa akṣarayoḥ viśeṣa dhyānam iti tripāṭhinaḥ
prayoga antaram āha
ā pūrva kalaśam toyaiḥ smṛtvā kāliya mardanam

original: japtvāṣṭa-śatam āsiñced viṣiṇaṃ sa sukhī bhavet // Krd_6.33 //
analyzed: japtvā aṣṭaśatam āsiñcet sa sukhī bhavet

original: kalaśaṃ toyair āpūryānantaraṃ kāliya-mardanaṃ devaṃ smṛtvāṣṭādhikaṃ śataṃ japtvā tena kalaśena viṣa-yuktam āsiñcet /
analyzed: kalaśam toyaiḥ āpūrya anantaram kāliyamardanam devam smṛtvā aṣṭa adhikam śatam japtvā tena kalaśena viṣa yuktam āsiñcet
anantaram viṣāt sukhī bhavati
kāliya mardana mantram āha
kāvya madhye phaṇā madhye di varṇakān

original: uktvā punar vaden nṛtyaṃ karoti tam anantaram // Krd_6.34 //
analyzed: uktvā punar vadet nṛtyam karoti tam anantaram
namāmi devakīputraḥ iti uktvā nṛtya śabdataḥ

original: rājānam acyutaṃ brūyād iti danta-lipir manuḥ // Krd_6.35 //
analyzed: rājānam acyutam brūyāt iti dantalipiḥ manuḥ

original: kāvya ity akṣara-dvayor madhye liyasyeti svarūpam etasyānte phaṇā-madhyādi iti svarūpam ity antān vaded anantaraṃ nṛtyaṃ karoti tam iti /
analyzed: kāvyaḥ iti akṣara dvayoḥ madhye liyasya iti svarūpam etasya ante phaṇā madhya ādi iti svarūpam iti antān vadet anantaram nṛtyam karoti tam iti
anantaram namāmi devakīputram iti vadet

original: anantaraṃ nṛtya-śabdataḥ nṛtya-śabdānte rājanam acyutam iti brūyād ity anena prakāreṇa danta-lipir dvātriṃśad-akṣaro mantraḥ kathitaḥ // KrdC_6.34-35
analyzed: anantaram nṛtya śabdataḥ nṛtya śabda ante rājanam acyutam iti brūyāt iti anena prakāreṇa dantalipiḥ dvātriṃśat akṣaraḥ mantraḥ kathitaḥ  /
mantra uddhāraḥ
iti nṛtyam karoti tam
devakīputram namāmi nṛtya rājānam
asya mantrasya aṅga ādīni darśayati
asya aṅgāni aṅghribhiḥ nyastaiḥ samastaiḥ nāradaḥ muniḥ

original: chando 'nuṣṭub devatā ca kṛṣṇaḥ kāliya-mardanaḥ // Krd_6.36 //
analyzed: chandaḥ nuṣṭubh devatā ca kṛṣṇaḥ kāliya mardanaḥ

original: asya mantrasya vyastair ekaikam aṅghribhiś caturbhiḥ pādaiḥ samastair mantrātmakaiś
analyzed: asya mantrasya vyastaiḥ ekaikam aṅghribhiḥ caturbhiḥ pādaiḥ samastaiḥ mantra ātmakaiḥ

original: cāṅgāni pañcāṅgāni kathitāni muniḥ nāradaḥ chando 'nuṣṭup kālīya-mardanaḥ kṛṣṇo devatā // KrdC_6.36 //
analyzed: ca aṅgāni pañcāṅgāni kathitāni muniḥ nāradaḥ chandaḥ nuṣṭubh kālīya mardanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ devatā
puraścaraṇam āha

original: japyo lakṣaṃ manur ayaṃ hotavyaṃ sarpiṣāyutam /
analyzed: japyaḥ lakṣam manuḥ ayam hotavyam sarpiṣā ayutam
aṅga dikpāla vajra ādyaiḥ arcanā asya samīritā

original: ayaṃ mantraḥ lakṣaṃ japyaḥ sarpiṣā ghṛtena punar ayutaṃ hotavyam /
analyzed: ayam mantraḥ lakṣam japyaḥ sarpiṣā ghṛtena punar ayutam hotavyam

original: aṅga-dik-pāla-vajrādyais tribhir āvaraṇair arcanā pūjā kathitā //
analyzed: aṅga dikpāla vajra ādyaiḥ tribhiḥ āvaraṇaiḥ arcanā pūjā kathitā
prayogam āha

original: kriyā sarvā ca kartavyā visaghnī pūrvam īritā /
analyzed: kriyā sarvā ca kartavyā visaghnī pūrvam īritā

original: sadṛśo 'nena jagati nahi kṣveḍa-haro manuḥ // Krd_6.38 //
analyzed: sadṛśaḥ nena jagati nahi kṣveḍa haraḥ manuḥ

original: pūrva-mantra-kathitā viṣaghnī sarvā kriyā amunaiva mantreṇa kartavyā hi yataḥ jagati saṃsāre anena mantreṇa sadṛśaḥ samānaḥ kṣveḍa-haraḥ viṣaharo  #
analyzed: pūrva mantra kathitā viṣa ghnī sarvā kriyā amunā eva mantreṇa kartavyā hi yatas jagati saṃsāre anena mantreṇa sadṛśaḥ samānaḥ kṣveḍa haraḥ viṣa haraḥ
na asti
viṣa ghnam prayoga antaram āha
aṅgaiḥ śuka taroḥ piṣṭaiḥ gulikā dhenu vāriṇā
ānanasya añjana ālepaiḥ viṣa ghnī sādhitā amunā
śuka taroḥ karañja vṛkṣasya iti bhairava tripāṭhinaḥ
kiṃśuka vṛkṣasya iti laghudīpikā kāraḥ
aṅgaiḥ tvagbhiḥ iti rudradharaḥ
pañcāṅgaiḥ iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: dhenu-vāriṇā sa-vatsā go-mūtreṇa piṣṭaiḥ sampāditā gulikā amunā mantreṇa sādhitā satī viṣaghnī bhavati kair ānanasyāñjanālepa-prakāraiḥ //
analyzed: dhenu vāriṇā sa vatsā go mūtreṇa piṣṭaiḥ sampāditā gulikā amunā mantreṇa sādhitā satī viṣa ghnī bhavati kaiḥ ānanasya añjana ālepa prakāraiḥ
adhunā prayoga antaram darśayati
anya hasta aṅgulī vyakta svara vaṃśa arpita ānanam

original: dhyāyan hariṃ japan manvor ekaṃ chatraṃ vinā vrajet /
analyzed: dhyāyan harim japan manvoḥ ekam chatram vinā vrajet

original: varṣa-vātāśanibhyaḥ syād bhayaṃ tasya nahi kvacit // Krd_6.41 //
analyzed: varṣa vāta aśanibhyaḥ syāt bhayam tasya na hi kvacid

original: uttālito yo vāma-bāhu-daṇḍas tena dhṛto govardhanācalo yena tam anya-hastāṅgkulibhiḥ
analyzed: uttālitaḥ yaḥ vāma bāhu daṇḍaḥ tena dhṛtaḥ govardhana acalaḥ yena tam anya hasta aṅgkulibhiḥ

original: vyakta-svaro yasya vaṃśasya tatrārpitam ānanaṃ yena tam evambhūtaṃ hariṃ cintayan
analyzed: vyakta svaraḥ yasya vaṃśasya tatra arpitam ānanam yena tam evambhūtam harim cintayan

original: manvor daśāṣṭādaśākṣarayor ekaṃ japan chatraṃ vinā vrajet yas tasya vṛṣṭi-vāyu-vajrādibhyo
analyzed: manvoḥ daśa aṣṭādaśa akṣarayoḥ ekam japan chatram vinā vrajet yaḥ tasya vṛṣṭi vāyu vajra ādibhyaḥ
bhayam kvāpi na vidyate
prayoga antaram āha
mogha megha ogha yatna apagata indram tam smaran hunet

original: lavaṇair ayuta-saṅkhyātair anāvṛṣṭir na saṃśayaḥ // Krd_6.42 //
analyzed: lavaṇaiḥ ayuta saṅkhyātaiḥ anāvṛṣṭiḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: mogho niṣphalo yo megha-samūhas tasya yatnaḥ tenāpagataḥ indor yasmāt tam etādṛśaṃ
analyzed: moghaḥ niṣphalaḥ yaḥ megha samūhaḥ tasya yatnaḥ tena apagataḥ indoḥ yasmāt tam etādṛśam

original: hariṃ cintayan ayuta-saṅkhyātair lavaṇair juhuyāt anantaram anāvṛṣṭir bhavati nātra
analyzed: harim cintayan ayuta saṅkhyātaiḥ lavaṇaiḥ juhuyāt anantaram anāvṛṣṭiḥ bhavati na atra

original: sicyamānam evambhūtaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dhyātvā vānīra-tarpaṇaiḥ vetasa-samidbhiḥ payaḥ-siktair
analyzed: sicyamānam evambhūtam kṛṣṇam dhyātvā vānīra tarpaṇaiḥ vetasa samidbhiḥ payaḥ siktaiḥ

anena eva dhyānena prayoga antaram āha

original: dāha-moha-sahitair vuṣa-sphoṭa-jvarādibhir ārtasya mūrdhni mastake amum eva pūrvokta-rūpaṃ dhyātvā japet anantaraṃ tasya pīḍitasya kṣaṇād śāntiḥ  #
analyzed: dāha moha sahitaiḥ vuṣa sphoṭa jvara ādibhiḥ ārtasya mūrdhni mastake amum eva pūrva ukta rūpam dhyātvā japet anantaram tasya pīḍitasya kṣaṇāt śāntiḥ
svāsthyam bhavati
etasyām eva ārtau prakāra antaram āha
athavā garuḍa ārūḍham bala pradyumna saṃyutam

original: śāntiṃ vrajed asādhyo 'pi jvaraḥ sopadravaḥ kṣaṇāt // Krd_6.47 //
analyzed: śāntim vrajet asādhyaḥ jvaraḥ sa upadravaḥ kṣaṇāt

original: evambhūtaṃ harim dhyātvā ārtaṃ jvarādi-pīḍitaṃ pāṇibhyāṃ spṛṣṭvā jvara-nāśārthaṃ manvor ekataraṃ japet // KrdC_6.49 //

original: kalaśa-pūraṇa-vidhānena kṣīra-vṛkṣa-kvāthena sampūrṇam kalaśaṃ niśi rātrau sampūjyāyutaṃ japtvā prage prātaḥ-kāle putrārthinīṃ striyaṃ dviṣaṭ-dinam  #
analyzed: kalaśa pūraṇa vidhānena kṣīravṛkṣa kvāthena sampūrṇam kalaśam niśi rātrau sampūjya ayutam japtvā prage prātaḥkāle putra arthinīm striyam dvi ṣaṣ dinam

original: anantaraṃ sābhiṣiktā bandhyāpi apatya-janana-samaya-yogyā ajanitāpatyo 'pi putrān dīrghāyuṣo roga-rahitān prāpnoti /

analyzed: prahitām preṣitām kāśi īśvareṇa kṛtyām ghāta kartīm nija ariṇā nija cakreṇa chitvā anantaram

analyzed: tathā hasta paṅkajābhyām ghaṇṭākarṇasya mahādeva mūrteḥ kasyacid mahādeva bhaktasya

original: manvor daśāṣṭādaśākṣarayor ekaṃ sapta-sahasrakam abhyaset japet /
analyzed: manvoḥ daśa aṣṭādaśa akṣarayoḥ ekam sapta sahasrakam abhyaset japet

original: evaṃ kṛte sati etasya śatrūṇāṃ saptabhir dinair uccāṭanaṃ bhavati sva-deśād apayānaṃ bhavati // KrdC_6.62 //
analyzed: evam kṛte sati etasya śatrūṇām saptabhiḥ dinaiḥ uccāṭanam bhavati sva deśāt apayānam bhavati
prayoga antaram āha
utkṣipta vatsakam dhyāyan kapittha phala hāriṇam

original: ayutaṃ prajapet sādhyam uccāṭayati tat-kṣaṇāt // Krd_6.63 //
analyzed: ayutam prajapet sādhyam uccāṭayati tad kṣaṇāt

original: utkṣipta ūrdhvaṃ kṣipto vatso vatsa-rūpo vatsakāsuro yena tathā kapitthasya phalaṃ haratīti kṛṣṇaṃ dhyātvā manvor madhye ekaṃ ayutaṃ japet
analyzed: utkṣiptaḥ ūrdhvam kṣiptaḥ vatsaḥ vatsa rūpaḥ vatsaka asuraḥ yena tathā kapitthasya phalam harati iti kṛṣṇam dhyātvā manvoḥ madhye ekam ayutam japet

original: anantaraṃ tat-kṣaṇāt śīghram eva sādhyam uccāṭanīyam uccāṭayati // KrdC_6.63 //
analyzed: anantaram tad kṣaṇāt śīghram eva sādhyam uccāṭanīyam uccāṭayati
prayoga antaram āha
ātmānam kaṃsa mathanam dhyātvā mañcāt nipātitam

original: kaṃsātmānam ariṃ karṣan gatāsuṃ prajapen manum // Krd_6.64 //
analyzed: kaṃsa ātmānam arim karṣan gatāsum prajapet manum
ayutam juhuyāt vā asya janma uḍu taru tarpaṇaiḥ

original: api sevita-pīyūṣo miryate 'rir na saṃśayaḥ // Krd_6.65 //
analyzed: api sevita pīyūṣaḥ miryate riḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: ātmānaṃ kaṃsa-mathanaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dhyātvā kaṃsa-mathanāt manor aikyaṃ vicintya tathā ripuṃ kaṃsa-svarūpaṃ apagata-prāṇaṃ dhyātvā ripu-kaṃsayor  #
analyzed: ātmānam kaṃsa mathanam kṛṣṇam dhyātvā kaṃsa mathanāt manoḥ aikyam vicintya tathā ripum kaṃsa sva rūpam apagata prāṇam dhyātvā ripu kaṃsayoḥ
abhedam vicintya iti bhāvaḥ

original: mañcād adhaḥ-kṛtaṃ ākarṣayan ākarṣaṇaṃ bhāvayan manvor ekam ayutaṃ japet /
analyzed: mañcāt adhas kṛtam ākarṣayan ākarṣaṇam bhāvayan manvoḥ ekam ayutam japet

original: asya ripoḥ janmoḍutarutarpaṇaiḥ samidbhir juhuyāc ca /
analyzed: asya ripoḥ janma uḍu taru tarpaṇaiḥ samidbhiḥ juhuyāt ca
dhātrī syāt udumbarataruḥ punar
jambū khadīra kṛṣṇa ākhyāḥ vaṃśa pippala saṃjñakau
nāga rohita nāmānau palāśa plakṣa saṃjñakau
ambaṣṭha bilva arjuna ākhyam vikaṅkata mahīruhaḥ
śamī kadamba āmra nimba madhukāḥ ṛkṣa śākhinaḥ
iti saptaviṃśati nakṣatrāṇām vṛkṣāḥ

original: janma-nakṣatra-vṛkṣa evaṃ kṛte seivta-pīyūṣo 'pi mriyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // KrdC_6.64-65 //
analyzed: janma nakṣatra vṛkṣe evam kṛte mriyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
idam prayojanam prakāra antareṇa api bhavati iti darśayati

original: ayutaṃ prayato rātrau maraṇāya ripoḥ kṣaṇāt // Krd_6.66 //
analyzed: ayutam prayataḥ rātrau maraṇāya ripoḥ kṣaṇāt

original: nimba-taila-siktair akṣajaiḥ vibhītaka-samidbhiḥ prayataḥ pavitraḥ san rātrau manvor ekena ayutaṃ hunet /
analyzed: nimba taila siktaiḥ akṣa jaiḥ vibhītaka samidbhiḥ prayataḥ pavitraḥ san rātrau manvoḥ ekena ayutam hunet
kimartham śatroḥ śīghra vināśāya
asmin eva arthe prayoga antaram āha
hunet eraṇḍa taila aktaiḥ smaśāna sthaḥ ri śāntaye

original: doṣā haridrā ariṣṭa-dalaṃ vibhītaka-patram iti rudradharaḥ /
analyzed: doṣā haridrā ariṣṭa dalam vibhītaka patram iti rudradharaḥ

original: vyoṣaṃ trikaṭukaṃ kārpāsāsthi kārpāsā-bījaṃ kaṇaṃ pipplaī etair militair eraṇḍa-taila-siktaiḥ smaśānasthaḥ mṛta-saṃskāra-sthānasthaḥ san niśi  #
analyzed: vyoṣam trikaṭukam kārpāsa asthi kārpāsā bījam kaṇam pipplaī etaiḥ militaiḥ eraṇḍa taila siktaiḥ smaśāna sthaḥ mṛta saṃskāra sthāna sthaḥ san niśi
rātrau manvoḥ ekena juhuyāt
kimartham śatru nāśa artham

analyzed: na śastam māraṇam karma kuryāt ced ayutam japet

original: huned vā pāyasais tāvat śāntaye śāntamāsaḥ // Krd_6.68 //
analyzed: hunet vā pāyasaiḥ tāvat śāntaye śānta māsaḥ

original: māraṇaṃ karma śiṣṭa-janasya na praśastaṃ tathāpi yadi vā rāgāt kuryāt tadā manvor madhye ekaṃ mantraṃ ayutaṃ japet paramānnena vā ayutaṃ juhuyāt
analyzed: māraṇam karma śiṣṭa janasya na praśastam tathā api yadi vā rāgāt kuryāt tadā manvoḥ madhye ekam mantram ayutam japet paramānnena vā ayutam juhuyāt
śāntaye pāpa nāśāya śānta mānasaḥ nirmatsaraḥ
prayoga antaram āha

original: smaran parājayas tasya na kutaścid bhaviṣyati // Krd_6.69 //
analyzed: smaran parājayaḥ tasya na kutaścid bhaviṣyati

original: jaya-kāmaḥ pumān balād indra-sakāśāt svargastha-pārijātāpahāriṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ bhāvayan manvor ekaṃ lakṣaṃ japet /
analyzed: jaya kāmaḥ pumān balāt indra sakāśāt svarga stha pārijāta apahāriṇam kṛṣṇam bhāvayan manvoḥ ekam lakṣam japet

original: evaṃ kṛte tasya bhaṅgaḥ kasmād api na bhaviṣyatīti // KrdC_6.69 //
analyzed: evam kṛte tasya bhaṅgaḥ kasmāt api na bhaviṣyati iti
prayoga antaram āha

original: rathasthaṃ bhāvayan japyād dharma-vṛddhyai śamāya ca // Krd_6.70 //
analyzed: ratha stham bhāvayan japyāt dharma vṛddhyai śamāya ca

original: pārthe 'rjune gītārthaṃ diśantaṃ kathayantaṃ tathā vyākhyā-mudrāṃ kare yasya tam
analyzed: pārthe rjune gīta artham diśantam kathayantam tathā vyākhyā mudrām kare yasya tam

original: uttāna-tarjany-aṅguṣṭha-yutā vyākhyā-mudrā tathā rathārūḍhaṃ hariṃ bhāvayan manvor ekaṃ lakṣaṃ japet /
analyzed: uttāna tarjanī aṅguṣṭha yutā vyākhyā mudrā tathā ratha ārūḍham harim bhāvayan manvoḥ ekam lakṣam japet

prayoga antaram āha
lakṣam palāśa kusumaiḥ hunet yaḥ madhura āplutaiḥ

original: vyākhyātā sarva-śāstrāṇāṃ sa kavir vādirāḍ bhavet // Krd_6.71 //
analyzed: vyākhyātā sarva śāstrāṇām sa kaviḥ vādi rāj bhavet

original: yaḥ palāśa-puṣpair ghṛta-madhu-śarkarā-miśrair manvor ekena lakṣaṃ juhuyāt sa sakala-śāstrāṇāṃ vyākhyātā kavirāṭ kavi-śreṣṭhaś ca bhavet //
analyzed: yaḥ palāśa puṣpaiḥ ghṛta madhu śarkarā miśraiḥ manvoḥ ekena lakṣam juhuyāt sa sakala śāstrāṇām vyākhyātā kavi rāj kavi śreṣṭhaḥ ca bhavet
prayoga antaram āha

original: prajapen mantrayor ekataraṃ dhyātvaivam ādarāt // Krd_6.74 //

original: viśvarūpa-dharam etad vyācaṣṭe udyad-āditya-koṭi-samāna-kāntiṃ tathā dravībhūta-suvarṇa-tulyaṃ tathā agni-soma-svarūpaṃ /
analyzed: viśva rūpa dharam etat vyācaṣṭe udyat āditya koṭi samāna kāntim tathā dravībhūta suvarṇa tulyam tathā agni soma sva rūpam
sūrya soma ātmakam iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: tathā sūryāgnivad ujjvalaṃ mukhaṃ pāda-padmaṃ yasya /

original: tathā cāru-bhūṣaṇaṃ tathā vividha-śastra-dharaṃ tathā vyāpta-saṃsārākāśābhyantaram,
analyzed: tathā cāru bhūṣaṇam tathā vividha śastra dharam tathā vyāpta saṃsāra ākāśa abhyantaram

original: etādṛśaṃ hariṃ dhyātvā ādarāt mantrayor ekaṃ japet /

original: kim-artham ? rāṣṭrau deśe pūr nagaraṃ grāmo 'lpa-jana-vāsa-sthānaṃ vāstu eka-gṛha-svāmi-vāsaḥ /
analyzed: kimartham rāṣṭrau deśe pūḥ nagaram grāmaḥ lpa jana vāsasthānam vāstu eka gṛha svāmi vāsaḥ

original: arjunaḥ ṛṣir yatra taṃ vyasta-sarvāṅghri-racitāṅgaś cārjuna ṛṣikaś ceti dvandvaḥ taṃ triṣṭup-chando yatra taṃ viśvarūpo viṣṇur adhidevatā yasya  #
analyzed: arjunaḥ ṛṣiḥ yatra tam vyasta sarva aṅghri racita aṅgaḥ ca arjunaḥ ṛṣikaḥ ca iti dvandvaḥ tam triṣṭubh chandaḥ yatra tam viśvarūpaḥ viṣṇuḥ adhidevatā yasya

original: ṭīkāntare ukta-prayogeṣu yatra japa-homayoḥ saṅkhyā na uktā tatra saṃnidhānoktā gṛhyate tad-abhāve 'ṣtottaraṃ sahasraṃ śataṃ vā aṣṭau sahasrāṇīty  #
analyzed: ṭīkā antare ukta prayogeṣu yatra japa homayoḥ saṅkhyā na uktā tatra saṃnidhāna uktā gṛhyate tad abhāve ṣta uttaram sahasram śatam vai aṣṭau sahasrāṇi iti

sva hasta stha ghaṭa udbhavayā
nāgnajitī sunande ca dhyeye ete kīdṛśe

original: nāgnajitī sunandā ca diśantyā kalaśau tayoḥ /
analyzed: nāgnajitī sunandā ca diśantyā kalaśau tayoḥ
tābhyām ca dakṣa vāma sthe mitravindā sulakṣmaṇe

original: tayo rukmiṇī-satyabhāmayoḥ sthāne ratna-ghaṭau diśantyau dadatyau /
analyzed: tayoḥ rukmiṇī satyabhāmayoḥ sthāne ratna ghaṭau diśantyau dadatyau
kīdṛśe dakṣa vāma sthe
tathā mitravindā su lakṣaṇe dakṣiṇa vāma sthe dhyeye

original: kimbhūte ? tābhyāṃ nāgnajitī-sunandābhyāṃ kalaśaṃ diśantībhyāṃ kalaśaṃ dadatyau // KrdC_7.10 //
analyzed: kimbhūte tābhyām nāgnajitī sunandābhyām kalaśam diśantībhyām kalaśam dadatyau
ratna nadyā samuddhṛtya ratna pūrṇau ghaṭau tayoḥ

original: jāmbavatī suśīlā ca diśantyau dakṣa-vāma-ge // Krd_7.11 //
analyzed: jāmbavatī suśīlā ca diśantyau dakṣa vāma ge
tathā dakṣa vāme jāmbavatī suśīle ca dhyeye

original: kimbhūte ? ratna-nadyā ratna-pūrṇau ghaṭau samuddhṛtya tayor sulakṣmaṇā-mitravindayor diśantyau // KrdC_7.11 //
analyzed: kimbhūte ratna nadyāḥ ratna pūrṇau ghaṭau samuddhṛtya tayoḥ sulakṣmaṇa amitravindayoḥ diśantyau
bahis ṣoḍaśa sāhasra saṅkhyātāḥ paritas striyaḥ
dhyeyāḥ sakala ratna ogha dhārā yuj kalaśa ujjvalāḥ
tad bahis ṣoḍaśa sāhasra saṅkhyātāḥ priyāḥ dhyeyāḥ

original: kimbhūtāḥ ? kanakaṃ suvarṇaṃ ratnāni padmādīni teṣām oghaḥ samūhaḥ /
analyzed: kimbhūtāḥ kanakam suvarṇam ratnāni padma ādīni teṣām oghaḥ samūhaḥ

original: tasya dhārāṃ yunaktīti tad-yuk yaḥ kalaśaḥ tena dīptāḥ // KrdC_7.12 //
analyzed: tasya dhārām yunakti iti tad yuj yaḥ kalaśaḥ tena dīptāḥ
tad bahis ca aṣṭa nidhayaḥ dhyeyāḥ kīdrśāḥ

original: tad bahiś cāṣṭa-nidhayaḥ pūrayanto dhanair dharām /
analyzed: tat bahis ca aṣṭa nidhayaḥ pūrayantaḥ dhanaiḥ dharām

original: tad-bahir vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve purovac ca surādayaḥ // Krd_7.13 //
analyzed: tad bahis vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve purovat ca sura ādayaḥ

original: dharāṃ pṛthvīṃ dhanaiḥ pūrayantaḥ tad-bahir vṛṣṇayo yādavā dhyeyāḥ /
analyzed: dharām pṛthvīm dhanaiḥ pūrayantaḥ tad bahis vṛṣṇayaḥ yādavāḥ dhyeyāḥ

original: anantaraṃ purovat dikṣu sthitāḥ surādayo devarṣi-siddha-vidyādhara-gandharva-prabhṛtayo ratnābhiṣekaṃ kurvanto dhyeyāḥ // KrdC_7.13 //
analyzed: anantaram purovat dikṣu sthitāḥ sura ādayaḥ deva ṛṣi siddha vidyādhara gandharva prabhṛtayaḥ ratna abhiṣekam kurvantaḥ dhyeyāḥ
dhyātvā evam paramātmānam manum japet
catur lakṣam hunet ājyaiḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrakam

original: evaṃ paramātma-rūpaṃ aśarīriṇaṃ dhyātvā viṃsaty-akṣaraṃ mantraṃ catur-lakṣaṃ japet /
analyzed: evam paramātma rūpam aśarīriṇam dhyātvā mantram catur lakṣam japet

original: ājyair ghṛtaiś catvāriṃśat-sahasrakam hunet juhūyāt // KrdC_7.14 //
analyzed: ājyaiḥ ghṛtaiḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrakam hunet juhūyāt
viṃśati akṣara mantram uddharati
ṣṭādaśa arṇaḥ viṃśati varṇakaḥ

original: matreṇānena sadṛśo manur nahi jagat traye // Krd_7.15 //
analyzed: matreṇa anena sadṛśaḥ manuḥ na hi jagat traye

original: śaktir bhuvaneśvarī-bījaṃ śrīḥ śrī-bījaṃ etad-bīja-dvaya-pūrvakaḥ pūrvoktāṣṭādaśākṣara-mantra eva viṃśaty-akṣaro bhavatīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: śaktiḥ bhuvaneśvarī bījam śrīḥ śrī bījam etad bīja dvaya pūrvakaḥ pūrva ukta aṣṭādaśa akṣara mantraḥ eva viṃśati akṣaraḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: anena mantreṇa sadṛśo mantra jagat-traye nāsti // KrdC_7.15 //
analyzed: anena mantreṇa sadṛśaḥ mantra jagattraye na asti
ṛṣi ādikam darśayati

original: ṛṣir brahmā ca gāyatrī-cchandaḥ kṛṣṇas tu devatā /
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ brahmā ca gāyatrī chandaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tu devatā
pūrva ukta vat eva asya bīja śakti ādi kalpanā

original: asya mantrasya bīja-śakty-ādi-kalpanā pūrvoktavat daśākṣaravat tathā ca daśākṣarasya yad bījādikaṃ tad asyāpīty arthaḥ // KrdC_7.16 //
analyzed: asya mantrasya bīja śakti ādi kalpanā pūrva ukta vat daśa akṣara vat tathā ca daśa akṣarasya yat bīja ādikam tat asya api iti arthaḥ
pūjā prakāram āha
kalpaḥ sanatkumāra uktaḥ mantrasya asya ucyate dhunā
pīṭhanyāsa ādikam kṛtvā pūrva ukta kramataḥ sudhīḥ

original: asya mantrasya sanat-kumāra-kathitaḥ pūjā-prakāraḥ samprati mayā kathyate /
analyzed: asya mantrasya sanatkumāra kathitaḥ pūjā prakāraḥ samprati mayā kathyate
pūrva ukta kramataḥ daśa akṣara ukta prakāreṇa pīṭhanyāsa prāṇāyāma ādikam kṛtvā

original: mantreṇa vyāpakaṃ kṛtvā mātṛkāṃ manu-sampuṭām // Krd_7.18 //
analyzed: mantreṇa vyāpakam kṛtvā mātṛkām manu sampuṭām
saṃhāra sṛṣṭi mārgeṇa daśa tattvāni vinyaset

original: punaś ca vyāpakaṃ kṛtvā mantra-varṇās tanau nyaset // Krd_7.19 //
analyzed: punar ca vyāpakam kṛtvā mantra varṇāḥ tanau nyaset

original: ubhaya-karāṅguliṣu ubhaya-kara-taleṣu ca ṣaḍ-aṅgāni kramān nyaset /
analyzed: ubhaya kara aṅguliṣu ubhaya kara taleṣu ca ṣaḍaṅgāni kramāt nyaset

original: mantreṇeti viṃśaty akṣara-mantreṇa vyāpakaṃ sarvatanau nyāsaṃ kṛtvā mātṛkāṃ mātṛkā-nyāsaṃ manu-sampuṭāṃ viṃśaty-akṣara-puṭita-pratyakṣarāṃ  #
analyzed: mantreṇa iti viṃśati akṣaramantreṇa vyāpakam sarva tanau nyāsam kṛtvā mātṛkām mātṛkā nyāsam manu sampuṭām viṃśati akṣara puṭita pratyakṣarām
pūrva ukta mātṛkā sthāneṣu vinyaset

original: prayogaś ca-hrīṃ aṃ hrīṃ nama ity ādiḥ /
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca hrīṃ aṃ hrīṃ namaḥ iti ādiḥ
evam bha paryantam dvis āvṛttiḥ

original: tato hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ namaḥ /
analyzed: tatas hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ namaḥ

original: klīṃ krīṃ paṃ klīṃ krīṃ nama ity ādiḥ /
analyzed: klīṃ krīṃ paṃ klīṃ krīṃ namaḥ iti ādiḥ
saṃhāra sṛṣṭi mārgeṇa daśa tattvāni mahī salila prabhṛtīni vinyaset

original: punar api viṃśaty-akṣara-mantreṇa vyāpaka-nyāsaṃ kṛtvā viṃśati-mantrākṣarāṇi tanau sva-śarīre nyaset // KrdC_7.19 //
analyzed: punar api viṃśati akṣara mantreṇa vyāpaka nyāsam kṛtvā viṃśati mantra akṣarāṇi tanau sva śarīre nyaset
akṣara nyāsa sthānāni āha

original: mūrdhni bhāle bhruvor madhye netrayoḥ karṇayor nasoḥ /
analyzed: mūrdhni bhāle bhruvoḥ madhye netrayoḥ karṇayoḥ nasoḥ

original: ānane cibuke kaṇṭhe dor-mūle hṛdi tanduke // Krd_7.20 //
analyzed: ānane cibuke kaṇṭhe dormūle hṛdi tanduke

original: nābhau liṅge tathādhāre kaṭyor jānvoś ca jaṅghayoḥ /
analyzed: nābhau liṅge tathā ādhāre kaṭyoḥ jānvoḥ ca jaṅghayoḥ

original: gulphayoḥ pādayor nyaset sṛṣṭir eṣā samīritā // Krd_7.21 //
analyzed: gulphayoḥ pādayoḥ nyaset sṛṣṭiḥ eṣā samīritā

original: mastake bhāle lalāṭe bhrū-madhye ity ādāv ekaikam akṣaraṃ nyaset /
analyzed: mastake bhāle lalāṭe bhrū madhye iti ādau ekaikam akṣaram nyaset

original: ādhāre liṅgādhas trikoṇa-sthāne eṣa sṛṣṭi-nyāsa-prakāra uktaḥ // KrdC_7.21 //
analyzed: ādhāre liṅga adhas trikoṇa sthāne eṣa sṛṣṭi nyāsa prakāraḥ uktaḥ
sthitiḥ hṛd ādikam sa antā saṃhṛtiḥ caraṇa ādikā
vidhāya evam pañca kṛtvas sthiti antam mūrti pañjaram

original: sṛṣṭi-sthitī ca vinyasya ṣaḍ-aṅga-nyāsam ācaret // Krd_7.22 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi sthitī ca vinyasya ṣaḍaṅganyāsam ācaret

original: hṛd-ādikāṃsāṃ tā sthitiḥ hṛdayam ārabhyāṃsa-paryanta-nyāsaḥ sthitiḥ saṃhṛtiś caraṇādikāpādāvārabhyamūrdhānta-nyāsaḥ vidhāyeti /
analyzed: sthitiḥ hṛd ādika aṃsām sthitiḥ hṛdayam ārabhya aṃsa paryanta nyāsaḥ sthitiḥ saṃhṛtiḥ vidhāya iti

original: evaṃ pañca-vārān sthity-antaṃ nyāsaṃ kṛtvā iti gṛhasthābhiprāyeṇa tathā pūrvokta-murti-pañjara-nyāsaṃ
analyzed: evam pañca vārān sthiti antam nyāsam kṛtvā iti gṛhastha abhiprāyeṇa tathā pūrva ukta murti pañjara nyāsam

original: kṛtvā punaḥ sṛṣṭi-sthitī vinyasya sṛṣṭi-sthiti-prakāreṇa mantra-varṇān vinyasya ṣaḍ-aṅga-nyāsam
analyzed: kṛtvā punar sṛṣṭi sthitī vinyasya sṛṣṭi sthiti prakāreṇa mantra varṇān vinyasya ṣaḍaṅganyāsam
ācaret
ṣaḍ aṅgāni darśayati
guṇa agni veda karaṇa karaṇa akṣi akṣaraiḥ manoḥ

original: mudrāṃ baddhvā kirīṭākhyāṃ dig-bandhaṃ pūrvavac caret /
analyzed: mudrām baddhvā kirīṭa ākhyām digbandham pūrvavat caret
dhyātvā japtvā arcayet dehe mūrti pañjara pūrvakam

original: manor mantrasya guṇās trayaḥ agnayas trayaḥ vedāś catvāraḥ karaṇam antaḥ-karaṇa-catuṣṭayaṃ /
analyzed: manoḥ mantrasya guṇāḥ trayaḥ agnayaḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ catvāraḥ karaṇam antaḥkaraṇa catuṣṭayam

original: punaḥ karaṇa-catuṣṭayam akṣi-dvayam etair akṣarair mantra-sambhavaiḥ ṣaḍ-aṅgāni kāryāṇīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: punar karaṇa catuṣṭayam akṣi dvayam etaiḥ akṣaraiḥ mantra sambhavaiḥ ṣaḍaṅgāni kāryāṇi iti arthaḥ

original: mudrām iti kirīṭākhyāṃ kirīṭābhidhāṃ baddhvā kṛtvā kirīṭādyām iti pāṭhe kaustubha-śrīvatsa-mudrayoḥ parigrahaḥ pūrvavad astra-mantreṇa dig-bandhanaṃ  #
analyzed: mudrām iti kirīṭa ākhyām kirīṭa abhidhām baddhvā kṛtvā kirīṭa ādyām iti pāṭhe kaustubha śrīvatsa mudrayoḥ parigrahaḥ pūrvavat astramantreṇa digbandhanam
kuryāt
ātma pūjām āha dhyātvā iti

original: pūrvoditaṃ dhyānaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭottara-śataṃ ca japtvā mūrti-pañjara-pūrvakam dehe pūjayet
analyzed: pūrva uditam dhyānam kṛtvā aṣṭottaraśatam ca japtvā mūrti pañjara pūrvakam dehe pūjayet

original: tathācābhyantare prathamaṃ parameśvarā-rādhanaṃ tad anu mūrti-pañjarasya tad anu
analyzed: tathā ca abhyantare prathamam parameśvara ārādhanam tat anu mūrti pañjarasya tat anu
sṛṣṭi sthiti nyāsam tat anu ṣaḍaṅgasya iti
bāhya pūjā prakāram āha

original: athavā hye 'rcayed viṣṇuṃ tad-arthaṃ yantram ucyate /
analyzed: athavā rcayet viṣṇum tad artham yantram ucyate
gomayena upalipya urvīm tatra pīṭham nidhāpayet
atha ātma pūjā anantaram bāhye viṣṇum pūjayet
tad pūjā artham pūjā sthānam ucyate

original: gomaya-jalena pṛthivīm upalipya tatra lipta-sthāne pīṭhaṃ pūjādhāra-priyaṃ pātraṃ sthāpayet // KrdC_7.24 //
analyzed: gomaya jalena pṛthivīm upalipya tatra lipta sthāne pīṭham pūjā ādhāra priyam pātram sthāpayet
vilipya gandhapaṅkena likhet aṣṭa dala ambujam

original: karṇikāyāṃ tu ṣaṭ-koṇaṃ sa-sādhyaṃ tatra manmatham // Krd_7.25 //
analyzed: karṇikāyām tu ṣaṣ koṇam sa sādhyam tatra manmatham

original: anantaraṃ tat-pīṭhaṃ candana-paṅkena vilipya tatrāṣṭa-dala-padmaṃ vilikhya karṇikāyāṃ padmaṃ vilikhya madhya-sthāne ṣaṭ-koṇa-puṭitaṃ vahni-pura-dvayaṃ  #
analyzed: anantaram tat pīṭham candana paṅkena vilipya tatra aṣṭadala padmam vilikhya karṇikāyām padmam vilikhya madhya sthāne ṣaṣ koṇa puṭitam vahni pura dvayam
likhet

original: tatra ṣaṭ-koṇa-madhye sa-sādhyaṃ karma-sahitaṃ sādhya-nāma-sahitaṃ manmathaṃ kāma-bījaṃ likhet /
analyzed: tatra ṣaṭkoṇa madhye sa sādhyam karma sahitam sādhya nāma sahitam manmatham kāmabījam likhet

original: sādhya-grahaṇāt dhāraṇārtham apy etad boddhavyam iti tripāṭhinaḥ // KrdC_7.25 //
analyzed: sādhya grahaṇāt dhāraṇa artham api etat boddhavyam iti tripāṭhinaḥ

original: śiṣṭais taṃ saptadaśabhir akṣarair veṣṭayet smaram /
analyzed: śiṣṭaiḥ tam saptadaśabhiḥ akṣaraiḥ veṣṭayet smaram
prāk rakṣaḥ nila koṇeṣu śriyam śiṣṭeṣu saṃvidam

original: śiṣṭaiḥ sapta saptadaśabhir akṣarais taṃ kāma-bījaṃ veṣṭayet /
analyzed: śiṣṭaiḥ sapta saptadaśabhiḥ akṣaraiḥ tam kāmabījam veṣṭayet
ṣaṭkoṇasya pūrva nairṛti vāyavya koṇeṣu śriyam śrī bīja trayam likhet

original: śiṣṭeṣu triṣu koṇeṣu paścimeśānāgni-koṇeṣu saṃvidam bhuvaneśvarī-bījaṃ vilikhet // KrdC_7.26 //
analyzed: śiṣṭeṣu triṣu koṇeṣu paścima īśāna agni koṇeṣu saṃvidam bhuvaneśvarī bījam vilikhet

original: ṣaḍ-akṣaraṃ sandhiṣu ca keśareṣu triśas triśaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ akṣaram sandhiṣu ca keśareṣu triśas triśas
vilikhet smara gāyatrīm mālāmantram dala aṣṭake
ṣaḍśas saṃlikhya tad bāhye veṣṭayet mātṛkā akṣaraiḥ

original: bhū-bimbaṃ ca likhed bāhye śrī-māye dig-vidikṣv api // Krd_7.28 //
analyzed: bhū bimbam ca likhet bāhye śrī māye diś vidikṣu api

original: sandhiṣu ṣaṭ-koṇa-sandhiṣu ṣaḍ-akṣaraṃ kāma-bīja-pūrvaka-kṛṣṇāya nama iti ṣaḍ-akṣaraṃ likhet /
analyzed: sandhiṣu ṣaṣ koṇa sandhiṣu ṣaṣ akṣaram kāma bīja pūrvaka kṛṣṇāya namaḥ iti ṣaṣ akṣaram likhet

original: keśara-sthāne kāma-gāyatrīṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ triśo 'kṣara-trayaṃ kṛtvā vilikhet /
analyzed: kesara sthāne kāmagāyatrīm vakṣyamāṇām kṣara trayam kṛtvā vilikhet

original: patrāṣṭake vakṣyamāṇāṃ mālā-mantraṃ ṣaḍśaḥ ṣaḍ-akṣarāṇi kṛtvā vilikhya padma-bāhye mātṛkākṣarair veṣṭayet /
analyzed: patra aṣṭake vakṣyamāṇām mālāmantram ṣaḍśas ṣaṣ akṣarāṇi kṛtvā vilikhya padma bāhye mātṛkā akṣaraiḥ veṣṭayet

original: mātṛkāveṣṭana-bāhya eva vakṣyamāṇa-svarūpaṃ bhū-bimbaṃ ca likhet /
analyzed: mātṛkā veṣṭana bāhye eva vakṣyamāṇa svarūpam bhū bimbam ca likhet

original: bhū-bimba-dig-vidikṣu śrī-māye dikṣu śrī-bījaṃ koṇeṣu bhuvaneśvarī-bījaṃ likhed ity arthaḥ // KrdC_7.28 //

analyzed: etat yantram hāṭaka ādi paṭṭeṣu ālikhya pūrvavat

original: sādhitaṃ dhārayed yo vai so 'rcyeta tradaśair api // Krd_7.29 //
analyzed: sādhitam dhārayet yaḥ vai saḥ rcyeta api

original: etad yantraṃ pūjāyām apy upayuktaṃ yo dhārayet sa devair api pūjyate /
analyzed: etat yantram pūjāyām api upayuktam yaḥ dhārayet sa devaiḥ api pūjyate

original: kiṃ kṛtvā ? suvarṇa-rajata-tāmrādi-paṭṭeṣu yathā-kathita-dravyeṇālikhya pūrvavad yaḥ pūjāsu /
analyzed: kim kṛtvā suvarṇa rajata tāmra ādi paṭṭeṣu yathā kathita dravyeṇa ālikhya pūrvavat yaḥ pūjāsu
yat vā pūrva mantra vat kṛta prāṇa pratiṣṭhā ādi kriyam

original: kīdṛśam ? sādhitaṃ yathā-kathita-prakāreṇa sampādita-prajaptaṃ ca // KrdC_7.29 //
analyzed: kīdṛśam sādhitam yathā kathita prakāreṇa sampādita prajaptam ca
kāma gāyatrīm uddharati
syāt gāyatrī kāma deva puṣpa bāṇau ca ṅe ntakau
vidmahedhīmahiyutau tat naḥ ṅgaḥ pracodayāt
kāma deva puṣpa bāṇa śabdau krameṇa caturthī antau
kimbhūtau

original: tad-anu tan no 'naṅgaḥ pracodayād iti svarūpam /
analyzed: tadanu tat naḥ naṅgaḥ pracodayāt iti svarūpam
evam sati kāma gāyatrī syāt bhavati

original: japyād iti gopāla-mantrāṇāṃ japādau japopakrame etāṃ kāma-gāyatrīṃ japyāt /
analyzed: japyāt iti gopāla mantrāṇām japa ādau japa upakrame etām kāma gāyatrīm japyāt

original: yata iyaṃ jana-rañjanīṃ vaśyakarīm ity arthaḥ // KrdC_7.30 //
analyzed: yatas iyam jana rañjanīm vaśya karīm iti arthaḥ
mālāmantram uddharati nati antaḥ iti ādinā
nati ante kāmadevāya ṅe ntam sarva jana priyam

original: uktvā sarva-janānte tu saṃmohana-padaṃ tathā // Krd_7.31 //
analyzed: uktvā sarva jana ante tu saṃmohana padam tathā

original: jvala jvala prajvaleti prokto sarva-janasya ca /
analyzed: jvala jvala prajvala iti sarva janasya ca

original: hṛdayaṃ ca mama brūyāt vaśaṃ kuru-yugaṃ śiraḥ /
analyzed: hṛdayam ca mama brūyāt vaśam kuru yugam śiraḥ
proktaḥ akṣaraiḥ

original: namaḥ-śabdānte kāma-devāyeti svarūpaṃ tad-anu caturthy-ante sarva-jana-priya-śabdam uccārya tad-anu sarva-jana-śabdam uktvā saṃmohana-padaṃ  #
analyzed: namaḥ śabda ante kāmadevāya iti svarūpam tadanu caturthī ante sarva jana priya śabdam uccārya tadanu sarva jana śabdam uktvā saṃmohana padam
vadet

original: tad-anu jvala jvala prajvaleti svarūpam uktvā sarva-janasya hṛdayaṃ mameti svarūpam uktvā vaśam iti svarūpam uktvā kuru kuru iti svarūpam uktvā  #
analyzed: tadanu jvala jvala prajvala iti sva rūpam uktvā sarva janasya hṛdayam mama iti sva rūpam uktvā vaśam iti sva rūpam uktvā kuru kuru iti sva rūpam uktvā
śiraḥ svāhā iti vadet

original: evaṃ ca sati aṣṭa-catvāriṃśad akṣarakair madana-mantraḥ // KrdC_7.31-32 //
analyzed: evam ca sati aṣṭacatvāriṃśat akṣarakaiḥ madana mantraḥ
viniyogam darśayati
bhūgṛham catur asram syāt koṇa vajra ādi alaṅkṛtam

original: yatra yathodbhūta eva japa-pūjā-homādau tu yadi kāma-bījādyo bhavati tadā jagat-traya-vaśīkaraṇa-kṣamaḥ yadāya mantraḥ svatantreṇa japyate  #
analyzed: yatra yathā udbhūtaḥ eva japa pūjā homa ādau tu yadi kāma bīja ādyaḥ bhavati tadā jagattraya vaśīkaraṇa kṣamaḥ yadā ayam mantraḥ svatantreṇa japyate  /
tadā iti tripāṭhinaḥ
bhūgṛham uddharati bhūgṛham iti

original: koṇa-saṃlagnāṣṭa-vajrālaṅkṛta-caturasraṃ koṇa-catuṣṭaya-sahitaṃ bhū-vilambam iti pāṭho vā // KrdC_7.33 //
analyzed: koṇa saṃlagna aṣṭa vajra alaṅkṛta catur asram koṇa catuṣṭaya sahitam bhū vilambam iti pāṭhaḥ vā
yantre pūjā prakāram āha
pīṭham pūrvavat abhyarcya mūrti saṅkalpya pauraṣīm
tatra āvāhya acyutam bhaktyā sakalīkṛtya pūjayet

original: pūrvavad daśākṣaravat gurvāpīṭha-pūjāntam abhyarcya tatra pauruṣīṃ puruṣākṛtiṃ mūrtiṃ pārameśvarīṃ vicintya tatra mūrtāv acyutam āvāhya sakalīkṛtya  #
analyzed: pūrvavat daśa akṣara vat guru āpīṭha pūjā antam abhyarcya tatra pauruṣīm puruṣa ākṛtim mūrtim pārameśvarīm vicintya tatra mūrtau acyutam āvāhya sakalīkṛtya
bhaktyā pūjayet

original: suṣumṇā pravāha-nāḍyā puṣpa-yuktam uttāna-pāṇī-hṛdaya-stha-mūrtes tejaḥ saṃyojya
analyzed: suṣumṇā pravāha nāḍyā puṣpa yuktam uttāna pāṇī hṛdaya stha mūrteḥ tejaḥ saṃyojya

original: tejo devatā brahma-randhreṇa deva-śarīra-gataṃ vicintya sva-sva-mudrayā bāhye saṃsthāpya
analyzed: tejaḥ devatā brahmarandhreṇa deva śarīra gatam vicintya sva sva mudrayā bāhye saṃsthāpya

original: sannidhāpya saṇniruddhyāvaguṇṭhya devatāṅge ṣaḍ-aṅga-nyāsaṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśopacāraiḥ
analyzed: sannidhāpya saṃniruddhya avaguṇṭhya devatā aṅge ṣaḍaṅganyāsam kṛtvā ṣoḍaśa upacāraiḥ
sampūjayet iti arthaḥ
āsana ādi bhūṣaṇa antam punar nyāsa kramāt yajet

original: sṛṣṭi-sthitī ṣaḍ-aṅgaṃ ca kirīṭaṃ kuṇḍala-dvayam // Krd_7.35 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi sthitī ṣaṣ aṅgam ca kirīṭam kuṇḍala dvayam
cakra śaṅkha gadā padma mālā śrīvatsa kaustubhān
gandha akṣata prasūnaiḥ ca mūlena abhyarcya pūrvavat

original: āsanādi vibhūṣāntaṃ yathā syād evaṃ pūjayet āsanam ārabhya bhūṣāntair upacāraiḥ pūjayed ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: āsana ādi vibhūṣā antam yathā syāt evam pūjayet āsanam ārabhya bhūṣā antaiḥ upacāraiḥ pūjayet iti arthaḥ
punar nyāsa kramāt sṛṣṭi ādīn yajet

original: prathamaṃ sṛṣṭy-ādīnāṃ nyāsaṃ vidhāya tatas tān pūjayet /
analyzed: prathamam sṛṣṭi ādīnām nyāsam vidhāya tatas tān pūjayet

original: athavā nyāsa-kramād yathā teṣāṃ nyāsaḥ kṛtas tena krameṇety arthaḥ /
analyzed: athavā nyāsa kramāt yathā teṣām nyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ tena krameṇa iti arthaḥ
gandha akṣata iti

original: akṣatā yavā gandhākṣata-puṣpaiś ca pūrvavat mūla-mantreṇa kṛṣṇaṃ pūjayitvā saptāvṛtīḥ sampūjayed ity arthaḥ // KrdC_7.36 //
analyzed: akṣatāḥ yavāḥ gandha akṣata puṣpaiḥ ca pūrvavat mūlamantreṇa kṛṣṇam pūjayitvā sapta āvṛtīḥ sampūjayet iti arthaḥ
āvaraṇāni āha
ādau vahni pura dvandva koṇeṣu aṅgāni pūjayet

original: sahṛc-chiraḥ śikhā-varma-netram astram iti kramāt // Krd_7.37 //
analyzed: sahṛd śiraḥ śikhā varma netram astram iti kramāt

original: prathamaṃ vahni-pura-yugala-sambandhi-ṣaṭ-koṇeṣu āgneya-koṇam ārabhya ṣaḍ-aṅgāni pūjayed ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prathamam vahni pura yugala sambandhi ṣaṭkoṇeṣu āgneya koṇam ārabhya ṣaḍaṅgāni pūjayet iti arthaḥ
aṅgāni āha sahṛd iti

original: saha-hṛd āvartata iti sahṛt hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ śikhā-varma-kavacaṃ netram astraṃ ceti prathamāvaraṇam // KrdC_7.37 //
analyzed: saha hṛt āvartate iti sahṛt hṛdayam śiraḥ śikhā varma kavacam netram astram ca iti prathama āvaraṇam
dvitīya āvaraṇam āha vāsudevaḥ iti
vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradymnaḥ ca aniruddhakaḥ

original: agny-ādi-dala-mūleṣu śāntiḥ śrīś ca sarasvatī // Krd_7.38 //
analyzed: agni ādi dala mūleṣu śāntiḥ śrīḥ ca sarasvatī

original: ratiś ca dig-daleṣv arcyās tato 'ṣtau mahiṣīr yajet /
analyzed: ratiḥ ca diś daleṣu arcyāḥ mahiṣīḥ yajet

original: rukmiṇy-ādyā dakṣa-savye kramāt patrāgrakeṣu ca // Krd_7.39 //
analyzed: rukmiṇī ādyāḥ dakṣa savye kramāt patra agrakeṣu ca

original: agny-ādi-koṇa-dala-mūleṣu keśara-sthāneṣu vāsudevādayaḥ pūjyās tathaiva pūrvādi-catur-dikṣu dala-mūleṣu śānty-ādayaḥ pūjyā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: agni ādi koṇa dala mūleṣu keśara sthāneṣu vāsudeva ādayaḥ pūjyāḥ tathā eva pūrva ādi catur dikṣu dala mūleṣu śānti ādayaḥ pūjyāḥ iti arthaḥ
tṛtīya āvaraṇam āha tatas ṣṭau iti

original: tad-anantaram aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ pūjyā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tad anantaram aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ pūjyāḥ iti arthaḥ
tāḥ hi rukmiṇī ādyāḥ iti
pūjā sthānam āha dakṣa savye iti

original: parameśvarasya dakṣiṇa-bhāge catasraḥ vāma-bhāge catasraḥ krameṇa pūjyā ity arthaḥ // KrdC_7.38-39 //
analyzed: parameśvarasya dakṣiṇa bhāge catasraḥ vāma bhāge catasraḥ krameṇa pūjyāḥ iti arthaḥ
caturtha āvaraṇam āha tatas iti
tatas ṣoḍaśa sāhasram sakṛt eva arcayet priyāḥ

original: padma-śaṅkhādikāṃś cāpi nidhīn aṣṭau kramād yajet /
analyzed: padma śaṅkha ādikān ca api nidhīn aṣṭau kramāt yajet

original: tad bahiś cendra-vajrād ye āvṛtī samprapūjayet // Krd_7.41 //
analyzed: tat bahis ca indra vajrāt ye āvṛtī samprapūjayet

original: pūrvādi-dalāgreṣu ṣoḍaśa-sahasraṃ priyāḥ deva-patnīḥ sakṛd eva eka-krameṇaivārcayet /
analyzed: pūrva ādi dala agreṣu ṣoḍaśa sahasram priyāḥ deva patnīḥ sakṛt eva eka krameṇa eva arcayet

original: pañcamam āvaraṇam āha-indranīlādyān aṣṭau nidhīn pūrvādi-krameṇa pūjayet /
analyzed: pañcamam āvaraṇam āha aindranīla ādyān aṣṭau nidhīn pūrva ādi krameṇa pūjayet
atra indra ādi śabda anantaram pratyekam caturthī antam nidhi padam deyam

original: prayogaś ca-oṃ indra-nidhaye namaḥ ity ādiḥ /
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca om indra nidhaye namaḥ iti ādiḥ
ṣaṣṭha saptama āvaraṇa dvayam āha tat bahis iti

original: tad-bāhye indrādikaṃ vajrādikaṃ ca pūjayet // KrdC_7.40-41 //
analyzed: tad bāhye indra ādikam vajra ādikam ca pūjayet
āvaraṇāni sandarśya naivedyam darśayati
iti sapta āvṛtti vṛtam abhyarcya acyutam ādarāt
prīṇayet dadhi khaṇḍa ājya miśreṇa tu payaḥ ndhasā

original: ity anena prakāreṇa saptāvaraṇa-veṣṭitaṃ kṛṣṇam ādara-pūrvakaṃ sampūjya dadhi-śarkarā-ghṛta-sahitena pāyasena prīṇayed ity arthaḥ // KrdC_7.42
analyzed: iti anena prakāreṇa sapta āvaraṇa veṣṭitam kṛṣṇam ādara pūrvakam sampūjya dadhi śarkarā ghṛta sahitena pāyasena prīṇayet iti arthaḥ  /

original: rājopacāraṃ dattvātha stutvā natvā ca keśavam /
analyzed: rāja upacāram dattvā atha stutvā natvā ca keśavam
udvāsayet sva hṛdaye parivāra gaṇaiḥ saha

original: chatra-cāmarādīni dattvā athānantaraṃ stavaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭāṅga-pañcāṅgānyatareṇa praṇamya parivāra-gaṇaiḥ saha keśavaṃ hṛdaye udvāsayet uttolya  #
analyzed: chatra cāmara ādīni dattvā atha anantaram stavam kṛtvā aṣṭāṅga pañcāṅgāni atareṇa praṇamya parivāra gaṇaiḥ saha keśavam hṛdaye udvāsayet uttolya
sthāpayet
nyastvā ātmānam samabhyarcya tad mayaḥ prajapet manum

original: tad veśma pūryate ratnaiḥ svarṇa-dhānyair anāratam // Krd_7.45 //
analyzed: tat veśma pūryate ratnaiḥ svarṇa dhānyaiḥ anāratam

original: nyastvā pūjā pūrvoktaṃ sṛṣṭy-ādi-nyāsaṃ kṛtvā ātma-pūjāṃ vidhāya tan-mayaḥ pūjya-deva-svarūpo bhūtvā pūjāṅga-mantraṃ japet /
analyzed: nyastvā pūjā pūrva uktam sṛṣṭi ādi nyāsam kṛtvā ātma pūjām vidhāya tad mayaḥ pūjya deva svarūpaḥ bhūtvā pūjā aṅga mantram japet
upasaṃharati ratna iti

original: dhyānaṃ ca ijyā ca pūjā ca ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: dhyānam ca ijyā ca pūjā ca iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca yasyāṃ pūjāyāṃ kṛṣṇasya ratnābhiṣeka-dhyānaṃ tatra kṛṣṇasya viṃśaty-akṣaroktā pūjeyam uktā /
analyzed: tathā ca yasyām pūjāyām kṛṣṇasya ratna abhiṣeka dhyānam tatra kṛṣṇasya viṃśati akṣara uktā pūjā iyam uktā
phalam darśayati japa iti

original: japādibhir yo amuṃ mantraṃ sevate tasya gṛhaṃ padma-rāgādibhiḥ ratnaiḥ kāñcanair dhānyaiś cānāratam anavarataṃ pūryate // KrdC_7.44-45 //
analyzed: japa ādibhiḥ yaḥ amum mantram sevate tasya gṛham padmarāga ādibhiḥ ratnaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ dhānyaiḥ ca anāratam anavaratam pūryate

original: pṛthvī pṛthvī kare tasya savasasy akulākulā /
analyzed: pṛthvī pṛthvī kare tasya sa vasasī akula akulā

original: putrair mitraiḥ susampannaḥ prayāty ante parāṃ gatim // Krd_7.46 //
analyzed: putraiḥ mitraiḥ su sampannaḥ prayāti ante parām gatim
prayogam darśayati
vahnau abhyarcya govindam śukla puṣpaiḥ sa taṇḍulaiḥ

original: ājyāktair ayutaṃ hutvā bhasma tan-mūrdhni dhārayet /
analyzed: ājya aktaiḥ ayutam hutvā bhasma tad mūrdhni dhārayet
tasya anna ādi samṛddhiḥ syāt tad vaśe sarva yoṣitaḥ

original: yathokta-prakāreṇāgnim ādhāya tatra yathokta-prakāreṇa govindaṃ sampūjya ghṛtāktais
analyzed: yathā ukta prakāreṇa agnim ādhāya tatra yathā ukta prakāreṇa govindam sampūjya ghṛta aktaiḥ

original: taṇḍula-sahitaiḥ śukla-puṣpair daśa-sahasrāṇi hutvā homāgni-bhasma yaḥ pumān mūrdhani
analyzed: taṇḍula sahitaiḥ śukla puṣpaiḥ daśa sahasrāṇi hutvā homa agni bhasma yaḥ pumān mūrdhani

original: dhārayet tasya nānā-samṛddhiḥ sampattir bhavati sarvāś ca striyas tad-āyattā bhavanti // KrdC_7.47 //
analyzed: dhārayet tasya nānā samṛddhiḥ sampattiḥ bhavati sarvāḥ ca striyaḥ tad āyattāḥ bhavanti
prayoga antaram āha

original: ājyair lakṣaṃ huned rakta-padmair vā madhurāplutaiḥ /
analyzed: ājyaiḥ lakṣam hunet raktapadmaiḥ vā madhura āplutaiḥ

original: śriyā tasyaindram aiśvaryaṃ tṛṇaleśāyate dhruvam // Krd_7.48 //
analyzed: śriyā tasya aindram aiśvaryam tṛṇaleśāyate dhruvam

original: ghṛtaiḥ kevalaiḥ ghṛta-madhu-śarkarāyutaiḥ rakta-padmair vā yo lakṣaṃ juhoti tasya
analyzed: ghṛtaiḥ kevalaiḥ ghṛta madhu śarkarā yutaiḥ rakta padmaiḥ vā yaḥ lakṣam juhoti tasya

original: sādhakasya śriyā lakṣmyā kṛtvā indra-sambandhi aiśvaryaṃ tṛṇa-samānaṃ bhavati dhruvam
analyzed: sādhakasya śriyā lakṣmyā kṛtvā indra sambandhi aiśvaryam tṛṇa samānam bhavati dhruvam

original: śuklādi-vastra-prāpty-arthaṃ ghṛta-madhu-śarkarā-sahitaiḥ śukla-puṣpaiḥ ghṛāktair vā aṣṭadhika-daśa-śataṃ juhuyāt // KrdC_7.49 //
analyzed: śukla ādi vastra prāpti artham ghṛta madhu śarkarā sahitaiḥ śukla puṣpaiḥ ghṛta aktaiḥ vā aṣṭa adhika daśa śatam juhuyāt
prayoga antaram āha
kṣaudra siktaiḥ sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ aṣṭottarasahasrakam

original: hunen nityaṃ sa ṣaḍ-māsān purodhā nṛpater bhavet // Krd_7.50 //
analyzed: hunet nityam sa ṣaṣ māsān purodhāḥ nṛpateḥ bhavet

original: madhu-miśritaiḥ śukla-puṣpair aṣṭādhika-sahasraṃ pratyahaṃ yo juhuyāt sa ṣaṭke atīte rājñaḥ purohito bhavati // KrdC_7.50 //
analyzed: madhu miśritaiḥ śukla puṣpaiḥ aṣṭa adhika sahasram pratyaham yaḥ juhuyāt sa ṣaṭke atīte rājñaḥ purohitaḥ bhavati
daśa aṣṭādaśa varṇa uktam japa dhyāna huta ādikam

original: vidadhyāt karma cānena tābhyām apy atra kīrtitam // Krd_7.51 //
analyzed: vidadhyāt karma ca anena tābhyām api atra kīrtitam

original: daśāṣṭādaśākṣarayor uktaṃ japa-dhyāna-homādikam anena mantreṇa kuryāt /
analyzed: daśa aṣṭādaśa akṣarayoḥ uktam japa dhyāna homa ādikam anena mantreṇa kuryāt

original: atra mantre kathitaṃ prayogādikaṃ tābhyāṃ ca kuryāt // KrdC_7.51 //
analyzed: atra mantre kathitam prayoga ādikam tābhyām ca kuryāt
mantra antaram āha
śrī śakti smara kṛṣṇāya govindāya śiraḥ manuḥ
ravi arṇaḥ brahma gāyatrī kṛṣṇa ṛṣi ādiḥ atha asya tu

original: śrī-bījaṃ śakti-bījaṃ smaraḥ kāma-bījaṃ kṛṣṇāya govindāyeti svarūpaṃ śiraḥ svāheti
analyzed: śrī bījam śakti bījam smaraḥ kāma bījam kṛṣṇāya govindāya iti svarūpam śiraḥ svāhā iti

original: svarūpaṃ ravyārṇo mantraḥ ṛṣir ādau yeṣāṃ te ṛṣy-ādayo brahma-gāyatrī-kṛṣṇā ṛṣy-ādaya ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: svarūpam ravya arṇaḥ mantraḥ ṛṣiḥ ādau yeṣām te ṛṣi ādayaḥ brahma gāyatrī kṛṣṇāḥ ṛṣi ādayaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: asya brahmā ṛṣiḥ gāyatrī-cchandaḥ kṛṣṇo devatā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: asya brahmā ṛṣiḥ gāyatrī chandaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ devatā iti arthaḥ
bīja śakti ādi pūrvavat
bījaiḥ tri veda yugma arṇaiḥ aṅga ṣaṭkam iha uditam
viṃśati arṇa udita japa dhyāna homa arcana kriyāḥ
mantraḥ yam sakala aiśvarya kāṅkṣibhiḥ sevyatā ambudhaiḥ

original: iha mantre aṅga-ṣaṭkaṃ ṣaḍ-aṅgaṃ kathitaṃ kais tribhir bījair aṅga-trayaṃ tathā triveda-yugmārṇaiḥ tribhiś caturbhir dvābhyāṃ cāparāṅga-trayam  #
analyzed: iha mantre aṅga ṣaṭkam ṣaṣ aṅgam kathitam kaiḥ tribhiḥ bījaiḥ aṅga trayam tathā tri veda yugma arṇaiḥ tribhiḥ caturbhiḥ dvābhyām ca apara aṅga trayam
iti
viṃśa iti

original: ayaṃ mantraḥ viṃśaty-akṣara-mantrokta-japa-dhyāna-homa-pūjā-sahitaḥ sakalaiśvarya-kāmaiḥ paṇḍitair upāsyatām // KrdC_7.53 //
analyzed: ayam mantraḥ viṃśati akṣara mantra ukta japa dhyāna homa pūjā sahitaḥ sakala aiśvarya kāmaiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ upāsyatām

original: ete pūrve yasya daśākṣarasya tathāṅga-janma kāma-bījaṃ śaktir bhuvaneśvarī-bījaṃ ramā-śrī-bījam-ete ante yasya daśākṣarasya /

original: evaṃ bhūtādy-anta-viśiṣṭo daśākṣaro ṣoḍaśākṣara-mantor bhavati tathā sa eva daśākṣaro
analyzed: evam bhūta ādi anta viśiṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśa akṣara mantoḥ bhavati tathā saḥ eva daśa akṣaraḥ

original: mantraḥ ādau śakti-ramā-yutaḥ bhuvaneśvarī-śrī-bīja-sahitaś cet tadā dvādaśākṣara-mantro bhavati /
analyzed: mantraḥ ādau śakti ramā yutaḥ bhuvaneśvarī śrī bīja sahitaḥ ced tadā dvādaśa akṣara mantraḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ ca sati imau vikṛtir avyārṇau ṣoḍaśākṣara-dvādaśākṣarau mantrau ācakrādy-aṅginau daśākṣaroktāni ācakrādy-aṅgāni yayos tādṛśau jñeyau //
analyzed: evam ca sati imau vikṛtiḥ avya arṇau ṣoḍaśa akṣara dvādaśa akṣarau mantrau ā cakra ādi aṅginau daśa akṣara uktāni ā cakra ādi aṅgāni yayoḥ tādṛśau jñeyau

varada abhaya hastābhyām śliṣyantam sva aṅka ge priye

viṃśati akṣara kathita pūjā prakārau etau atha anantaram acyutam cintayet
kīdṛśam sva aṅka ge sva kroḍa sthite priye lakṣmī sarasvatyau
yat vā rukmiṇī satyabhāme śliṣyantam āliṅgantam
kābhyām vara da abhaya hastābhyām varam dadāti iti vara daḥ

original: na vidyate bhayaṃ yasmāt sa varadābhayau ca tau hastau ceti varadābhaya-hastau tābhyām ity arthaḥ /

original: daśa-lakṣa-saṅkhyaṃ japed ājyair ghṛtais tāvat-sahasra-homato daśa-sahasra-homataḥ siddhau imau mantrau manuṣyāṇāṃ sarvaiśvarya-sarva-jana-priya-pradau  #
analyzed: daśa lakṣa saṅkhyam japet ājyaiḥ ghṛtaiḥ tāvat sahasra homataḥ daśa sahasra homataḥ siddhau imau mantrau manuṣyāṇām sarva aiśvarya sarva jana priya pradau  /

original: asthi śa-kāraḥ agnī rephaḥ māyā dīrgha-ī-kāraḥ tathā ca śrī-bījam asyānte daśārṇakaḥ daśākṣara-mantraḥ etenāyaṃ mantraḥ aṣṭāviṃśaty-akṣaro
analyzed: asthi śakāraḥ agniḥ rephaḥ māyā dīrgha īkāraḥ tathā ca śrī bījam asya ante daśa arṇakaḥ daśa akṣara mantraḥ etena ayam mantraḥ aṣṭāviṃśati akṣaraḥ

original: nanda-putra-padaṃ caturthy-antaṃ śyāmalāṅgaṃ padam api caturthy-antaṃ bāla-vapuḥ kṛṣṇa-govinda-śabdāś ca pratyekaṃ caturthy-antāḥ /

original: nīlābhaṃ śyāmaṃ tathā pīta-vastraṃ tathā hasta-padme śobhamānau śaṅkha-vetrau yasya /

original: taṃ tathā sa-praśravābhiḥ kṣīra-stanābhiḥ gobhir vṛtaṃ veṣṭitam /

original: tathā amara-pater indrasya prauḍho baliṣṭho yo hastas tad-avasthito yaḥ kumbhaḥ ghaṭas
analyzed: tathā amarapateḥ indrasya prauḍhaḥ baliṣṭhaḥ yaḥ hastaḥ tad avasthitaḥ yaḥ kumbhaḥ ghaṭaḥ

original: tathā ātma-gehe suvarṇādi-ghaṭita- pratimādiṣu pratiṣṭhitaṃ viṣṇuṃ pūjayed iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ātma gehe pratimā ādiṣu pratiṣṭhitam viṣṇum pūjayet iti pūrveṇa anvayaḥ

original: tathā vakṣyamāṇāś ca viṣṇu-pārṣadāḥ pūrvādi-caturdvārāgra-bhāge bali-dāna-pīṭhe dviśaḥ pūjyā atra tripāṭhinaḥ /
analyzed: tathā vakṣyamāṇāḥ ca viṣṇu pārṣadāḥ pūrva ādi catur dvāra agra bhāge bali dāna pīṭhe dviśas pūjyāḥ atra tri pāṭhinaḥ

original: anena mantra-dvayena pūrvādi-caturdvārāgra-bhāge bali-dāna-pīṭhe pūjayed ity arthaḥ /

original: catur-asra-catur-dvārordhva-bhāge dvāra-śriyaṃ pūjayitvā caṇḍādīn dvau dvau kṛtvā pūjayet /

original: tad anu maṇḍape praviśyāgneyādi-koṇeṣu punar vāstu-puruṣaṃ saṃyataḥ san pūjayet // KrdC_7.103-107 //

analyzed: indra ādyāḥ sva sva dikṣu pūjyāḥ tad astrāṇi vajra ādīni ādi śabda grāhyāṇi tathā kumuda ādyāḥ

original: sa sarva-sampat-sampūrṇo nityaṃ śuddhaṃ padaṃ vrajet // Krd_7.127 //

yaḥ pumān ukta vidhinā harim arcayet

original: ka-kāro vasu-svaraḥ aṣṭama-svaraḥ ṛ-kāras tena sahita iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ /

original: munisvaraḥ sapta-svaras tena sahita iti rudra-dharaḥ /

original: kṛṣṇeti dvy-akṣaraḥ kāma-pūrvas try-arṇaḥ sa eva tu /

original: sa eva catur-arṇaḥ syāt ṅe 'nto 'nyaś catur-akṣaraḥ // Krd_7.131 //
analyzed: saḥ eva catur arṇaḥ syāt ṅeḥ ntaḥ nyaḥ catur akṣaraḥ

original: vakṣyate pañca-varṇaḥ syāt kṛṣṇāya nama ity api /
analyzed: vakṣyate pañca varṇaḥ syāt kṛṣṇāya namaḥ iti api
kṛṣṇāya iti smara dvandva madhye paraḥ
kṛṣṇā iti svarūpam dvi akṣaraḥ mantraḥ

original: sa eva dvy-akṣaraḥ kāma-bīja-pūrvaś cet tadā try-akṣaro mantro bhavati-sa eva try-akṣaraḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva dvi akṣaraḥ kāmabīja pūrvaḥ ced tadā tri akṣaraḥ mantraḥ bhavati saḥ eva tri akṣaraḥ

original: caturthī-vibhakty-antaś cet tadā catur-akṣaro mantraḥ anyaḥ kṛṣṇāyeti svarūpaṃ smara-dvandva-kāma-bīja-dvayasya
analyzed: caturthī vibhakti antaḥ ced tadā catur akṣaraḥ mantraḥ anyaḥ kṛṣṇāya iti svarūpam smara dvandva kāma bīja dvayasya

original: madhye yadā bhavati tadā aparaḥ pañcākṣaro mantro bhavati // KrdC_7.131-132 //
analyzed: madhye yadā bhavati tadā aparaḥ pañca akṣaraḥ mantraḥ bhavati

ṣaṣ akṣaraḥ prāk uditaḥ kṛṣṇa govindakau punar
caturthī antau sapta varṇaḥ sapta varṇaḥ nyaḥ puras d itaḥ

original: gopālāyeti svarūpaṃ vahnijāyā svāheti pada-dvayena ṣaḍ-akṣaraḥ kathitaḥ /

original: kāma-bīja-sahita-kṛṣṇāyeti svāheti pada-dvayena ca ṣaḍ-akṣaro mantra uddhṛtas tayāparaḥ ṣaḍ-akṣaraḥ prāg eva kathitaḥ sa ca klīṃ kṛṣṇāya namaḥ  #
analyzed: kāma bīja sahita kṛṣṇāya iti svāhā iti pada dvayena ca ṣaṣ akṣaraḥ mantraḥ uddhṛtaḥ tayā aparaḥ ṣaṣ akṣaraḥ prāk eva kathitaḥ sa ca klīṃ kṛṣṇāya namaḥ
iti

original: kṛṣṇa-govindakau śabdau yadi caturthy-antau bhavatas tadā saptākṣaro mantro 'paraḥ saptākṣaraḥ prāg uditaḥ sa ca go-vallabhāya svāheti // KrdC_7.133-4
analyzed: kṛṣṇa govindakau śabdau yadi caturthī antau bhavataḥ tadā sapta akṣaraḥ paraḥ sapta akṣaraḥ prāk uditaḥ sa ca govallabhāya svāhā iti
śrī śakti māraḥ kṛṣṇāya māraḥ paraḥ

original: śrī-śakti-mārāḥ śrī-bhuvaneśvarī-māra-bījāni kṛṣṇāyeti mārānto 'paraḥ saptākṣaro mantraḥ kṛṣṇa-govinda-śabdau ṅe 'ntau caturthy-antau /
analyzed: śrī śakti mārāḥ śrī bhuvaneśvarī māra bījāni kṛṣṇāya iti māra antaḥ paraḥ sapta akṣaraḥ mantraḥ kṛṣṇa govinda śabdau ṅe ntau caturthī antau

original: kīdṛśau ? kāma-bījāḍhyau iti vasu-varṇaḥ aṣṭākṣaro mantraḥ // KrdC_7.135 //
analyzed: kīdṛśau kāma bīja āḍhyau iti vasu varṇaḥ aṣṭa akṣaraḥ mantraḥ
dadhi bhakṣaṇa ṅe vahni jāyābhiḥ a paraḥ ṣtakaḥ

original: suprasannātmane proktvā mama ity aparo 'ṣtakaḥ // Krd_7.136 //

original: caturthy-anto dadhi-bhakṣaṇa-śabdaḥ vahnijāyā svāhā etair varṇair aparo 'ṣtākṣaro mantraḥ suprasannātmane svarūpam uktvā nama iti vadet ity  #
analyzed: caturthī antaḥ dadhi bhakṣaṇa śabdaḥ vahnijāyā svāhā etaiḥ varṇaiḥ aparaḥ sta akṣaraḥ mantraḥ su prasanna ātmane sva rūpam uktvā namaḥ iti vadet iti
aparaḥ ṣta akṣaraḥ mantraḥ

original: prāk prokto mūla-mantraś ca navārṇaḥ smara-saṃyutaḥ /
analyzed: prāk proktaḥ mūlamantraḥ ca nava arṇaḥ smara saṃyutaḥ

original: prāg-uktaś cāṣṭākṣaro mūla-mantraḥ smara-saṃyutaḥ kāma-bīja-yuktaḥ san navākṣaro bhavati /

original: sa ca klīṃ gokula-nāthāya nama iti /
analyzed: sa ca klīṃ gokula nāthāya namaḥ iti

original: yady etāv eva namo 'ntakau namaḥ śabdāntau bhavatas tadā paro navākṣaro mantraḥ // KrdC_7.137 //
analyzed: yadi etau eva namaḥ ntakau namaḥ śabda antau bhavataḥ tadā paraḥ nava akṣaraḥ mantraḥ

original: klīṃ glauṃ klīṃ śyāmalāṅgāya namas tu syād daśārṇakaḥ /

original: śiro 'nto bāla-vapuṣe klīṃ kṛṣṇāya smṛto budhaiḥ // Krd_7.138 //

original: uktaṃ chandas tu gāyatrī devatā kṛṣṇa īḍitaḥ /
analyzed: uktam chandaḥ tu gāyatrī devatā kṛṣṇaḥ īḍitaḥ

original: ka-lā-ṣaḍga-dīrghakair aṅgam athāmuṃ cintayed dharim // Krd_7.139 //
analyzed: kalā ṣaḍga dīrghakaiḥ aṅgam atha amum cintayet harim

original: klīṃ glauṃ klīṃ śyāmalāṅgāya nama iti daśa-varṇako mantraḥ śiro 'ntaḥ svāhāntaḥ bāla-vapuṣe iti padaṃ klīṃ kṛṣṇāyeti ekādaśākṣaro mantraḥ budhaiḥ  #
analyzed: klīṃ glauṃ klīṃ śyāmala aṅgāya namaḥ iti daśa varṇakaḥ mantraḥ śiraḥ ntaḥ svāhā antaḥ bāla vapuṣe iti padam klīṃ kṛṣṇāya iti ekādaśa akṣaraḥ mantraḥ budhaiḥ
smṛtaḥ

original: uktānām ṛṣy-ādikam āha-eteṣām ekākṣaram ārabhyaikādaśākṣara-paryantānāṃ dvāviṃśati mantrāṇām ṛṣir nāradaḥ gāyatrī-chandaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇo devatā
analyzed: uktānām ṛṣi ādikam āha eteṣām eka akṣaram ārabhya ekādaśa akṣara paryantānām dvāviṃśati mantrāṇām ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ gāyatrī chandaḥ śrī kṛṣṇaḥ devatā
aṅgāni āha kalā iti

original: ka-kāra-la-kārābhyāṃ ṣaḍ-dīrghakair napuṃsaka-rahita-ṣaḍ-dīrgha-svaraiḥ klāṃ klīṃ klūṃ klauṃ kalaḥ ebhir ity arthaḥ // KrdC_7.139 //
analyzed: kakāra lakārābhyām ṣaṣ dīrghakaiḥ napuṃsaka rahita ṣaṣ dīrgha svaraiḥ klām klīṃ klūm klaum kalaḥ ebhiḥ iti arthaḥ
dhyānam āha
avyāt vyāka upanīla ambuja ruciḥ aruṇa ambhoja netra ambuja sthaḥ

original: dorbhyāṃ haiyaṅgavīṇaṃ dadhad ativimalaṃ pāyasaṃ viśva-vandyo
analyzed: dorbhyām haiyaṅgavīṇam dadhat ati vimalam pāyasam viśva vandyaḥ
go gopī gopa vītaḥ ruru nakha vilasat kaṇṭha bhūṣaḥ ciram vaḥ
avyāt vyāka upanīla ambuja ruciḥ aruṇa ambhoja netra ambuja sthaḥ bālaḥ jaṅghā kaṭīra sthala kalita raṇat kiṅkiṇīkaḥ

original: mukundaḥ dorbhyāṃ haiyaṅgavīṇaṃ dadhad ativimalaṃ pāyasaṃ viśva-vandyo go-gopī-gopa-vīto
analyzed: mukundaḥ dorbhyām haiyaṅgavīṇam dadhat ati vimalam pāyasam viśva vandyaḥ go gopī gopavītaḥ
ruru nakha vilasat kaṇṭha bhūṣaḥ ciram vaḥ
eteṣām puraścaraṇam āha

original: dhyātvaivam ekam eteṣāṃ lakṣaṃ japyān manuṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: dhyātvā evam ekam eteṣām lakṣam japyāt manum tatas

original: yathoktaṃ dhyānaṃ kṛtvā eteṣāṃ madhye ekaṃ mantraṃ lakṣaṃ japet /
analyzed: yathā uktam dhyānam kṛtvā eteṣām madhye ekam mantram lakṣam japet

original: tad anu ghṛta-khaṇḍa-sāra-yuktaiḥ paramānnair daśa-sahasraṃ juhuyāt // KrdC_7.141 //
analyzed: tat anu ghṛta khaṇḍa sāra yuktaiḥ paramānnaiḥ daśa sahasram juhuyāt

original: tarpaṇaṃ vihitaṃ nityaṃ yo 'rcayet susamāhitaḥ // Krd_7.142 //
analyzed: tarpaṇam vihitam nityam yaḥ rcayet su samāhitaḥ

original: arcayet purato netram astraṃ dikṣu vahniḥ punaḥ // Krd_7.143 //
analyzed: arcayet puratas netram astram dikṣu vahniḥ punar
indra vajra ādayaḥ pūjyāḥ saparyā eṣā samīritā

original: ity ekam eṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ bhajed yo manu-vittamaḥ // Krd_7.144 //
analyzed: iti ekam eṣām mantrāṇām bhajet yaḥ manu vittamaḥ
kara praceyāḥ sarva arthāt tasya asau pūjyate maraiḥ

original: sadyaḥ phala-pradaṃ mantraṃ vakṣye 'nyaṃ catur-akṣaram // Krd_7.145 //
analyzed: sadyas phala pradam mantram vakṣye nyaṃ catur akṣaram
sa proktaḥ māra yugma antara stha kṛṣṇa padena tu

original: ṛṣy-ādyam aṅga-ṣaṭkaṃ ca prāg-uktaṃ proktam asya tu // Krd_7.146 //
analyzed: ṛṣi ādyam aṅga ṣaṭkam ca prāc uktam proktam asya tu
tat anu tāvat daśa sahasram tarpayet

original: evaṃ prakāreṇaikasmin mantre siddhe jāte tad anyeṣāṃ sakṛt puraścaraṇānām ekaviṃśati mantrāṇāṃ japa-homa-saṅkhyayā vinaiva hutāyutena tarpaṇam  #
analyzed: evam prakāreṇa ekasmin mantre siddhe jāte tat anyeṣām sakṛt puraścaraṇānām ekaviṃśati mantrāṇām japa homa saṅkhyayā vinā eva huta ayutena tarpaṇam  /
eva puraścaraṇam vihitam karaṇīyam

original: eteṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ homa-saṅkhyayā ayutenaiva tarpaṇaṃ vihitam /
analyzed: eteṣām mantrāṇām homa saṅkhyayā ayutena eva tarpaṇam vihitam
pūjām āha nityam iti

original: nityaṃ sarvadā susamāhitaḥ saṃyataḥ san pūjayet /
analyzed: nityam sarvadā su samāhitaḥ saṃyataḥ san pūjayet

original: vahny-ādī-śāntam āgneya-koṇam ārabhya īśāna-koṇa-paryanta-hṛd-ādi-kavaca-paryantam aṅga-catuṣṭayaṃ pūjayet purato 'gre netram astraṃ pūjayet
analyzed: vahni ādi īśa antam āgneya koṇam ārabhya īśāna koṇa paryanta hṛd ādi kavaca paryantam aṅga catuṣṭayam pūjayet puratas gre netram astram pūjayet
pūrva ādi catur dikṣu indra ādīn pūjayet
tat anu vajra ādīn iti upasaṃharati
eṣām mantrāṇām saparyā pūjā kathitā
phalam āha eti ekam iti

original: amunā prakāreṇa yaḥ sādhakottama eṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ madhye ekaṃ mantraṃ bhajet upāsīta tasya sarve puruṣārthā hasta-prāpyāḥ devaiś cāsau pūjyate
analyzed: amunā prakāreṇa yaḥ sādhaka uttamaḥ eṣām mantrāṇām madhye ekam mantram bhajet upāsīta tasya sarve puruṣa arthāḥ hasta prāpyāḥ devaiḥ ca asau pūjyate
mantra antaram āha sadyas iti

original: tātkālika-phala-dāyakam aparaṃ caturakṣara-mantraṃ vakṣye sa-catur-akṣaraḥ kāma-bīja-dvaya-madhyasthena kṛṣṇa-padena kathitaḥ /
analyzed: tātkālika phala dāyakam aparam catur akṣara mantram vakṣye sa catur akṣaraḥ kāmabīja dvaya madhya sthena kṛṣṇa padena kathitaḥ

original: ṛṣy-ādikam asya ṛṣiś chando daivatam aṅga-ṣaṭkaṃ ca prāg uktaṃ pūrva-mantra-samuhe kathitaṃ boddhavyam // KrdC_7.142-146 //
analyzed: ṛṣi ādikam asya ṛṣiḥ chandaḥ daivatam aṅga ṣaṭkam ca prāk uktam pūrva mantra samuhe kathitam boddhavyam
dhyānam āha

original: hemābhaḥ sva-prabhābhis tri-bhuvanam akhilaṃ bhāsayan vāsudevaḥ

original: kīdṛśaḥ ? yaḥ śrī-yukta-kalpa-vṛkṣa-mūlodgata-padme śobhamānā yā karṇikā tatropaviṣṭaḥ /

original: acirāt śīghraṃ vāñchitāṃ kanyāṃ pariṇetuṃ mantravit sādhakaḥ gopa-yuvatī-hasta-padmāni
analyzed: acirāt śīghram vāñchitām kanyām pariṇetum mantra vid sādhakaḥ gopa yuvatī hasta padmāni

original: saṃgṛhya dhṛtvā nṛtyantaṃ taṃ prasiddhaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ dhyātvā lakṣa-mātra-parimitam
analyzed: saṃgṛhya dhṛtvā nṛtyantam tam prasiddham śrī kṛṣṇam dhyātvā lakṣa mātra parimitam

original: athavā lājānāṃ cūrṇair madhu-drutatarair ghṛta-madhu-śarkarā-pracurānvitaiḥ madhunā dravībhūtair iti rudradharaḥ /
analyzed: athavā lājānām cūrṇaiḥ madhu drutataraiḥ ghṛta madhu śarkarā pracura anvitaiḥ madhunā dravībhūtaiḥ iti rudradharaḥ

original: daśa-sahasraṃ hutvā tāvad eva saṃkhyaṃ japed ity arthaḥ // KrdC_8.10 //
analyzed: daśa sahasram hutvā tāvat eva saṃkhyam japet iti arthaḥ

aṣṭādaśa akṣareṇa dvija taru jaiḥ trimadhu aktaiḥ ayutam

analyzed: atha japa anantaram arka sahasram idhmaiḥ samidbhiḥ kṣīra drutyaiḥ aśvattha udumbara plakṣa nyagrodha anyatama samudbhavaiḥ

original: aklīb-adīrghaiḥ sa-lavais tad api ca kalāsanārūḍhaiḥ /
analyzed: aklība dīrghaiḥ sa lavaiḥ tat api ca kalā āsana ārūḍhaiḥ

original: uktaṃ pūrvavad āsana-vinyāsāntaṃ samācared atha tu // Krd_8.26 //
analyzed: uktam pūrvavat āsana vinyāsa antam samācaret atha tu

original: ṛ-ṝ---varjita-ṣaṭ-dīrgha-svaraiḥ bindu-sahitaiḥ kalety akṣara-dvaya-sambaddhaiḥ klāṃ klīṃ klūṃ klaiṃ klauṃ klaḥ ebhis tat ṣaḍ-aṅgam uktam /
analyzed: ṛ ṝ varjita ṣaṣ dīrgha svaraiḥ bindu sahitaiḥ kalā iti akṣara dvaya sambaddhaiḥ klāṃ klīṃ klūm klaiṃ klauṃ klaḥ ebhiḥ tat ṣaḍaṅgam uktam
atha anantaram pūrvavat daśa akṣara kathita pūjā paryantam kāryam

original: karayoḥ śākhāsu tale nyasya ṣaḍ-aṅgāni cāṅgulīṣu śarān /
analyzed: karayoḥ śākhāsu tale nyasya ṣaḍaṅgāni ca aṅgulīṣu śarān

original: manu-puṭita-mātṛkārṇair nyasyāṅge 'ṅgāni vinyasec ca śarān // Krd_8.27 //
analyzed: manu puṭita mātṛkā arṇaiḥ nyasya aṅge ṅgāni vinyaset ca śarān

original: karayoḥ śākhāsu aṅgulīṣu ubhaya-kara-tale ca ṣaḍ-aṅgāni vinyasya punar aṅgulīṣu ca
analyzed: karayoḥ śākhāsu aṅgulīṣu ubhaya kara tale ca ṣaḍaṅgāni vinyasya punar aṅgulīṣu ca

original: kāma-bāṇān vinyasya ādy-anta-sthita-mantra-mātṛkākṣair mātṛkā-sthāneṣu vinyasya dīrgha-yukta-kāma-bījaiḥ
analyzed: kāma bāṇān vinyasya ādi anta sthita mantra mātṛkā akṣaiḥ mātṛkā sthāneṣu vinyasya dīrgha yukta kāmabījaiḥ

original: ṣaḍ-aṅgāni sva-śarīre vinyasya bāṇa-nyāsaṃ ca kuryāt // KrdC_8.27 //
analyzed: ṣaḍaṅgāni sva śarīre vinyasya bāṇa nyāsam ca kuryāt
bāṇa nyāsa sthānāni āha

śoṣaṇa mohana sandīpana tāpana mādanān kramaśas

original: śiro-vadana-hṛdaya-liṅga-pādeṣu aṅgulībhiḥ aṅguṣṭhādika-niṣṭha-kāntābhiḥ ekaikayā aṅgulyā caturthī namaḥ-pada-sahitān vakṣyamāṇān pañca-bāṇān  #
analyzed: śiraḥ vadana hṛdaya liṅga pādeṣu aṅgulībhiḥ aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhaka antābhiḥ ekaikayā aṅgulyā caturthī namaḥ pada sahitān vakṣyamāṇān pañcabāṇān
krameṇa vinyaset
bāṇa nāmāni āha

original: pañcaite samproktā hrāṃ-hrīṃ-klīṃ-klūṃ sa ādikā bāṇāḥ /
analyzed: pañca ete samproktāḥ hrāṃ hrīṃ klīṃ klūṃ saḥ ādikāḥ bāṇāḥ

original: saṃmohanam atha jagataṃ dhyāyet puruṣottamaṃ samāhita-dhīḥ // Krd_8.29 //
analyzed: saṃmohanam atha jagatam dhyāyet puruṣottamam samāhita dhīḥ

original: hrāṃ-hrīṃ-klīṃ-klūṃ sa etāni pañca-bījāni ekaikāni ādau yeṣāṃ evaṃ ete pañca-bāṇāḥ śoṣaṇādayaḥ proktāḥ /
analyzed: hrāṃ hrīṃ klīṃ klūṃ saḥ etāni pañca bījāni ekaikāni ādau yeṣām evam ete pañca bāṇāḥ śoṣaṇa ādayaḥ proktāḥ

original: prayogas tu-hrāṃ śoṣaṇāya namaḥ ity aṅguṣṭhena śirasi hrīṃ mohanāya namaḥ iti tarjanyā mukhe ity ādi athānantaram /
analyzed: prayogaḥ tuhrām śoṣaṇāya namaḥ iti aṅguṣṭhena śirasi hrīm mohanāya namaḥ iti tarjanyā mukhe iti ādi atha anantaram
saṃyata cittaḥ tribhuvana vaśya karam puruṣottamam cintayet
dhyānam āha
divya taru udyāna udyat rucira mahā kalpapādapa adhastāt
viśva prāṇasya udyat pradyotana sama dyuteḥ suparṇasya
āsīnam unnata aṃse vidruma bhadra aṅgam aṅgaja unmathitam
cakra dara aṅkuśa pāśān sumanaḥ bāṇa ikṣu cāpa kamala gadāḥ
dadhatam sva dorbhiḥ aruṇāyata vipula vighūrṇita akṣi yuga nalinam
maṇi maya kirīṭa kuṇḍala hāra aṅgada kaṅkaṇa ūrbhiḥ asana ādyaiḥ
aruṇaiḥ mālya vilepaiḥ ādīptam pīta vastra paridhānam
nija vāma ūru niṣaṇṇām śliṣyantīm vāma hasta ghṛta nalinām
kildyat yonim kamalām madana mada vyākula ujjvala aṅga latām
su rucira bhūṣaṇa mālya anulepana aṃsu sita vasana parivītām
nija mukha kamala vyāpṛta caṭula asita nayana madhukarām taruṇīm
śliṣyantam vāma bhujā daṇḍena dṛḍham dhṛta ikṣu cāpena

ātma abheda tayā ittham dhyātvā ekākṣaram atha aṣṭa varṇam vā

original: prajaped dina-kara-lakṣaṃ trimadhura-siktais tu kiṃśuka-prasavaiḥ // Krd_8.38 //
analyzed: prajapet dinakara lakṣam trimadhura siktaiḥ tu kiṃśuka prasavaiḥ
nava ślokānām kulakam

original: ittham evaṃ vāsudevaṃ dhyātvā ekākṣara-kāma-bījam athavāṣṭākṣara-mantraṃ dinakara-lakṣaṃ dvādaśa-lakṣaṃ japet /
analyzed: ittham evam vāsudevam dhyātvā eka akṣara kāmabījam athavā aṣṭa akṣara mantram dinakara lakṣam dvādaśa lakṣam japet

original: kīdṛśam ? dhyātvā deva-sambandhi-vṛkṣodyāne kalpa-vṛkṣodyāne udyan vṛddhiṃ gacchan manoharo yaḥ pārijāta-vṛkṣas tasya tale garuḍasyonnatāṃse  #
analyzed: kīdṛśam dhyātvā deva sambandhi vṛkṣa udyāne kalpavṛkṣa udyāne udyan vṛddhim gacchan manoharaḥ yaḥ pārijāta vṛkṣaḥ tasya tale garuḍasya unnata aṃse  /
upaviṣṭam
kīdṛśasya garuḍasya
padmarāga ādi ghaṭita bhū bhāga śobhamāna śreṣṭha padma pīṭha upaviṣṭasya tathā sakala jīva bhūtasya parameśvarasya aṃśa tvāt tathā udita sūrya sama kānteḥ
kīdṛśam vāsudevam
pravāla sundara aṅgam

original: kāma-vyākulitaṃ sva-dorbhiḥ sva-bāhubhir dakṣiṇa-vāma-krameṇa cakra-śaṅkhāṅkuśa-pāśa-puṣpa-śarekṣu-cāpa-padma-gadāḥ bibhrāṇaṃ tathā raktaṃ
analyzed: kāma vyākulitam sva dorbhiḥ sva bāhubhiḥ dakṣiṇa vāma krameṇa cakra śaṅkha aṅkuśa pāśa puṣpa śara ikṣu cāpa padma gadāḥ bibhrāṇam tathā raktam

original: netra-dvaya-rūpaṃ padmaṃ yasya sa tathā tam,
analyzed: netra dvaya rūpam padmam yasya sa tathā tam
padmarāga ādi maṇi ghaṭita śiraḥ laṅkāra karṇa bhūṣaṇam ukta hāra bāhu bhūṣaṇa kara mūla bhūṣaṇa mudrikā kṣudra ghaṇṭikā prabhṛtibhiḥ

original: rakta-mālya-gandhaiś ca dedīpyamānaṃ tathā pīte vāsasī paridhānam ācchādanaṃ yasya
analyzed: rakta mālya gandhaiḥ ca dedīpyamānam tathā pīte vāsasī paridhānam ācchādanam yasya

original: sa tathā taṃ tathā dhṛtekṣu-cāpena vāma-bāhu-daṇḍena dṛḍhaṃ yathā syād evaṃ śriyam āliṅganam /
analyzed: sa tathā tam tathā dhṛta ikṣu cāpena vāma bāhu daṇḍena dṛḍham yathā syāt evam śriyam āliṅganam
kīdṛśīm svīya vāma ūru deśe upaviṣṭām
tathā āliṅgantīm
tathā vāma hasta gṛhīta padmām

original: tathā sarasī-bhūta-guhyāṃ tathā kāmena vyākulīkṛtā anāyattī-kṛtā aṅga-latā yasyās
analyzed: tathā sarasībhūta guhyām tathā kāmena vyākulīkṛtā anāyattīkṛtā aṅga latā yasyāḥ

original: tāṃ manoharāṇi alaṅkāra-māla-candanāni yasyās tāṃ tathā śveta-vastra-paridhānāṃ tathā
analyzed: tām manoharāṇi alaṅkāra māla candanāni yasyāḥ tām tathā śveta vastra paridhānām tathā

original: kṛṣṇa-mukha-padme vyāpṛtaṃ samyag vyāpāra-yuktaṃ caṭulaṃ manoharaṃ cañcalaṃ vā asitaṃ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa mukha padme vyāpṛtam samyak vyāpāra yuktam caṭulam manoharam cañcalam vā asitam

original: śyāmaṃ yan netraṃ sa eva madhukaro bhramaraḥ yasyās tāṃ tathā taruī̀eīṃ yuvatīm /

punar kīdṛśīm
priya āliṅgana janita parama sukha pūrṇa hṛdayam tathā jagadgurum tathā deva daitya sarpa deva yoni deva gāyana vidyādhara strī sahasraiḥ

original: madatayā kāmena ca stambha-yuktam aṅgaṃ yeṣāṃ tair devārhaṇa-bhūṣaṇa-dīptair veṣṭitaṃ kayā
analyzed: mada tayā kāmena ca stambha yuktam aṅgam yeṣām taiḥ deva arhaṇa bhūṣaṇa dīptaiḥ veṣṭitam kayā
yuktyā ātma aikyena dhyātvā

original: juhuāt taraṇi-sahasraṃ vimalaiḥ salilaiś ca tarpayet tāvat /
analyzed: juhuāt taraṇi sahasram vimalaiḥ salilaiḥ ca tarpayet tāvat

original: viṃśaty-arṇe prokte yantre dinaśo 'mum arcayet bhaktyā // Krd_8.39 //

dhyāna japa anantaram ghṛta madhu śarkarā sahitaiḥ palāśa puṣpaiḥ dvādaśa sahasram juhuyāt

original: homānantaraṃ nirmalair jalair dvādaśa-sahasraṃ tarpaṇaṃ kuryāt /

original: aṅgāni ca bāṇāṃś ca nyāsa-kramataḥ kirīṭam api śirasi /
analyzed: aṅgāni ca bāṇān ca nyāsa kramataḥ kirīṭam api śirasi

original: śravasoś ca kuṇḍale 'ri-pramukhāni praharaṇāni pāṇiṣu ca // Krd_8.41 //
analyzed: śravasoḥ ca kuṇḍale ripra mukhāni praharaṇāni pāṇiṣu ca

original: śrīvatsa-kaustubhau ca stanayor ūrdhve gale ca vanamālām /
analyzed: śrīvatsa kaustubhau ca stanayoḥ ūrdhve gale ca vanamālām

original: pīta-vasanaṃ nitambe vāmāṅke śriyam api sva-bījena // Krd_8.42 //

original: iṣṭvātha karṇikāyām aṅgāni vidigdaśāsu dikṣu śarān /
analyzed: iṣṭvā atha karṇikāyām aṅgāni vidiś daśāsu dikṣu śarān

analyzed: koṇeṣu pañcamam punar agni ādi daleṣu śaktayaḥ pūjyāḥ

original: pūjā-vidhau pakṣi-śabdānte rājāyeti svarūpaṃ śiraḥ svāhā anena prakāreṇa pīṭha-madhye
analyzed: pūjā vidhau pakṣi śabda ante rājāya iti sva rūpam śiraḥ svāhā anena prakāreṇa pīṭha madhye

original: ahi-ripuṃ garuḍaṃ sampūjya tasya garuḍasya pṛṣṭhe śrī-kṛṣṇam āvāhyāvāhanādi yathāvat
analyzed: ahiripum garuḍam sampūjya tasya garuḍasya pṛṣṭhe śrī kṛṣṇam āvāhya āvāhana ādi yathāvat

original: kṛtvārghādyair bhūṣāntair upacāraiś ca sampūjya aṅgāni ca sampūjya pañca-bāṇāṃś ca
analyzed: kṛtvā argha ādyaiḥ bhūṣā antaiḥ upacāraiḥ ca sampūjya aṅgāni ca sampūjya pañcabāṇān ca

original: sampūjya bhūṣaṇāni ca sampūjya dig-daleṣu śaktayaḥ pūjyā iti anenānvayaḥ /
analyzed: sampūjya bhūṣaṇāni ca sampūjya diś daleṣu śaktayaḥ pūjyāḥ iti anena anvayaḥ
yatra parameśvara aṅge yasya nyāsaḥ

original: cakrādīni praharaṇāni āyudhāni hasteṣu stanayo ūrdhvaṃ hṛdi śrīvatsa-kaustubhau gale
analyzed: cakra ādīni praharaṇāni āyudhāni hasteṣu stanayoḥ ūrdhvam hṛdi śrīvatsa kaustubhau gale

original: vana-mālām āpāda-lambinīṃ padma-mālāṃ nitambe kaṭyāṃ haridrābha-vastraṃ vāmāṅge vāma-bhāge
analyzed: vanamālām ā pāda lambinīm padma mālām nitambe kaṭyām haridrā ābha vastram vāma aṅge vāma bhāge

original: lakṣmīṃ ca sva-bījena śrī-bījena iṣṭvā sampūjya karṇikāyāṃ dig-vidiśāsu koṇeṣu dikṣu
analyzed: lakṣmīm ca sva bījena śrī bījena iṣṭvā sampūjya karṇikāyām diś vidiśāsu koṇeṣu dikṣu

analyzed: ca aṅgāni pūrvavat sampūjya dikṣu śarān agni ādi koṇeṣu ca pañcamam bāṇam pūjayet

original: kīrtiḥ kāntiś ca site tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiś ca marakata-pratime // Krd_8.44 //

deva yogya anulepana alaṅkāra granthita puṣpa sūkṣma vastraiḥ bhūṣita dehāḥ aṅga latā śabdaḥ

original: svarūpa-vācī tathā īsad-dhāsya-vadanā tathā kāma-bāṇa-pīḍitāḥ tathā gṛhīta-cāmara-manoharās tāḥ // KrdC_8.45 //
analyzed: sva rūpa vācī tathā īsat hāsya vadanā tathā kāma bāṇa pīḍitāḥ tathā gṛhīta cāmara manoharāḥ tāḥ

original: lokeśā bahir arcyāḥ kathitety arcā manu-dvayodbhūtā /

analyzed: prāyas puruṣottama vidhiḥ evam hi sa na ucyate bahula tvāt

original: tad bahir indrādayaḥ vajrādayaś ca pūjyāḥ ity evaṃ pūjā mantra-dvaya-sambhavā kathitā
analyzed: tat bahis indra ādayaḥ vajra ādayaḥ ca pūjyāḥ iti evam pūjā mantra dvaya sambhavā kathitā

original: prāyo bāhulyena puruṣottama-mantra-kathita-prakāro 'py evaṃ paraṃ sa iha spaṣṭīkṛtya
analyzed: prāyas bāhulyena puruṣottama mantra kathita prakāraḥ evam param saḥ iha spaṣṭīkṛtya

original: nocyate bahu-vaktavyatvāt prāyaḥ puruṣottama-vidher evam ihānyato 'vagantavyam iti
analyzed: nā ucyate bahu vaktavya tvāt prāyas puruṣottama vidheḥ evam iha anyatas vagantavyam iti

sammohana gāyatrīm āha
trailokya mohanāya iti uktvā vidmahe iti smarāya iti

original: tat dhīmahīti tan no 'nte viṣṇus tad anu pracodayāt // Krd_8.47 //
analyzed: tat dhīmahi iti tat naḥ nte viṣṇuḥ tat anu pracodayāt

original: trailokya-mohanāyeti svarūpam uktvā tad-anantaraṃ vidmaha iti smarāyeti tad-anu dhīmahīti tan no viṣṇuḥ pracodayād iti svarūpaṃ vadet // KrdC_8.47
analyzed: trailokya mohanāya iti svarūpam uktvā tad anantaram vidmahe iti smarāya iti tadanu dhīmahi iti tat naḥ viṣṇuḥ pracodayāt iti svarūpam vadet  /

original: japyaiṣā hi japādau durita-harī śrī-karī japārcana-havanaiḥ /

prokṣayatu śuddhi vidhaye rcāyām anayā ātma yāga bhū dravyāṇi

original: eṣā gāyatrī japāt pūrvaṃ japanīyā sva-mantra-japa-pūjā-homaiḥ punaḥ pāpa-nāśinī lakṣmī-pradā ca bhavati /
analyzed: eṣā gāyatrī japāt pūrvam japanīyā sva mantra japa pūjā homaiḥ punar pāpa nāśinī lakṣmī pradā ca bhavati

original: anayā gāyatryā ca pūjāyāṃ śuddhy-artham ātma-yāga-bhū-dravyāṇi ātmānaṃ yāga-bhuvaṃ dravyāṇi ca prokṣayatu // KrdC_8.48 //
analyzed: anayā gāyatryā ca pūjāyām śuddhi artham ātma yāga bhū dravyāṇi ātmānam yāga bhuvam dravyāṇi ca prokṣayatu
mantra dvaya sādhāraṇa tarpaṇam āha

original: manvor ekena śataṃ tarpayen mohanī-prasūna-yutair yaḥ /
analyzed: manvoḥ ekena śatam tarpayet mohanī prasūna yutaiḥ yaḥ

original: toyair dinaśaḥ prātaḥ sa tu labhate vāñchitān ayatnataḥ kāmān // Krd_8.49 //

original: yaḥ pūrvokta-mantrayor ekena mohanī-puṣpa-miśritaiḥ śakrāsana-padmāsana-puṣpa-sahitair jalaiḥ prati pratyahaṃ śataṃ tarpayet /
analyzed: yaḥ pūrva ukta mantrayoḥ ekena mohanī puṣpa miśritaiḥ śakrāsana padmāsana puṣpa sahitaiḥ jalaiḥ prati pratyaham śatam tarpayet

original: sa vāñchitān kāmān anāyāsena prāpnoti // KrdC_8.49 //
analyzed: sa vāñchitān kāmān anāyāsena prāpnoti
mantra dvaya sambandhi prayoga antaram āha

original: bhojayatu svāmīkaṃ ramaṇī-ramaṇo 'pi tāṃ sva-vaśatāṃ netum // Krd_8.50 //
analyzed: bhojayatu svāmīkam ramaṇī ramaṇaḥ u tām sva vaśa tām netum

original: ghṛtena vahnāv ayutaṃ āhuti-śeṣa-ghṛtena mantra-japtena ramaṇī sva-vaśatāṃ netuṃ prāpayituṃ ātmīyaṃ kāmukaṃ bhojayatu kāmukaḥ striyaṃ bhojayatu
analyzed: ghṛtena vahnau ayutam āhuti śeṣa ghṛtena mantra japtena ramaṇī sva vaśa tām netum prāpayitum ātmīyam kāmukam bhojayatu kāmukaḥ striyam bhojayatu

analyzed: aṣṭādaśa akṣara mantra kathitāḥ vaśya kāriṇaḥ prayogāḥ ābhyām mantrābhyām kāryāḥ hi niścayena jagati sakala jagat āyatta tā kārye anayoḥ samānaḥ
