analyzed: tad anantaram pūrvam pūrvam apohya apara sthāneṣu manaḥ nidadhyāt aṅgulyaḥ eva āmalaka śalayāḥ nirmala pallavāḥ teṣu

original: tad anu nakhānāṃ śobhamāna-paṅktau tad-anu prapada-yuji pāda-dvaye /
analyzed: tat anu nakhānām śobhamāna paṅktau tadanu prapada yuji pāda dvaye
kīdṛśe kūrma pṛṣṭha vat upari bhāge unnate
tadanu dedīpyamāna jaṅghā dvaye

original: tad-anu jānu-dvaye ūru-dvaye pīta-varṇe nūtana-vastrayoḥ śreṣṭhe kṣudra-ghaṇṭikā-mālāyāṃ
analyzed: tadanu jānu dvaye ūru dvaye pīta varṇe nūtana vastrayoḥ śreṣṭhe kṣudra ghaṇṭikā mālāyām

original: nābhi-pradeśe tan-niṣṭha-roma-paṅktau ca vipulodara-sthāne mahāhāra-yukte vistīrṇe
analyzed: nābhi pradeśe tad niṣṭha roma paṅktau ca vipula udara sthāne mahā āhāra yukte vistīrṇe
vakṣasi
śrīvatse kaustubhe ca sphuṭa kamala lasat baddha hṛd dāmni bāhvoḥ
mūle keyūra dīpte jagat avana paṭau dos dvaye kaṅkaṇa āḍhye
pāṇi dvandva aṅguli sthe ti madhura rava saṃlīna viśve ca veṇau
kaṇṭhe sat kuṇḍala usra sphuṭa rucira kapola stha dvandvake ca
śrīvatse vipra pāda avaghāta tarjanya ūrdhva roma ātmake kaustubhe hṛdaya niviṣṭa maṇi viśeṣe
vikasita padma mālāyām keyūra śobhita bāhvoḥ mūle saṃsāra rakṣaṇa dakṣe kaṅkaṇa yukte

original: bāhu-dvaye hasta-dvayāṅguli-niṣṭhe atimadhura-śabdena magnaṃ jagat-trayaṃ yena evambhūte veṇau /
analyzed: bāhu dvaye hasta dvaya aṅguli niṣṭhe atimadhura śabdena magnam jagattrayam yena evambhūte veṇau
tadanu kaṇṭhe ramya kuṇḍala kiraṇa prakāśita manohara kapola stha yugale

original: karṇa-dvandve ca ghoṇe nayana-nalinayor bhrū-vilāse lalāṭe
analyzed: karṇa dvandve ca ghoṇe nayana nalinayoḥ bhrū vilāse lalāṭe
keśeṣu ālola barheṣu ati surabhi manojña prasūna ujjvaleṣu
śoṇe vinyasta veṇau adhara kiśalaye danta paṅktyām smita ākhye

original: jyotsnāyām ādi-puṃsaḥ krama iti ca śanaiḥ svaṃ manaḥ saṃnidhattām // Krd_8.110 //
analyzed: jyotsnāyām ādi puṃsaḥ kramaḥ iti ca śanais svam manaḥ saṃnidhattām

original: karṇa-dvaye nāsā-yugale netra-padma-dvaye bhrū-vikṣepe lalāṭe cañcala-mayūra-puccha-yukteṣu
analyzed: karṇa dvaye nāsā yugale netra padma dvaye bhrū vikṣepe lalāṭe cañcala mayūra puccha yukteṣu
ati sugandhita manohara puṣpa ujjvaleṣu keśeṣu śoṇa varṇe āropita veṇau adhara pallave

original: danta-paṅktyāṃ smitam ākhyā nāma yasyā tasyāṃ jyotsnāyām candra-kāntau jyotsnā-tulye
analyzed: danta paṅktyām smitam ākhyā nāma tasyām jyotsnāyām candra kāntau jyotsnā tulye
smite
yāvat manaḥ vilayam eti hareḥ udāre
manda smite bhyasatu tāvat anaṅga bījam
aṣṭādaśa arṇam athavā api daśa arṇakam vā
mantrī śanais atha samāhita mātariśvā

original: harer udāre śobhamāne manda-smite mano yāvad vilayam viśeṣato layam eti tāvad anaṅga-bījam aṣṭādaśārṇam daśārṇaṃ vā prajapatu /
analyzed: hareḥ udāre śobhamāne manda smite manaḥ yāvat vilayam viśeṣataḥ layam eti tāvat anaṅgabījam aṣṭādaśa arṇam daśa arṇam vā prajapatu
kimbhūtaḥ samāhita mātariśvā pratyāharīkṛtaḥ prāṇa vāyuḥ
āropya āropya manaḥ pada aravinda ādi manda hasita antam

original: tatra vilāpya kṣīṇe cetasi sukha-cit-sad-ātmako bhavati // Krd_8.112 //
analyzed: tatra vilāpya kṣīṇe cetasi sukha cit sat ātmakaḥ bhavati
manaḥ pada aravindam ārabhya īsadha āsya paryantam samāropya anantaram

original: tatra vilāpya līnaṃ kṛtvā kṣīṇe śuddhe citte sati sukha-jñāna-sad-ātmako bhavati sādhakaḥ // KrdC_8.112 //
analyzed: tatra vilāpya līnam kṛtvā kṣīṇe śuddhe citte sati sukha jñāna sat ātmakaḥ bhavati sādhakaḥ
nyāsa japa homa pūjā tarpaṇa mantra abhiṣeka viniyogānām
dīpikayā eva mayā udbhāṣitaḥ kramaḥ kṛtsna mantra gaṇa kathitānām

original: kṛṣṇa-mantra-samūha-kathitānāṃ nyāsa-japādīnāṃ krama-dīpikayaiva kramaḥ prakāśitaḥ // KrdC_8.113 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa mantra samūha kathitānām nyāsa japa ādīnām kramadīpikayā eva kramaḥ prakāśitaḥ
saṃśaya timira chidurā sā eṣā kramadīpikā kareṇa sadbhiḥ

original: kara-dīpikeva dhāryā sasneham aharniśaṃ samasta-sukhāptyai // Krd_8.114 //
analyzed: kara dīpikā iva dhāryā sa sneham aharniśam samasta sukha āptyai

original: saiṣā krama-dīpikā sādhu-janaiḥ sa-snehaṃ yathā syāt tathā kara-dīpikeva dhāryā /
analyzed: sā eṣā kramadīpikā sādhu janaiḥ sa sneham yathā syāt tathā kara dīpikā iva dhāryā

original: kimbhūtā ? saṃśaya-rūpāndhakāra-cchedayitrī anyāpi tailādi-sneha-sahitaṃ yathā syāt tathā dhāryate andhakāra-nāśinī bhavati /
analyzed: kimbhūtā saṃśaya rūpa andhakāra chedayitrī anyā api taila ādi sneha sahitam yathā syāt tathā dhāryate andhakāra nāśinī bhavati
kim artham dhāryā
samasta sukha prāpti artham

original: jagad idam anubiddhaṃ yena yasmāt prasūte
analyzed: jagat idam anubiddham yena yasmāt prasūte

original: yad anu tatam ajasraṃ pāti cādhiṣṭhitā yam /
analyzed: yat anu tatam ajasram pāti ca adhiṣṭhitāḥ yam

original: yad uru maha udarcir yaṃ vidhatte ca gopī
analyzed: yat uru mahaḥ udarciḥ yam vidhatte ca gopī
tam amṛta sukha bodha jyotiṣam naumi kṛṣṇam

original: jagad idam anuviddham anusyūtaṃ yena jyotiṣā yasmāt parameśvarāt imaṃ jana-lokaṃ saṃsārākhyaṃ prasūte prasūtiṃ prānotīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: jagat idam anuviddham anusyūtam yena jyotiṣā yasmāt parameśvarāt imam janalokam saṃsāra ākhyam prasūte prasūtim prānoti iti arthaḥ
yasmin iti api pāṭhaḥ

original: tathā parameśvaram adhiṣṭhātāram āśritā satī anutataṃ vistṛtaṃ jagat ajasraṃ sarvadā
analyzed: tathā parameśvaram adhiṣṭhātāram āśritā satī anutatam vistṛtam jagat ajasram sarvadā

original: pāti rakṣati yasya parameśvarasya ūru vipulaṃ mahaḥ tejaḥ tat udarcis tat-tejasā
analyzed: pāti rakṣati yasya parameśvarasya ūro vipulam mahaḥ tejaḥ tat udarciḥ tad tejasā

original: udita-dīptiḥ satī yaṃ pratibimba-rūpeṇa dhatte tam uktānandaṃ sva-prakāśaṃ naumi
analyzed: udita dīptiḥ satī yam pratibimba rūpeṇa dhatte tam ukta ānandam sva prakāśam naumi
staumi
yaḥ cakram nija keli sādhanam prabhuḥ
dattam manmathaśatruṇā vana kṛte vyāvṛtta loka attikam
dhatte dīpta navena śobhanam agha apeta ātta māyam dhruvam

original: vande kāya-vimardanaṃ vadha-kṛtāṃ bhuñjad-dyukaṃ yādavam // Krd_8.116 //
analyzed: vande kāya vimardanam vadha kṛtām bhuñjat dyukam yādavam

original: yaḥ parameśvaraḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ vakṣyamāṇa-lakṣaṇaṃ cakraṃ dhatte taṃ vande ity anvayaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ parameśvaraḥ śrī kṛṣṇaḥ vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇam cakram dhatte tam vande iti anvayaḥ
kathambhūtam cakram
kīdṛśaḥ parameśvaraḥ
adhiṣṭhāna sthitaḥ pi samādhi sthitaḥ pi
yat vā bāhya sthitaḥ prabhuḥ svāmī
punar kīdṛśaiḥ

original: manmatha-śatruṇā mahā-devena avane avana-kṛte sarva-loka-rakṣārthaṃ dattam /
analyzed: manmathaśatruṇā mahādevena avane avana kṛte sarva loka rakṣā artham dattam
punar dūrīkṛta ativṛṣṭi anāvṛṣṭi ādi apadravam
punar dīpta navena iva śobhanam dedīpyamānam
kim bhūtam kṛṣṇam

original: pāpa-rahitaṃ svīkṛta-māyaṃ punar dhruvam avināśinaṃ punar vadha-kṛtām upadrava-kāriṇāṃ
analyzed: pāpa rahitam svīkṛta māyam punar dhruvam avināśinam punar vadha kṛtām upadrava kāriṇām

original: kāya-vimardanaṃ śarīra-nāśakaṃ punaḥ bhuñjad-dyukaṃ bhuñjat-svarga-lokaṃ punar jātyāyād avam ity arthaḥ
analyzed: kāya vimardanam śarīra nāśakam punar bhuñjat dyukam bhuñjat svarga lokam punar jātyāyāt avam iti arthaḥ

original: / atra padye cakra-bandhe grantha-kartā sva-nāma prakṣiptavān iti bodhyam // KrdC_8.116 //
analyzed: atra padye cakrabandhe grantha kartā sva nāma prakṣiptavān iti bodhyam
iti śrīmat mahā mahā upadhyāya śrīkeśava kāśmīri bhaṭṭa gosvāmi viracitāyām
samāptaḥ yam granthaḥ
